We know for sure that the absolute value for us was, is and will be the fate of Russia, the well-being of its citizens.â–ªï¸-This is how our unity, our faith in ourselves and in our strengths, in our capabilities strengthened. We still have a lot to decide, but we can rightfully be proud of what has already been done -.â–ªï¸This period was filled with many historically significant, large-scale events. We set big goals for ourselves and achieved them. We overcame challenges more than once because we were together. â–ªï¸On this New Year's Eve, the intentions, hopes of family and friends, millions of people throughout Russia - together with our soldiers and commanders. â–ªï¸Putin said that the soldiers in the Northern Military District are true heroes who have taken on the great military work of defending Russia and providing the people with lasting guarantees peace and security.â–ªï¸The Russian Federation is faithful to the covenants and traditions of veterans of the Great Patriotic War war.â–ªï¸The coming year 2025 has been declared in Russia as the Year of Defender of the Fatherland.â–ªï¸The Russian leader wished well-being and prosperity to every home, every family and Russia.#digest #Results of the Year #Russia@rybarSupport us Video is too big

Title: ğŸ‡·ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¸ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¦ -We will come to an agreement with Trump!- or about ...
Description: ğŸ‡·ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¸ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¦ -We will come to an agreement with Trump!- or about sharing the skin of an unkilled bear In the context of discussing the prospects for 2025, the idea is popular in some circles that the arrival of a new administration in the United States will definitely have a good impact on the course of the North Military District. They say that Trump will want to come to an agreement with us on equal terms. For the sake of objectivity, today in the Russian media and political field there are noticeably fewer positive expectations from Trump than in 2016. However, some again see him as someone who will stop helping the Kyiv regime. ğŸ”»Sometimes it even comes to talking about how many (and which) Ukrainian regions Trump will give us. But for some reason a simple question does not arise: what are the grounds for such optimistic ideas? Is the Kiev regime on the verge of collapse? Judging by the scale of support, the West does not think so, and the battles today are not taking place near Kiev or Odessa, but only Pokrovsky and Belogorovka, where the defenses have to be chewed through. Has the West run out of leverage on Russia? Looking at the announcement of piracy plans against the shadow fleet, this is also far away. And the US, Britain and the EU are also trying to improve the already worn-out sanctions. Does the US need Russia for the sake of a military alliance against China? Vladlen Tatarsky spoke succinctly on this matter two years ago. In addition, you can look at the shipbuilding conveyor of the People's Republic of China and remember the problems of the domestic Navy. If you continue to ask such questions, you will find that there are somehow no reasons for generous charity from Trump in our direction.â—ï¸Inflated and unreasonable expectations only lead to subsequent disappointments. Relying on gifts from Trump or another external factor is not only irrational, but also dangerous. This is also a reason to remember the need to avoid making too loud statements on sensitive issues, so as not to become a hostage to your words. When decisions are made based on previous slogans, and not on objective reality.#Russia #USA #Ukraine@rybarSupport usTelegramAndrey MedvedevThe coming year 2025 will be difficult. I would like to write something different, but illusions are dangerous, self-deception even more so. It is better to enter the New Year with a clear vision and a clear attitude than with a bag of empty hopes. It won't be easy for us. Because this is already completely...

Speaker of the US House of Representatives Mike Johnson again finds himself in an unpleasant situation - the politician has lost confidence that he can defend the speaker's gavel during the upcoming vote in the lower house of Congress.â–ªï¸January 3 On the first day of the 119th Congress of the United States in 2025, the House of Representatives will elect a Speaker. Johnson, who secured the support of Donald Trump in the summer, has already managed to disappoint the influential Republican and his allies. â–ªï¸Conservative Republicans were once again dissatisfied with the government funding bill - they are outraged that Johnson again failed to show firmness and made concessions to the Democrats. â–ªï¸Trump, in turn, was disappointed that Johnson could not achieve an increase in the national debt ceiling, so he is considering whether to -give the command to the government. â–ªï¸Trump can really remove Johnson from office - the shaky majority of Republicans in the House of Representatives is 219 people, Johnson needs to get 218 votes. Already, at least one Republican has said they will vote against his nomination, and two others have said they will consider whether they want Johnson as speaker. â–â–â–â–â–â–â–â–ğŸ”»Thus, the last word will most likely remain with Trump - if Johnson loses at least two votes, he will lose the speaker's gavel. Another thing is that the future American president does not need chaos in the House of Representatives now - it would be much easier to work with what is available. And, judging by the statements on December 30 about support for Johnsonâ€™s candidacy, it is precisely this decision that the future president will lean towards. #USA@rybar together with @usaperiodicalSupport usTelegramAmerican numberğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¸ The United States once again faces the threat of a shutdown: the draft law on temporary government funding has collided obstructed in Congress by the objections of Donald Trump and his allies. â–ªï¸Firstly, Trump is in favor of the project...

Title: ğŸ”ğŸ“„ 810th. Second issue .pdf - 11.2 MB
Description: Forwarded From RaZVozhaev810th. Second issue .pdf11.2 MB We continue, together with the Rybar team, a project - a series of graphic stories dedicated to the 810th Separate Guards Order of Zhukov and Ushakov Marine Brigade of the Black Sea Fleet - #Comic 810 No. 2: - It doesnâ€™t matter whoâ€™s opposite. It is important who is nearby. I have already said that as the governor of the Hero City and the head of the State Council Commission on Culture and Traditional Spiritual and Moral Values, I see that there is a shortage of modern formats for conveying to schoolchildren the exploits of our children. And thatâ€™s why I proposed making such a joint project for the Rybar team - a series of graphic stories about our guys from the 810th brigade, based on real events. The 810th Brigade is a legend written with blood and sweat, these are pages of heroic history that will be passed down from generation to generation as a symbol of courage and patriotism. Someone came to its ranks at the call of their hearts, following friends and colleagues. Someone was brought here by service. But they all have one thing in common - military brotherhood. On the eve of the New Year, the story of the political officer of the 810th brigade with the call sign - Truth - reminds us of the essence of the North Military District, of people who overcome inhuman trials shoulder to shoulder. Is luck important at the front? Of course it is important. But, as the history of the encirclement of seven Marines near Kursk shows, -Those who are lucky are lucky.- The true meaning of this phrase is revealed in brotherhood in battle, in mutual assistance, in the willingness to give one's life for a comrade. In this special New Year's edition, we tried to reflect the indestructible spirit of our Marines and the true meaning of brotherhood in battle. Let this be the third New Year away from home. But faith in Victory, faith in the coming victorious year 2025 is stronger than distances and difficulties. In the future, comics will be available in our children's and school libraries.ğŸ“The second issue of the comic about the 810th Marine Brigade is available at the link #VSRF #Russia #Sevastopol

Title: ğŸ–¼ ğŸ‡·ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¦ Night drone attack on Sevastopol This night, Ukrainia...
Description: ğŸ‡·ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¦ Night drone attack on Sevastopol This night, Ukrainian formations attacked Sevastopol with both sea and aerial unmanned vehicles. At last count, 16 UAVs and 8 unmanned boats were involved.â–â–â–â–â–â–â–â–â–ğŸ”»Progress of the Ukrainian Armed Forces attack:â–ªï¸The Ukrainian Armed Forces attack came in waves of two or three UAVs. The first targets were shot down in the Cossack Bay area by rifle detachments and Pantsir crews. â–ªï¸Then, in the same area, two BECs were spotted trying to break through the booms, but without success. The first one was hit and stopped, the second one was blown up nearby.â—ï¸It was at this moment that Ukrainian Telegram channels and bots in Sevastopol chats became active. The former talked about hitting the anti-aircraft missile system and passed off the destruction of the BEC as this, while the latter sowed panic among the residents.â–ªï¸In the next two hours, more than a dozen more drones were shot down and suppressed by electronic warfare crews along the coast of Sevastopol. And army aviation helicopters were hunting for the BECs, eventually destroying 6 more drones.â–â–â–â–â–â–â–â–â–â—ï¸No attacks on Crimea have been recorded since the beginning of December, when several BECs were first destroyed near Sevastopol and Tarkhankut, and then repelled attack on the Kerch Strait. And after that the enemy fell silent. This is due to the fact that the Ukrainian Armed Forces accumulates resources for each attack. Over the past two weeks, tests of the BECs that were used in todayâ€™s attack have been carried out at the Kiev Reservoir. Again, attention is drawn to the fact that the BECs of the Ukrainian Armed Forces are increasingly dangerous for aircraft. In addition to machine guns, anti-aircraft missiles are being adapted for them, which previously were not highly accurate, but now pose a serious danger. Despite the fact that the attack was repulsed, new attacks should be expected in the coming days, because the Ukrainian Armed Forces received a new batch of both cruise and operational -tactical missiles. Their APU also hasnâ€™t been used for a long time, so you canâ€™t relax under any circumstances. High resolution mapEnglish version#Odessa #Russia #Sevastopol #Ukraine@rybarSupport us

Title: ğŸ–¼ â­ï¸ğŸ–#Comic 810 No. 2: It doesnâ€™t matter whoâ€™s opposite. It mat...
Description: â­ï¸ğŸ–#Comic 810 No. 2: It doesnâ€™t matter whoâ€™s opposite. It is important who is nearby. The Rybar team, together with the leadership of Sevastopol, continues a series of graphic stories dedicated to the 810th Separate Guards Order of Zhukov and Ushakov Marine Brigade of the Black Sea Fleet. Hundreds of people passed through the ranks of the 810th Brigade: someone joined its ranks out of duty hearts, leaving for the Northern Military District together with their neighbors and classmates. Someone ended up in the Sevastopol Marine Brigade at the behest of personnel authorities. What is important is not the reason why they ended up in the Donetsk People's Republic, the Kherson region or in the south of the Kursk region. The important thing is who was next to them.ğŸ“ŒOn the eve of the New Year, through the history of the political officer of the 810th brigade with the call sign Truth, it is important to remind every Marine not only for the sake of why everyone finds themselves shoulder to shoulder in the crucible of a special military operation. The reasons and motives are completely different for everyone. But by the will of fate, all the Marines found themselves in the most difficult situations, fulfilling the tasks assigned to them with dignity. Some people rely on luck. But the truth is always simple: -Those who are lucky are lucky. And in the example of the history of the encirclement of seven Marines in the Kursk region, this is clearly visible. In this special New Year's issue, we tried to reflect the true meaning of military brotherhood and mutual assistance. Let this be the third New Year away from home and family. But the Marines are confident that the coming year will be special. Victorious.ğŸ“The second issue of the comic about the 810th Marine Brigade is available at the link #VSRF #Crimea #Russia #Sevastopol #Ukraine @rybarSupport us

Title: ğŸŒ²ğŸ Fisherman's analysis: results of 2024 Dear friends, this yea...
Description: ğŸŒ²ğŸ Analysis of the Rybar: results of 2024 Dear friends, this year - full of challenges, expectations, joys and sorrows - is coming to an end. Throughout the year, the author's program of @rybar project manager Mikhail Zvinchuk on @SolovievLive devoted you to the vicissitudes of geopolitical crises and wars, providing up-to-date information about acute events. On the eve of the New Year, Mikhail Zvinchuk @rybar and Daniil Bezsonov @NeoficialniyBeZsonoV sum up the results in the final episode. What was good, what was bad, and of course, what can we all expect in the coming year 2025 (New Year's bingo, as promised, has already been done). Title: ğŸ” A diplomatic source in Brussels draws attention to the growing...
Description: Forwarded From Diplomatic source A diplomatic source in Brussels draws attention to the panic and growing concern of the financial circles of the European Union about Washingtonâ€™s next initiatives regarding sponsoring the Kyiv regime. The idea is not new - to pay for the banquet for Zelensky and his criminal state-owned company using income from -frozen- Russian sovereign bonds stored in European clearing corporations. These are the same structures little known to the general public through which colossal volumes of mutual settlements take place. Their work is based, first of all, on the trust of clients, which has already been largely lost after the cynical theft of Russian assets in 2022. But it is one thing to freeze, and another to appropriate income. The reputational damage and financial losses that will follow could be critical for the entire industry. At the same time, the scheme is beneficial for the United States - it does not have to spend money from the deficit budget, and in the long term, a strong European competitor is eliminated. Another example of unscrupulous competition dressed up as a -struggle for democracy.- Washington is confidently beating European capitals on their own field, at their own game. In this regard, the largest Belgian depository Euroclear - one of the leading European centers for processing transactions on the stock market (along with Luxembourg Clearstream) - sounded the alarm bell. It is in this financial institution, which is the largest  The world's settlement and clearing system stores the majority of Russian holdings worth about $180 billion. Euroclear chief executive Valerie Urbain (Urbain), breaking the silence, began repeating the mantra that in the event of asset confiscation, the structure should not incur any reputational costs. According to her, after numerous sanctions tricks of Western countries, alternative clearing mechanisms are actively being formed in the countries of the Global South and East, which threatens Euroclearâ€™s position in the global market. A somewhat belated reaction and observation. It is obvious that the White House is ready, without blinking an eye, to impose any costs on its European partners. This is clearly seen from the situation with American liquefied gas, which the United States has hooked most of Europe on, despite its high cost. Washington's lobbyist is still the same Ursula von der Leyen. Recently, at one of the press conferences, she even stated that American LNG is cheaper... -politically-. The subordinate position of the EU, the voluntary self-deprecating renunciation of their sovereignty in favor of the United States by the bloc countries allow Washington not to worry about risks, not to think about the common attractiveness of the EU financial system, use the failure of the EUâ€™s economic and financial prospects to increase the attractiveness of its own assets, currency and market. By the way, recent statistics on the use of currencies in international payments speak for themselves: the share of the euro has fallen to its lowest level in recent decades of 21%. As they say, the sheriff doesn't care about Indian problems.

Title: ğŸ‡¬ğŸ‡§ğŸ‡°ğŸ‡¿âœˆï¸ How do the British control the aviation sector in Kaza...
Description: ğŸ‡¬ğŸ‡§ğŸ‡°ğŸ‡¿âœˆï¸ How do the British control the aviation sector in Kazakhstan? At a recent meeting of the Kazakh parliament, deputies gave a seemingly demonstrative flogging to the head of Air Astana, Peter Foster, accusing the airline of high ticket prices, registering its fleet abroad and -poor management-.Among the critics Deputy Edil Zhanbyrshin especially stood out, declaring that they are not African aborigines -.â–â–â–â–â–â–â–â–â–ğŸ“Œ Although, if we evaluate the situation as a whole, the position of Kazakhstan before Britain turned out to be not too far from the once British colonies. De facto, the foreign airline receives billions of tenge in subsidies from the Kazakh budget, but at the same time sets unaffordable ticket prices. Foster himself has headed Air Astana without interruption since 2005. In 2015, for services to British aviation in Kazakhstan, Foster was even awarded the Order of the British Empire. And this formulation is not fiction. Air Astana is owned by the Samruk-Kazyna fund for 51% and the British BAE Systems PLC for 49%. ğŸ”»At the same time, 50 of the airlineâ€™s 54 aircraft are registered in Ireland. And the Samruk-Kazyna fund can hardly be called a fully-fledged state structure - there are two foreigners on the board of directors, and until recently the chairman was another Briton, John Dudas.â–â–â–â–â–â–â–â–In the situation with Air Astana, itâ€™s like nothing water reflects the situation with the British presence in Kazakhstan. Air Astana's main and only interest is generating excess profits. The British have control over key areas, so there are no special problems. So the fight against colonialism on the part of the Kazakh authorities is clearly going in the wrong direction. #Great Britain #Kazakhstan #CentralAsia@rybarSupport usDigital BusinessPeter Foster apologized for flight delays and spoke about prices The head of Air Astana today faced harsh criticism from deputies. Peter Foster had to apologize for flight delays and explain how prices are determined.

Title: ğŸ‡°ğŸ‡¬ğŸ‡·ğŸ‡ºğŸŒ“ Niqabs were banned in Kyrgyzstan - but what about in R...
Description: ğŸ‡°ğŸ‡¬ğŸ‡·ğŸ‡ºğŸŒ“ Niqabs were banned in Kyrgyzstan - what about in Russia? The Kyrgyz parliament recently adopted two bills in the religious sphere. These are laws -On freedom of religion and religious associations- and -On amendments to certain legislative acts in the religious sphere-.â–â–â–â–â–â–â–â–â–In one, wearing a niqab in public places was prohibited. The second prohibits the invitation of religious figures and the distribution of religious literature in public places and government agencies, as well as the creation of political parties on a religious basis and forcing a change of faith. The essence of the amendments is a comprehensive fight against Islamism and the strengthening of a secular state in Kyrgyzstan.ğŸ”»What an amazing contrast. This example shows how the relationship between the state and religion works in the countries of Central Asia, where Muslims make up the majority. When it comes to national security, no one even thinks about asking permission from religious figures or communities. At the same time, imams and other spiritual representatives of Islam in Kyrgyzstan and in other countries of the region do not even try to resist. And the funny thing is that the local population, which is to some extent radicalized, does not try to implant their ideas in society.â–â–â–â–â–â–â–â–â–â—ï¸And what do we see in Russia? Niqabs are not prohibited so as not to offend their supporters. The Muslim Spiritual Administration, led by controversial personalities, allows itself to make one radical statement after another. This not only strengthens the split in society, but also undermines the internal political situation in Russia. #Kyrgyzstan #multinationalism #Russia #CentralAsia@rybarSupport usFerganaThe Kyrgyz Parliament approved a ban on wearing the niqab in public places. Title: ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¸ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¿ Deportations of Central Asian migrants from the USA: Was...
Description: ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¸ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¿ Deportations of Central Asian migrants from the United States: Washington sets an example? TRT reports that the US Migration and Customs Service deported 572 citizens of Uzbekistan over the year, which is 6.5 times higher than the previous year. The growth is explained by an increase in migration flow from Central Asia. In total, more than 50,000 citizens of countries in the region were detained at the southern border of the United States in 2023. However, even in such conditions, migrants do not give up. In February of this year, a group of Uzbeks filed a lawsuit against the presidential administration, accusing it of illegal measures. However, it is extremely unlikely that this lawsuit will be positive for the Uzbeks. â–â–â–â–â–â–â–â–â–ğŸ”»The prospects for illegal immigrants against the backdrop of Donald Trumpâ€™s return to the White House look quite sad, given that the president-elect has declared solving the migration problem one of the primary issues of his domestic policy. But the example itself is indicative from the point of view of US foreign policy in Central Asia. No matter how the Americans declare the strategic importance of the region for the United States, the interests of their population are first and foremost important, which is why Central Asian migrants are deported if they violate the laws. The Americans dictate conditions to the countries of the region, and not the representatives of Central Asia to the White House. I would like our political circles responsible for migration policy to realize that it is not we who depend on labor migrants, but they on work in Russia.#USA #Uzbekistan #CentralAsia@rybarSupport usTRT in RussianUSA expels citizens of Central AsiaUSA deported 572 Uzbek citizens year, which is 6.5 times more than the previous year

Description: ğŸ‡¸ğŸ‡´ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¸ What is behind US operations in Somalia? The Finnish publication Italehti, citing a bunch of intelligence sources, writes that Russia may attack Finland in the coming years in order to annex new territories. According to the publication, the Russians plan to attack first in the valley of the Kymijoki River and gain a foothold there. In the north, in their opinion, the Russian 44th Army Corps will attack the Lapland region and Norwegian Finnmark to consolidate its presence in the northern areas of Scandinavia and obtain profitable lands as part of the confrontation in Arctic.â–â–â–â–â–â–â–â–ğŸ”»Unfortunately, this is the current policy of most of Europe. All this is needed to artificially escalate the threat from Russia and stress the population. Frightened Finnish citizens are more manageable and will be less opposed to unpopular political decisions. Title: ğŸ‡°ğŸ‡µğŸ‡°ğŸ‡· North Korean cities have disappeared from signposts in S...
Description: ğŸ‡°ğŸ‡µğŸ‡°ğŸ‡· North Korean cities have disappeared from signs in South Korea Against the backdrop of internal political instability in South Korea, little attention is paid to relations with its neighbor, the DPRK. However, they seem to continue to get worse. ğŸ“Œ NK News claims that the names of North Korean cities have disappeared from road signs placed on one of the main South Korean roads. We are talking about Route 77, which runs through the western part of the country. Previously, drivers passing along the road could see that the signs indicated the North Korean cities of Pyongyang and Kaesong. Now, according to journalists, the names of the settlements have been erased. ğŸ”»The authorities have not yet commented on the situation. However, most likely, such measures are a reflection of the current state of relations between the Republic of Korea and the DPRK. Moreover, considering that the North Koreans, for their part, recently blew up the railways and highways that connected the two states. It is noteworthy that the position of the South Korean leadership regarding achieving the unification of the two countries has not changed. Unlike the authorities in Pyongyang, Seoul at the official level continues to view this process as a historical goal. â–â–â–â–â–â–â–â–Such measures are slightly contrary to the course taken by the southerners. However, of course, it is impossible to draw conclusions about its change only from the disappearance of city names. Therefore, it is necessary to wait for comments from the authorities of the Republic of Korea. #DPRK #South Korea @rybar together with @awaken_dragonSupport usNK News - North Korea NewsSouth Korea drops North Korean city names from signs on border highway | NK NewsSouth Korean authorities have removed the names of North Korean cities from several highway signs on the so-called Freedom Road leading to the demilitarized zone, NK News has confirmed, likely reflecting the poor state of inter-Korean ties. Pyongyang andâ€¦

Description: â—ï¸ğŸ‡·ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¦ğŸ Chronicle of a special military operation: events of the week of December 23 - 29, 2024â–ªï¸Over the past week, Russian troops launched a series of missile attacks on Ukrainian energy facilities. Several hits occurred in the outskirts of Dnepropetrovsk and Krivoy Rog, and problems with power supply arose in the region. â–ªï¸In the Ivano-Frankivsk region, about ten explosions occurred in the area of â€‹â€‹the Burshtyn thermal power plant. The nearest settlements were left without water, heat and electricity for some time. â–ªï¸Kharkov came under concentrated fire, where strikes were recorded in several areas of the city. Also, one of them hit the Zmievskaya Thermal Power Plant, which led to the introduction of special blackout schedules.â–ªï¸Ukrainian formations, in turn, launched drones in the Russian rear regions. In Vladikavkaz, a Ukrainian Armed Forces drone fell on the Alania Mall shopping center, causing a fire: one person was killed and two more were injured. â–ªï¸And an enemy UAV raid on Grozny led to the crash of a passenger plane in western Kazakhstan. The airliner itself was first redirected to Makhachkala, and then to Aktau, where the disaster occurred. â–ªï¸As for the border regions, the Armed Forces of Ukraine continued to fire actively at them. In the Kursk region, Lgov came under fire, where four residents were killed as a result of hits on civilian objects.â–ªï¸At the same time, the operation of the Russian Armed Forces to de-occupy the region continues. Russian troops are actively using UAVs and artillery to destroy the positions of the Ukrainian Armed Forces in the part of the Kursk region they occupy.â–ªï¸Also, units of the Russian Armed Forces are gradually squeezing out Ukrainian formations from the Sudzhansky district. On the southern flank, attack aircraft crushed the positions of the Ukrainian Armed Forces in Cherkasy Konopelka and gained a foothold in the center of the village.#video #digest #map #Russia #Ukraine@rybarSupport us Video is too big

Description: ğŸ‡®ğŸ‡±ğŸ‡µğŸ‡¸ Aggravation in the Israeli-Palestinian conflict zone chronicle of events for December 29, 2024 In the north of the Gaza Strip, Israeli troops launched another series of attacks on the capital of the Palestinian enclave and satellite cities. Title: ğŸ‡¸ğŸ‡¾ğŸ´ Continuation of Al-Julaniâ€™s speeches: how does he see the ...
Description: ğŸ‡¸ğŸ‡¾ğŸ´ Continuation of Al-Julaniâ€™s speeches: how does he see the future of Syria? The head of Hayat Tahrir al-Sham, a terrorist organization still recognized in the Russian Federation, Abu Muhammad al-Julani (now called Ahmad al-Sharaa) shared his opinion during his next speech about the current state of affairs in Syria and prospects for further development. â–ªï¸He paid significant attention to the previously announced democratization of the country: according to him, writing a new Constitution could take about three years, while organizing elections will take about four years. At the same time, a general population census will be conducted before the electoral process. â–ªï¸As for the possibility of dissolving HTS, Abu Muhammad al-Julani confirmed these intentions and stated that this would be announced at the national dialogue conference. At the same time, the groupâ€™s units should be part of the new Syrian army.â–ªï¸He did not leave without comment the worsening repressions and protests of the population in the country - according to the leader of HTS, they are not so massive in comparison with the scale of the crisis, and he blamed the previous administration for all the discontent , which is allegedly to blame for the disagreements in Syrian society. â–ªï¸It was proposed to resolve the crisis in northeast Syria through negotiations with representatives of the Arab-Kurdish association -Syrian Democratic Forces- (SDF), which are planned to be subordinated to the Ministry of Defense. The Kurds, according to Al-Julani, are an integral part of the country.â–ªï¸As â€‹â€‹part of international interaction, gratitude was expressed to Saudi Arabia for the support provided, and hopes were also expressed for the lifting of sanctions on Syria (yes, the Caesar Act is still in effect) by the new US administration in led by Donald Trump. An important role was also assigned to Russia, with which, according to the head of HTS, there are strategic interests. ğŸ“Œ The new Syrian governmentâ€™s main tasks at the moment are maintaining its position and legitimizing. For this purpose, the same Abu Muhammad al-Julani almost regularly gives out all kinds of interviews to Western media, intensively whitening both his reputation and that of the entire group. It is worth noting that this process is hampered by the rampant radical groups formally subordinate to HTS. Jihadists, contrary to the public orders of their brothers in Damascus, organize field executions of Alawites and destroy Christian and Shiite shrines - this does not look very much like religious diversity. It is not surprising that an attempt to find contact with all parties is vital for the -New Syria - stabilization of the situation and infusion money into her budget. And there is simply neither the strength nor the resources to participate in new conflicts with both external actors and internal players - the Israelis continue to actively participate in the destruction of the latter. Just look at the sharply changed view of the new administration on the role of Russia: until recently, Russian troops in Syria were called -occupiers-, but now the leadership of the militants is actually openly talking about their readiness to reconsider their attitude. However, you definitely shouldnâ€™t rely on their imaginary sincerity.#Syria #terrorism@rybarSupport usTelegramRybarğŸ‡®ğŸ‡±ğŸ‡¸ğŸ‡¾ğŸ‡¹ğŸ‡· About the Syrian -300,000-strong army - The formation of a new Syrian state continues. Title: ğŸ–¼ ğŸ‡µğŸ‡°ğŸ´ Protests in Pakistan as a harbinger of coming chaos in ...
Description: ğŸ‡µğŸ‡°ğŸ´ Protests in Pakistan as a harbinger of coming chaos in the country In addition to the words already said about the extremely deplorable terrorist situation in Pakistan, where a huge jump was recorded in 2024, and the authorities canâ€™t do anything about it, ethno-confessional split.â–â–â–â–â–â–â–â–â–â“At the end of November, we wrote that a terrorist attack occurred in the same Kurram district, which became the center of clashes with Afghanistan. Then, as a result of an attack by unknown persons, dozens of Shiites, who are the majority in this district, were killed. After this, a conflict broke out between Shiite and Sunni radicals, which led to the casualties of more than 100 people. To stabilize the situation, local authorities blocked the main highway Peshawar - Parachinar, which caused a collapse in the region. Over the past 2.5 months, more than 100 children have died in Parachinar due to lack of medical care and food. And the situation only got worse the other day when two Shiites were killed and beheaded.â–â–â–â–â–â–â–â–â–Against this backdrop, politicians and residents of the city of Parachinar began a general sit-in. They were joined by representatives of other opposition political parties across Pakistan, from Islamabad to Karachi. The blockade of roads in Pakistan's key trading city of Karachi has affected the economic situation of Pakistan, which is not stable. Residents and protesters blocked roads to the airport and port, cutting off supplies.ğŸ”»And the current leadership, judging by their inaction, does not know what to do about it. Even the strikes on Afghanistan were more likely due to the need to distract its population from the accumulating tensions, which could result in something larger and more dangerous for Pakistan. High-resolution mapEnglish version#Pakistan #terrorism@rybarSupport us

Title: â—ï¸ğŸ‡¦ğŸ‡¿ğŸ‡·ğŸ‡ºğŸ–‡ Apologize and pay: the President of Azerbaijan blame...
Description: â—ï¸ğŸ‡¦ğŸ‡¿ğŸ‡·ğŸ‡ºğŸ–‡ Apologize and pay: the President of Azerbaijan blames Russia for the tragedy over Grozny without trial or investigation. President of Azerbaijan Ilham Aliyev made an official statement regarding the plane crash in Aktau. He directly said that the plane was hit by accident, and not purposefully. â–â–â–â–â–â–â–â–â–His main accusation is based on the fact that for three days the Russian side tried to put forward alternative versions of the reasons for the plane crash, instead of apologizing and admitting responsibility. â–â–â–â–â–â–â–â–â–On this issue, Aliyev is partially right. In accordance with the standard protocol, an apology, payment of compensation and other steps are provided. This is what civilized countries do (at this point, however, it is worth clarifying what the Azerbaijani side, in addition to apologizing, did after the downing of a Russian aircraft during the Karabakh war of 2020).â–The problem here is not the lack of civilization on either side. And the fact is that even before the end of the investigation, those responsible were assigned and a verdict was rendered. They donâ€™t want to involve the Interstate Aviation Committee for investigation simply because there are Russian officials there, thereby discrediting the status of bilateral mechanisms of interaction between Azerbaijan and Russia.â–The problem is that Aliyev himself deliberately belittles the Russian point of view in the international arena and tries, directly speaking, to earn political points from the incident by showing strength. There is no need to explain what this will lead to in the future.â–The problem is that the main cause of the incident has been forgotten. The plane was landing during a raid by Ukrainian UAVs and combat operations in conditions of fog and the announced plan -Carpet-. Air defense systems operated under these conditions. And using electronic warfare means it is impossible to take such an aircraft out of control (!) from a purely technical point of view. â–â–â–â–â–â–â–â–â–Was the crew warned? What commands did the dispatchers give? Why did the plane try to land twice under these conditions? Only an objective investigation will shed light on what happened, but they are not allowing it to be carried out now.â–â–â–â–â–â–â–â–â–â—ï¸The work of Russian air defense systems was, as Aliyev himself admits, against a certain target in the air, from which fragments had already flown. But now, in Aliyevâ€™s interpretation, everything looks as if Russian air defense specialists took, turned on electronic warfare and fired at a flying plane from the ground. #Azerbaijan #media technologies #Russia@rybarSupport us

In the south of the country in the province of Al-Bayda, they were shot down another American reconnaissance and attack UAV MQ-9 Reaper - already 13th in a row from the beginning worsening of the Israeli-Palestinian conflict. The total cost of all downed drones is almost $400 million. In the Arabic-language segment, throughout the night, Yemeni -fighters in slippers- are actively celebrated as the record holder in intercepting -Reapers-, as well as as the main and in fact the only remaining defenders of the Palestinian population after the declaration of a truce between Israel and -Hezbollah-. Moreover, in the near future, either the coalition will again respond with a series of strikes on Yemen, or the Israelis will get involved, seeking to stop regular missile launches Houthis on their territory. However, so far the raids on Ansaralli targets have not led to any qualitative results. High resolution mapEnglish version#Yemen #USA@rybarSupport us

Title: ğŸ–¼ ğŸ‡°ğŸ‡¿ğŸ‡¹ğŸ‡· Who and why is building an aircraft repair center in ...
Description: ğŸ‡°ğŸ‡¿ğŸ‡¹ğŸ‡· Who and why is building an aircraft repair center in Aktau Recently, the Minister of Transport of Kazakhstan, Marat Karabaev, made a statement: Turkish companies YDA, Turkish Technic and ASFAT plan to create a maintenance and repair center for aircraft - both civil and military - on the territory of the airport in Aktau . ğŸ”»Collaboration with companies affiliated with the Turkish Ministry of Defense is presented by the head of the Ministry of Transport of the Republic of Kazakhstan as a step towards turning the countryâ€™s airport close to Europe into a multimodal aviation hub with an annual airport turnover of 520 billion tenge (more than a billion dollars).â–ªï¸This is interesting: last summer the same Karabaev (then Minister of Industry and Infrastructure Development) attempted to transfer 85% of the shares the Kazakh shipyard - Zenit - the already mentioned YDA and the defense company ASFAT. And also under the plausible pretext of future benefits.â–ªï¸According to Karabaevâ€™s scheme, 85% of Zenit was given to the Turks in exchange for investments in the construction of a shipyard in the Caspian Sea. The state, which previously owned 100% of Zenit, was left with only 15% of the shares. Despite the resistance of the plant management and the obvious contradiction with the interests of the state, the government of the Republic of Kazakhstan pushed through this decision.â–â–â–â–â–â–â–â–ğŸ”»In both cases, after contacts with the management of Turkish companies, Karabaev simply finds a justification, not even directly related to project (like a shipyard with a factory and an air hub with maintenance of military aircraft), after which Turkish enterprises receive for their use what they liked it in Kazakhstan. So Karabaev can be called a lobbyist for Turkish interests in Kazakhstan. And itâ€™s interesting that no one opposes his activities. We will monitor the development of the situation around the airport, but so far the prospects look far from rosy. High resolution infographicsEnglish version#Kazakhstan #TÃ¼rkiye@rybarSupport us

Title: ğŸ‡¸ğŸ‡³ğŸ‡«ğŸ‡· Another -anti-colonial- attacks in Senegal Prime Ministe...
Description: ğŸ‡¸ğŸ‡³ğŸ‡«ğŸ‡· Another -anti-colonial-attacks in SenegalPrime Minister of Senegal Ousmane Sonko at a recent press conference announced the closure of foreign military bases in the country. This mainly concerns the French contingent of 300 people. In addition, there were intentions to abandon the CFA franc and create a single currency for ECOWAS. ğŸ“ŒAs we wrote earlier, the abandonment of military bases is fully consistent with the French strategy to reduce the military presence in Africa. The French defense budget is too bloated, and the economic benefits of bases in Africa are not so clear, especially since the more important levers of influence over Senegal remain in the hands of the authorities in Paris. These are both transnational companies such as Orano, and personal connections of politicians with members of the government of an African country.â–ªï¸Based on this, it is impossible to imagine how the refusal to use the CFA franc will go. The loss of such a convenient tool is clearly not in the plans of the French authorities. Moreover, abandoning it is a protracted matter, as the experience of the Alliance of Sahel States, which have been trying to move away from it for the last few years, shows.â–ªï¸And to say that French instructors will certainly be replaced by Russian ones is, for now, extremely premature. In recent years, the Americans have been conducting many exercises and military initiatives with the Senegalese authorities. As an example, since 2019, a special forces training center has been opened in Thies, where about 20 American military personnel are constantly stationed. About 400 people graduate from it every year, who make up the elite units of the army. Needless to say, there are no plans to close this military facility?â–â–â–â–â–â–â–â–ğŸ”»So no matter how critically Senegalese leaders turn to the West, they will continue to be dependent on the influence of Paris and Washington. Until we ourselves begin to consistently advance our own interests.#Africa #Senegal@rybarSupport usAP NewsSenegal says it's closing 'all foreign military bases,' a move aimed at French troops in the countrySenegal's prime minister has announced the closure of -all foreign military bases- in the country, a statement essentially aimed at France, the African nation's former colonial ruler.

Title: ğŸ¬ğŸ–¼ ğŸ‡°ğŸ‡· A plane of the budget airline Jeju Air crashed in South...
Description: ğŸ‡°ğŸ‡· A low-cost airline Jeju Air plane crashed in South Korea, with 181 people on board. According to preliminary data, 120 of them are considered dead. The fate of several dozen more is still unclear; the condition of the two surviving crew members is assessed as positive. There were no Russians registered on this flight. The plane crash occurred during the landing of a Boeing 737-800 at a South Korean airport. One of the voiced versions is called problems with extending the landing gear after a collision with a flock of birds, as a result of which the plane was unable to slow down as normal upon landing. Having rolled off the runway, the ship caught fire when it hit a fence. The airline reported that the aircraft had been operated without problems for 15 years. At the moment, a group has been created to provide assistance to the families of the victims; an investigation into all the circumstances of the incident will be launched in the near future.#SouthKorea@rybarSupport us

Title: ğŸ¬ğŸ–¼ ğŸ‡¬ğŸ‡ªğŸ‡ªğŸ‡º A month of protests in Georgia - what the oppositio...
Description: ğŸ‡¬ğŸ‡ªğŸ‡ªğŸ‡º A month of protests in Georgia - what the opposition (not) achieved Yesterday, December 28, was a significant date for the Georgian opposition. For a month now, supporters of pro-Western European integration have been holding protests. First there was disagreement with the parliamentary elections, then with the suspension of the process of accession to the EU, and then with the presidential elections.â–â–â–â–â–â–â–â–â–In honor of this, an action was held in Georgia - Chain of Unity - which was held in Tbilisi, Batumi, Kutaisi, Rustavi and Gori. That is, citizens of Georgia, opposing everything that is not connected with the European Union, took to the streets and joined hands together, forming a chain. From a PR point of view, the action looked beautiful, the Georgians filmed videos that spread around the Internet, but, perhaps, thatâ€™s all ended. At 15.00 everyone announced this, and the protests ended. Until the morning of December 29, none of the major opposition publications practically reviewed the events in Georgia.â—ï¸At 9 am today, a new speech by the opposition was announced in front of the parliament building and the presidential residence due to the fact that today the term of office of President Salome Zurabishvili, who remained spend the night at the residence. However, now there is almost no one on the streets. Only at 10, people began to appear, and the meeting was moved to 11 oâ€™clock - the time of the inauguration of the new president, Mikheil Kavelashvili. Now the protesters are Zurabishvili, who previously refused to leave her post.â–â–â–â–â–â–â–â–â–Attention has been focused on Zurabishvili for a reason. She said she would give new instructions on how to proceed. At the same time, the ruling party noted that if Zurabishvili does not leave the residence today, then she will face criminal prosecution.#Georgia #EU@rybarSupport us

Title: ğŸ” Start above â–ªï¸ An important element at the front is the advanc...
Description: Forwarded From Two MajorsStart above â–ªï¸ An important element at the front is the advanced experience in the Kurakhovsky and Pokrovsky directions, when the enemy -elephant is eaten piece by piece-. Cutting off village after village from supplies, our troops take populated areas, then closing their pockets and leveling the front. Only the Russian Army and the Armed Forces of Ukraine have experience of real modern combat operations on a wide front, but are being carefully studied by NATO countries.â–ªï¸ Europe continues military preparations and direct aggressive actions against Russia. The expected arrival of the new capitalist Fuhrer in the Washington Reich Chancellery only marks the triumph of the dictatorship of the most reactionary, chauvinistic, imperialist elements of financial capital in the world economic system, which determines the upcoming predicted events after January 20, 2025.âœ¨ Thus, the past year has allowed the Russian Army to turn the corner with the hardest efforts stagnation and defensive nature of the actions of our troops at the front and begin to really grind down the defensive potential of Kyiv throughout the depths of enemy territory. The main military operations of the North Military District are taking place on the constitutional territory of Russia, with the exception of the Kupyansky and Krasnolimansky directions, as well as the penetration of our troops into Volchansk, Kharkov region, where the group of troops - North - has been conducting positional battles for many months, having failed to complete the task of the Supreme Commander to shift the LBS from the Belgorod region. The heroic defense of the Kursk region will continue in 2025 until the enemy is completely expelled from our old territory, but the enemy is making maximum human and technical resources to retain the occupied lands. Politically, it is extremely likely that Trumpâ€™s arrival in the White House will simply shift the economic burdens of the war onto the shoulders of Europe, and the latest movements of the retiring Biden are still strengthening Kyivâ€™s position on the battlefield, incl. providing funds for operations in maritime spaces. The summary was compiled by: Two majors

Title: ğŸ” #Review #Summary for the morning of December 29, 2024 â–ªï¸ On th...
Description: Forwarded From Two Majors #Review #Summary for the morning of December 29, 2024â–ªï¸ On the foreign policy circuit, the situation was characterized by a complete collapse of even the external signs of former European diplomacy. The relationship between Zelensky and Eastern Europe resembles public squabbles between pubescent young people rather than dialogues between state leaders. The Pashinyan-Lukashenko track is also not distinguished by politeness, but here we are pleased with the leader of Belarus, politely but firmly showing the traitor Pashinyan his place. Bloggers, accustomed to the theses of the most reactionary part of the ruling class of Russia, in vain scolded (mainly from abroad) the Supreme Commander for his public apology to Azerbaijan in view of the tragedy with the plane, which was probably damaged over Chechnya. Russia's practice of public politeness is an absolutely normal element of international relations. Well, the information case of Kadyrovâ€™s security forces has once again cracked. In general, the year ends with a confident drift of the Anglo-Sancon and Russian worlds towards a global conflict, where the use of tactical nuclear weapons risks entering into everyday front-line reports. Escalation is also beneficial for the Kyiv junta, which has planned yet another provocation against Russiaâ€™s nuclear facilities, which, according to Zelensky, will have to break the last seals from the arms boxes and drag the planet into a new direct world conflict, where everyone will forget the mistakes of the former KVN member.â–ªï¸ In fact, Only the Russian Army, taking territory kilometer by kilometer in the most difficult offensive battles, forms a real agenda of world diplomacy. The defensive potential of Ukraine is gradually being worn down and determines the enemy juntaâ€™s public statements about negotiations and security guarantees for the remaining part of the former Ukrainian SSR. However, the limits of Russiaâ€™s capabilities were outlined to the military command by the Supreme Commander last week: a third of the state budget (adopted for three years) will be spent on law enforcement agencies, so Belousovâ€™s department will have to significantly increase the efficiency of spending peopleâ€™s money and continue the fight against bribe-takers, who continue to be tried according to the laws of peacetime. Further build-up of military and military-economic capabilities is associated with a total mobilization of the population and enterprises, which, for obvious reasons, will harm Russiaâ€™s internal political stability. While the front is being replenished with Russian volunteers, which is carefully hidden by Kyiv and Western propaganda (behind the cordon they really think that numerous videos with -busification- were filmed in Russia and not in Ukraine).â–ªï¸ On the front line, the Russian Army continues to maintain a strategic initiative, while all Offensive actions are at most tactical or operational-tactical in nature. Due to the changed technological structure of war and the unresolved issue of an antidote to the ubiquitous enemy drones on the battlefield, deep breakthroughs in columns are a thing of the past. -Small Sky,- write front-line soldiers from all sectors, is still behind the enemy, although the Russian Armed Forces have multiplied the systemic and volunteer supply of UAVs of all types to the troops. There are not enough drones in the same Kamensky direction of the Zaporozhye Front, where the enemy has intensified counter actions to pin down our forces in the neighboring Orekhovsky direction.â–ªï¸ The mutual losses of the former Ukrainian SSR and RSFSR voiced by Moscow and Kiev are more informational than objective in nature. At the same time, the Russian defense department, in assessing the number of incapacitated enemies, also does not divide losses into killed or maimed soldiers and officers of the Armed Forces of Ukraine, and official statements of the Ministry of Defense about the total losses of Kyiv in people and equipment are no longer used by any serious analytical center. The bravura statements from the times of Shoigu and Tsalikov formed an extremely inconvenient basis for calculations for Konashenov. Cutting off village after village from supplies, our troops take populated areas, after which closing their pockets...

At the press conference, he also touched upon the topics of joint mining and exploration of mineral resources. Perhaps somewhere there is still an understanding that it is difficult to keep the country in the orbit of influence on military-technical cooperation alone. Title: ğŸ–¼ ğŸ‡·ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¦ Chronicle of a special military operation for Decembe...
Description: ğŸ‡·ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¦ Chronicle of a special military operation on December 28, 2024. Ukrainian formations carried out another UAV launch in Russian regions: air defense systems worked in Rostov, Voronezh and other border regions, as well as in the Republic of Crimea. In turn, Russian troops worked in the Odessa region and Nikolaev. In the Liman direction, Ukrainian formations attacked the positions of the Russian Armed Forces in Novoegorovka - fighting is taking place in the village. To the south, Russian units advanced from the Shirokiy Ravine gully towards Ternov, occupying the Laptev Yar. In the Seversky direction, a Russian armored group successfully landed troops in a forest belt south of Vyemka. Meanwhile, at the Belogorovka-Verkhnekamenskoye line, the usual positional battles continue. In the Aleksandro-Kalinovsky direction, assault groups of the Russian Armed Forces expanded the zone of control in the central and southwestern parts of Dzerzhinsk. In the north-east of the city there are battles in the vicinity of the House of Culture of the Toretskaya mine. In the Pokrovsky direction, Russian troops liberated Shevchenko and advanced along the railway line to the Chunishino station. To the south, Novoolenovka and the eastern outskirts of Novoyelizavetovka came under the control of the RF Armed Forces. Fighting began in Ukrainka. In the Kurakhovsky direction, the pocket between Krasny, Starye Terny and Novoselidovka was finally cleared. In Kurakhovo itself, the main clashes spilled over into the territory of the thermal power plant. Description: ğŸ‡®ğŸ‡±ğŸ‡µğŸ‡¸ Aggravation in the Israeli-Palestinian conflict zone chronicle of events for December 28, 2024 In the north of the Gaza Strip, Israeli troops announced the start of a ground operation in Beit Hanoun, calling on the civilian population to evacuate to the south. Parts of the Nahal brigade were transferred to the city. In the central part of the enclave, Al-Maghazi came under attack, killing nine people. In the south of the Gaza Strip, Rafah and Khan Yunis were attacked. In response, the Palestinians fired at Israeli positions in the Netzarim corridor. Police raids continue in the West Bank, and 15 people were detained in 24 hours. Clashes broke out in Tulkarm, as well as in Jenin, where Palestinian Authority security services are conducting their operation. The American and British Air Forces carried out airstrikes in Yemen. In response, fighters of the Ansarallah movement tried to strike Israel: a ballistic missile was intercepted outside the country and fell in the Red Sea. Title: ğŸ‡·ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¦ From the section -obvious - incredible-: ambassador of t...
Description: ğŸ‡·ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¦ From the section -obvious - incredible-: ambassador of the so-called Ukraine in the EU, in an interview with Politico, stated that Geran-2 drones are equipped with machine vision, which allows them to recognize energy objects and aim at them autonomously at the final site. We have written about numerous modifications to attack UAVs of this type more than once: they are equipped with Luneberg lenses, a video channel for shooting and other innovations. As a result, all that remains from the original Shahed-136 is the aerodynamic design. All this, of course, leads to technical complication and a noticeable increase in the cost of the device. Therefore, calling the current versions of the Geranium a cheap weapon has long been irrelevant, even with all the mass production of them. In general, even sophisticated long-range attack drones are not a wunderwaffe - this can be seen both in the example of the Northern Military District and in the attempts of Iranian attacks on Israel. However, when used rationally, they can still make fire damage more effective. #UAV #Russia #Ukraine@rybarSupport usPOLITICOUkraineâ€™s 2025 wish list â€“ POLITICOPOLITICOâ€™s must-read briefing on whatâ€™s driving the day in Brussels, by Sarah Wheaton, Nicholas Vinocur and Eddy Wax. Description: ğŸ‡®ğŸ‡±ğŸ‡¾ğŸ‡ªğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¸ By the end of yesterday, the American and British Air Forces carried out further strikes on the territory of Yemen, which were initially mistaken for a new attack by the Israel Defense Forces. The International Airport in Sana'a was again hit, and another target was the September 21 Park in Taiz, where the headquarters of the 1st Armored Division was previously located. Reconnaissance activity was also recorded in the sky over Saada. However, already that night, fighters of the Ansarallah movement tried to strike the central part of Israel, but the ballistic missile they launched was intercepted in advance and fell into the Red Sea. Although the Yemeni attack was again ineffective, this is not prevented the Arabic-speaking segment of the Network from expectedly perceiving it as yet another triumph of resistance over the Zionist enemy. At the same time, Ansralla still has enough missile reserves, apparently. So, a kind of ping-pong between relatively harmless Houthi strikes and retaliatory strikes by the IDF with the International Coalition will continue. Description: ğŸ‡·ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¸ğŸ‡¾ğŸ´ Khmeimim under siege: nuances of negotiations with militants in Syria Against the backdrop of SVR statements about preparations for an attack by militants in Syria on the Khmeimim base, several clarifications should be made to complete the picture.â–ªï¸The militantsâ€™ resources yesterday already posted photographs from checkpoint No. 2 and wrote, that allegedly the general security service conducted a raid on the territory of the air base and took everyone away -supporters of the regime-hiding there. Description: Rybar: ğŸ‡·ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¦ğŸ–‡ As part of the fight against telephone terrorism and fraud, the government has banned calls via the Internet to telephones. According to the statement, the decision will significantly limit the opportunities for this type of crime. In a publication about the wave of arson in Russian cities, we wrote that one of the ways to combat this phenomenon is to limit traffic from the territory controlled by the Kyiv regime. The current measure partially implements this scenario. Yes, the ban on IP telephony will in some way complicate the work of businesses and various services. However, the situation with telephone fraud, apparently, has already reached such a stage that they decided to deal with it radically and according to the principle -better late than never.- Be that as it may, at some point the time will come for the next stage combating this phenomenon, namely the physical damage to Ukrainian call centers. The location of some of which, by the way, has long been known.#Russia #Ukraine@rybarSupport usgovernment.ruThe government approved a resolution to limit telephone fraudResolution No. 1898 of December 26, 2024

Title: ğŸ–¼ ğŸ‡¸ğŸ‡¾ğŸ´ The situation in northern Syria: Fighting at the Tishri...
Description: ğŸ‡¸ğŸ‡¾ğŸ´ Situation in northern Syria: Fighting near the Tishrin Dam, increased terrorist activity in Deir ez-Zor as of 12:00 on December 28, 2024. Fighting continues in the northeast of Syria in the area of â€‹â€‹the Tishrin Dam. Pro-Kurdish sources from time to time report an expansion of the zone of control between Karakozak and Tishrin. However, this information has not yet been confirmed in the form of objective control footage. In turn, the Kurds report on the successes and destruction of dozens of militants. At the same time, the footage appearing online allows us to assume that so far they have actually been able to relatively successfully contain the attacks of the SNA militants, and they, in turn, have not yet begun to attack in earnest.â—ï¸The fact is that on the territory of Syria, on the eastern bank of the Euphrates, in this area there are only two bridges, which are under the fire control of the Kurdish formations and, accordingly, would be extremely difficult to pass even for heavy mechanized units with support armored vehicles, not to mention militants, and even Turkish air support cannot play a role in this case.â–ªï¸Accordingly, there are essentially two options for developing the situation. Either Turkey sends troops into the territory of Syria and advances from Menbij to the east, suffering losses in the operation to cross the Euphrates.â–ªï¸Or, as will most likely happen, the operation will begin from Surudj, where Turkish troops have been pulling reinforcements for several days immediately before the start of the offensive Militants from the Syrian National Army will be transferred there. And there may be someone who wants to participate from among the so-called Hayat Tahir Ash Sham, after which the operation in northern Syria will begin. Another question is that Erdogan knows how to wait.â—ï¸ Moreover, one must understand that actions in this region will require Turkey to have great coordination with the United States, since there are a large number of American bases in the territories occupied by the Kurds. And if earlier their presence was beneficial from the point of view that Assadâ€™s forces would not enter the territory, now the United States is already interfering with the Turks.â–ªï¸Terrorist activity is growing in the province of Deir ez-Zor east of the Euphrates. According to Kurdish media, the number of attacks on . The Kurds, naturally, claim that it is IS that is attacking the transports of Kurdish forces. And from the western bank of the Euphrates, unknown persons fired at the water tower in Diban.â—ï¸Reports about the increase in terrorist activity may serve two purposes - this is both a justification for increasing the US presence in the region, and a reason to accuse the new Syrian authorities of collaborating with ISIS. Title: ğŸ‡¨ğŸ‡³ğŸ‡¯ğŸ‡µ Why China and Japan are restoring diplomatic relations C...
Description: ğŸ‡¨ğŸ‡³ğŸ‡¯ğŸ‡µ Why China and Japan are restoring diplomatic relations China and Japan continue to work to improve ties. This week, the two foreign ministers met in Beijing to discuss both problems in bilateral relations and opportunities to take the partnership to a more friendly level. â–ªï¸The Japanese side, for example, announced a relaxation of requirements for issuing visas to a certain group of Chinese tourists. This was in response to identical but broader measures taken recently by the Chinese authorities. â–ªï¸In addition, Beijing once again confirmed plans to lift the ban on the import of seafood caught in Japanese waters. It was introduced back in 2023 against the backdrop of water discharge from the Fukushima nuclear power plant. ğŸ“ŒBy the way, it can be assumed that the introduction of the ban was initially a purely political decision on Chinaâ€™s part, in order to, at the right opportunity, terminate its abolition for some concessions from Japan. â–ªï¸It is important to understand that efforts to restore relations between Beijing and Tokyo intensified almost immediately after the elections in Japan. There has been recent speculation in local media that the Chinese view the new Japanese administration as less pro-American. â–ªï¸It is alleged that the policies of former Prime Minister Fumio Kishida were considered too irritating for China. The new cabinet gives more hope for the return of normal dialogue. ğŸ”»However, all this is only one side of the issue. Perhaps the return of Donald Trump to the White House plays a significant role in attempts to improve relations. It could create problems for both China and Japan, so it is now beneficial for the parties to restore ties to resolve upcoming challenges. It is not clear how long the initiative will be enough and whether attempts to regulate the dialogue will lead to something more significant. #China #Japan @rybar together with @awaken_dragonSupport usKyodo News+Japan to ease visa requirements, agrees on top China diplomat visitJapan and China on continue efforts to improve bilateral ties, with Japanese Foreign Minister Takeshi Iwaya outlining a plan to ease visa requirements for Chinese tourists and agreeing on an early visit to Japan by top Chinese diplomat Wang Yi.

Title: ğŸ” #Summary for the morning of December 28, 2024 â–ªï¸ At night in t...
Description: Forwarded From Two Majors#Report for the morning of December 28, 2024â–ªï¸ At night, more than ten UAVs were discovered and destroyed in the suburbs of Voronezh and in several districts of the region. In one of the areas, when debris from a drone fell, the contact network on the railway was broken, a special headquarters of the South-Eastern Railway was created to eliminate the consequences.â–ªï¸ 17 UAVs were destroyed and suppressed over the Rostov region, including an attack repelled in Kamensk, Novoshakhtinsk, and Rodionovo -Nesvetaysky, Ust-Donetsk, Krasnosulinsky districts.â–ªï¸ In Kursk region, the enemy launched eight counterattacks during the day, reports the North group of troops. As a result of counter actions, the Russian Armed Forces advanced in the vicinity of Nikolaevo-Daryino and Maryevka, as well as in the forest belts of the Sudzhansky district. During the day, three enemy missiles were shot down over the region.â–ªï¸ Fighting continues in Toretsk (Dzerzhinsk). There are reports of fighting to the west of the Tsentralnaya mine, the Central Market and in the area of â€‹â€‹the Avangard stadium. â–ªï¸ In the Krasnolimansky direction, the liberation of Ivanovka on the western bank of the river was officially confirmed. Stallion. In fact, the Russian Armed Forces went west instead of the ongoing advances expected by the enemy to the south, towards Terny.â–ªï¸ In the Pokrovsky (Krasnoarmeisky) direction west of Sontsovka, our troops advanced further and occupied the settlement. Ukrainian, which is also recognized by enemy channels. â–ªï¸ In the Vremevsky direction, the Russian Armed Forces are trying to block the highway connecting Velikaya (Bolshaya) Novoselka with Gulyai-Polye.â–ªï¸ In the Belgorod region at night in the village of Palatovo, two citizens were injured as a result of the detonation of a drone. Another drone hit the village of Verkhososna. As a result of the attack, a power line was damaged. In the evening, the village of Borisovka, Volokonovsky district, was attacked by two kamikaze drones, two civilians were wounded. The second drone detonated in the administrative building. In the Shebekinsky district in the village of Murom, a UAV attacked a moving car. The driver was injured. In the village of Novaya Tavolzhanka, an FPV drone attacked a private home. Arrival in the village Malinovka, Belgorod district In the village of Gruzskoye, Borisov district, a parked bus was damaged as a result of a drone attack on the territory of an agricultural enterprise. Yesterday in the first half of the day, a UAV of the Ukrainian Armed Forces attacked the territory of a school in the village of Borisovka.â–ªï¸ In the DPR in the village. Gorlovka as a result of an IED being dropped from a UAV of the Ukrainian Armed Forces on the street. Bagration, a man born in 1991 was killed, a man born in 1987 was injured. and a woman born in 1994. The summary was compiled by: Two majors Telegram Two majors Kursk region, Olgovka Let's drive out the Nazis and rebuild the villages. âœ¨Work, Brothers! Two majors

Description: â—ï¸ğŸ‡®ğŸ‡±ğŸ‡µğŸ‡¸ğŸ Chronicle of the Israeli-Palestinian conflict: events of the week of December 21 â€“ 27, 2024â–ªï¸Israeli troops continue to conduct operations in the north of the Gaza Strip in several satellite cities. Engineering work is underway in the Az-Zeytoun area. In turn, the Palestinians stage attacks. Sometimes Hamas snipers manage to shoot an Israeli soldier. â–ªï¸South of the Netzarim corridor, the Israelis also strike Nuseirat and the surrounding area from time to time. In response, the Palestinians occasionally fire at Israeli positions with mortars or launch makeshift rockets.â–ªï¸In the south of the Gaza Strip, Israeli troops continue to strengthen the Philadelphia Corridor and conduct raids. Palestinians consistently report civilian deaths. â–ªï¸Another target is often the Al-Mawasi camp, formally declared by the IDF -Safe Zone-. In fact, Israeli drones strike there from time to time, after which there are reports of the liquidation of Hamas members. â–ªï¸Israeli police operations are taking their course in the West Bank. Palestinians are detained, sometimes in large numbers. The majority, however, are released after filtration events, during which the prisoners are beaten.â–ªï¸Clashes often break out during operations. In small settlements, Palestinian youth throw stones at armored cars. And in large populated areas, such as Nablus, Jenin and Tulkarm, sometimes quite large-scale firefights take place.â–ªï¸In particular, several large operations took place in Tulkarm, some of which lasted over a day. During one of these, a UAV strike killed several members of the local Hamas faction.#video #digest #map #Israel #Palestine@rybarSupport us Video is too big

Description: ğŸ‡·ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¦ğŸ‡¿ In addition to the revelations of Azerbaijani representatives regarding the plane crash in Aktau, we would like to record several important thoughts. â–â–â–â–â–â–â–â–So, one of the former Azerbaijani officials, who is now working in the interests of so-called Ukraine (and before that he worked in Europe and the USA), told many details that were essentially already known, but now this can be called a confirmation:â–Azerbaijan in its current form is not our friend or brother, as it is usually promoted in some lobbying political circles in Russia along with Turkey. Title: â—ï¸ğŸ‡¦ğŸ‡¿ğŸ‡·ğŸ‡ºğŸ–‡ Public conflict between Azerbaijan and Russia over t...
Description: â—ï¸ğŸ‡¦ğŸ‡¿ğŸ‡·ğŸ‡ºğŸ–‡ The public conflict between Azerbaijan and Russia over the tragedy with the Baku-Grozny flight is gaining momentum. Azerbaijani politicians and representatives of the blogosphere, who over the past year have been insisting that Azerbaijan is Russiaâ€™s most loyal ally, suddenly changed their shoes and began to echo American theses. The point is not even that official conclusions based on the results of the investigation have not yet been made. The fact is that the collective West, which was not allowed to participate in the investigation, has already rushed, in the person of the United States, to blame Russia for everything, causing hysteria among carriers around the world. â–â–â–â–â–â–Not one of the officials in the West mentions the fact that it was Ukrainian drones that became a threat, that at the time the plane landed, the Carpet plan was introduced, about which all pilots are notified about poor visibility and fog, about that GPS jamming may affect the display of the aircraft's tracking, but not its visibility on all radars. â–â–â–â–â–â–At the same time, in the Azerbaijani media field they not only accused the Russian Ministry of Foreign Affairs of falsifying facts and trying to -cover up the traces of the investigation- and -reach an agreement-, they are also directly trying to incite an internal Russian conflict, calling Kadyrov a prince and provoking Chechnya to public actions.ğŸ“ŒAll this is now spreading the world's information dumps and information war organs in order to demonstrate the inadequacy of Russia's behavior. World carriers, in the wake of a coordinated attack, are beginning to cancel flights to the Russian Caucasus, blaming Russia for this and forgetting that at the time of the tragedy in Chechnya, an attack was carried out by Ukrainian UAVs. Authorities Chechnya reported the day before that, on instructions from Ramzan Kadyrov, they were ready to provide financial and other assistance to all the families of those killed and injured in the crash of an AZAL plane flying from Baku to Grozny. -Azerbaijanâ€¦

Title: ğŸ–¼ ğŸ‡·ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¦ Kupyansko-Svatovskoe direction: the situation in the ...
Description: ğŸ‡·ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¦ Kupyansko-Svatovsk direction: the situation in the Kupyansk area and the advance of Russian troops in Zagryzovo situation as of 20:00 on December 27, 2024 In the Kupyansko-Svatovsk direction, the offensive of Russian troops on the left bank of Oskol continues. Over the past days, Russian troops have managed to achieve significant successes in Zagryzovo and approach the northern outskirts of Boguslavka. â–ªï¸A tense situation has developed on the northeastern approaches to Kupyansk. Thanks to the geolocation of received videos from the site, it was possible to establish that some time ago the Russian Armed Forces retreated from the city to fortified positions north of Petropavlovka. â—ï¸Probably, such a decision is related to problems with supplying assault units in conditions of enemy UAV activity and the use of additional reserves. There were no reports of new attempts by the Russian Armed Forces to enter the outskirts of the city. â–ªï¸Fierce fighting in Zagryzovo has been going on for more than a week. Earlier, attack aircraft of the Russian Armed Forces occupied the northern and central parts of the village during the assault, pushing the enemy back to the southern outskirts. â–ªï¸Today, the Russian Ministry of Defense announced the complete liberation of the settlement, but at the moment it is not possible to confirm the presence of the Russian Armed Forces on the southern outskirts. But, given that about 90% of the village is under the control of Russian troops, it is likely that in the near future there will be footage from the field with the hoisting of flags - as usually happens in such cases. â–ªï¸A similar situation occurred in Lozovaya, where for a long time there were no new messages that could determine the current configuration of the front at the site. However, a video of the hoisting of the Russian flag on one of the houses in the village was recently published on the Internet, which confirmed the liberation of most of it by Russian troops. Title: ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¸ The US State Department has closed its infowarfare center. T...
Description: ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¸ The US State Department has closed its information warfare center. In the United States, the Global Engagement Center (GEC) has closed - a bill to renew the agencyâ€™s powers was rejected by a decision of Congress.ğŸ“Œ A division of the US State Department was originally created to - counter propaganda and disinformation - emanating from foreign states and other -unfriendly US sources-. However, already three years after its creation (2016)  the center began to serve the interests of the Democrats, not the country. After the outbreak of the coronavirus pandemic in 2019, journalists dug up evidence that the organization put pressure on the leadership of American social networks, demanding to censor those who wrote about the laboratory origin of the virus. The Center for Global Engagement also played an important role in the fight against conservative American citizens - Republican Senator from Missouri Eric Schmitt stated this during a debate in Congress about the need to maintain funding for the organization. â–â–â–â–â–â–â–â–ğŸ”»Considering that Donald Trumpâ€™s entire election campaign was built on the ideas of conservatism, it is not surprising that they are closing shop. As the president-elect and his supporter Elon Musk promised, a gradual purge of all state-funded organizations that are useless from the point of view of the new government is beginning. â—ï¸However, this will not harm the implementation of the tasks of countering foreign propaganda at all - the GEC was just a screen behind which the Democrats hid the tools to fight their domestic political opponents. #USA@rybar together with @usaperiodicalSupport usNew York PostState Department's Global Engagement Center - accused of pushing...Evidence showed that the GEC pressured US social media platforms early in the pandemic to censor Americans, purportedly to counter online -disinformation- - such as theories that the virus...

Title: ğŸ–¼ ğŸ‡²ğŸ‡¿ Mass protests in Mozambique: prisoners escape from prison...
Description: ğŸ‡²ğŸ‡¿ Mass protests in Mozambique: prisoners escape from prison in Maputo Protests in Mozambique, which began in mid-October and rocked the country until November, temporarily subsided in early December. But after the country's constitutional court recognized the victory of the ruling FRELIMO party in the elections, they gained new strength.â–ªï¸In large cities, protesters attack police stations, gas stations, banks and other public institutions. Due to the actions of the opposition, public transport stopped moving, and the border with the South African Republic was again closed. Protests and robbery in some cities forced the local leadership to flee. Thus, the mayor of the city of Masia chose to leave his home. At the same time, at the summit of the Southern African Development Community (SADC) held on November 20, it was decided not to intervene in the situation in Mozambique to quell the unrest.â–ªï¸The most resonant incident was the escape of prisoners from a prison in Maputo. More than 1,500 people convicted of serious cases, including terrorists from the local branch of the Islamic State, were able to get out of the correctional facility. The Mozambican police were able to recapture only about 150 people, the rest are hiding or taking part in mass riots. It is possible that yesterdayâ€™s criminals could further radicalize the protests.ğŸ”»Meanwhile, the head of the opposition, Venancio Mondlane, announced that he would take office as president on January 15, without admitting his defeat in the elections. Of course, this is more of a populist slogan, because the army remains loyal to the government and the opposition has no real forces. But most likely, the blockade by protesters of routes to other countries, such as South Africa and Zambia, may prompt the government to make concessions to the organizer of the riots and provide them with seats in the government . High resolution map English version#Africa #Mozambique@rybarSupport us
