Title: ğŸ‡¦ğŸ‡² How is Pashinyan trying to shift responsibility for the surr...
Description: ğŸ‡¦ğŸ‡² How is Pashinyan trying to shift responsibility for the surrender of Artsakh? One of the symptoms of the deep political crisis in Armenia is Prime Minister Nikol Pashinyanâ€™s persistent attempts to call former leaders of the republic Robert Kocharyan and Serzh Sargsyan to debates. The topic is responsibility for the surrender of Nagorno-Karabakh.â–ªï¸Recently, Pashinyan said that since 1994, a negotiation process has allegedly been underway on the inclusion of Nagorno-Karabakh into Azerbaijan. Thus, the current prime minister tried to relieve himself of responsibility for the events of 2020. â–ªï¸The second President of Armenia Kocharyan and the third President Sargsyan reacted sharply to this, who noted that the history of negotiations on the topic of Karabakh was set out publicly, and after seizing power in 2018, Pashinyan took upon himself the responsibility to negotiate from -zero point-, which led to known result. â–ªï¸Sargsyan and Kocharyan refused further discussions. But why did Pashinyan suddenly need a public debate with his exes? The low ratings of the prime minister and his party - the Civil Contract - before the parliamentary elections require this very government to find new scapegoats and at least some antipodes to the current head of government. ğŸ”»An attempt to artificially stir up the topic of shifting responsibility for oneâ€™s failures precisely reflects the deep political crisis in Armenia. They are trying to sell the public the idea of â€‹â€‹peace with Azerbaijan, although among Armenians Azerbaijanophobia is off the charts, and the latest failures of the republic are obviously associated with the current government. ğŸ“Œ And here it is worth remembering the recent words of the President of the Russian Federation that blaming the CSTO for all the troubles is only a reflection of the internal political problems of Armenia. This statement, of course, caused outrage in Yerevan. Only now, for some reason, Prime Minister Pashinyan decided to find out which of the leaders of the republic is to blame, when the answer is already obvious to everyone. #Armenia #Azerbaijan #Artsakh @rybarSupport usTelegramMika Badalyanâ—Pashinyan really needs -ex-. Pashinyan is literally trying to drag Robert Kocharyan and Serzh Sargsyan into active politics by the ears, since his main argument - if not me, then only them - has stopped working due to , on the one hand, a complete lack of activity...

Title: ğŸ¬ ğŸ‡¸ğŸ‡´ Crisis in Jubaland: Battle for Dulou The crisis in Somali...
Description: ğŸ‡¸ğŸ‡´Crisis in Jubaland: Battle for DulouThe crisis in Somalia's Jubaland is gaining momentum. Only recently, negotiations on reconciliation between the authorities of Ethiopia and Somalia took place in Ankara, and steps are even being taken in this direction. At the same time, it is too early to talk about the end of the escalation - the Ethiopians still support the forces of local autonomy, which have refused to coordinate with the federal government.â–ªï¸ On December 23, the Ethiopian army, with the support of artillery and separatists from the Jubaland Dervish forces, attacked the Somali army in the border town of Dulou. As a result of the artillery strike, the national security building was damaged, and several military personnel were killed.â–ªï¸The city itself came under the control of the separatists, and the Somali Foreign Ministry condemned the actions of the Ethiopians. It is worth noting that just a few hours earlier, there was discussion of sending a Somali delegation to Addis Ababa to resolve relations. Despite the Turks' claim that they had managed to achieve peace in the Horn of Africa, in reality there was no talk of this. Some pieces of paper, of course, formally give Turkey the status of a peacemaker on the Dark Continent, but they are worth nothing in the current realities. The Ethiopian authorities still support Somaliland and supply weapons to the autonomous regions that have broken off relations with Mogadishu.#Africa #Somalia #TÃ¼rkiye@rybarSupport us

Title: ğŸ‡°ğŸ‡· The crisis situation in South Korea is gaining momentum Dome...
Description: ğŸ‡°ğŸ‡· The crisis situation in South Korea is gaining momentum. The internal political crisis in South Korea continues. Today, lawmakers in parliament impeached Acting President and Prime Minister Han Deok-soo. This is happening for the first time in the history of the Republic of Korea. One of the main reasons is that the politician refused to appoint judges to the countryâ€™s Constitutional Court. Thus, it seems that the acting president is playing a little along with Yoon Seok-yeol, who was himself temporarily suspended from business.ğŸ”»The fact is that it is the Constitutional Court that issues a verdict regarding the confirmation of the legality of the president's impeachment. The body has nine seats in total, but currently only six judges sit on it. If a vote on the legality of impeachment were held now, then, according to procedure, one dissenting vote could effectively return Yun to office. â–ªï¸In an attempt to increase the chances of success of impeachment, the opposition in parliament is trying to sneak judges into the body. However, they must still be appointed by the leader of the country. And there is another catch - does the acting president have the authority to do this? â–ªï¸ Opposition politicians argue that Khan has every right to do this. According to the conservative position, the acting president cannot assume such responsibility. Thus, the process of appointing judges is being delayed, which plays into the hands of the ruling party and Yun himself. By the way, he doesnâ€™t waste any time either. Yoon continues to refuse to receive the necessary documents sent to him by the country's Constitutional Court. â–â–â–â–â–â–â–â–ğŸ”»Thus, the political situation in South Korea after the impeachment of the president remains very tense. The removal of the acting president from office only worsens the internal political crisis in the country. #SouthKorea @rybar together with @awaken_dragonSupport usYonhap News Agency(URGENT) Nat'l Assembly votes to impeach acting President Han(END)

As always, we talked, first of all, about the need to be part of a team: it is impossible to produce a high-quality product non-stop and be an expert in everything alone. This is best seen in the example of OSINT and its derivatives: it is always a game, always search and deduction. And the more diverse the team is, the greater the chances of success. Baumanki students, of course, were most interested in the prospects for the development of their own projects, although we also talked a lot about working with fakes, the opportunity to influence decision-making and disavowing fakes. #media technologies #media school #education@rybarSupport us

Title: ğŸ” ğŸ‡·ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡«ğŸ‡® About the consequences of the seizure of the Eagle S ...
Description: Forwarded From GlobalisticsğŸ‡·ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡«ğŸ‡® On the consequences of the seizure of the Eagle S vessel In fact, we have to agree with colleagues that this incident with the Eagle S vessel will have far-reaching consequences for our communication in the Baltic Sea.â™¦ï¸Seizure of a tanker under a fictitious pretext is a tactic that NATO countries have been practicing in the last two years. Regular exercises were carried out in the Baltic waters, and the main task was to practice actions in a crisis situation. Like the one that was recorded between Finland and Estonia. No one from Western countries will understand whether this actually happened or not. Whether this tanker was involved or not. It doesn't matter to the West anymore. They received a reason for new aggression. We do not rule out that the Finns themselves organized this cable break. Who can prove otherwise? There were many teachings of this kind. For example, the last one was Pikne with the participation of Estonians, Finns, British - well, you generally understand the message. And underwater coastal operations were practiced there. Last year, under the same unknown pretext, a naval group of the Joint Expeditionary Forces was created. â—ï¸Now, in addition to the sanctions that will clearly be imposed on, as the European Union now says, Russiaâ€™s shadow fleet, we should expect more dangerous steps from the point of view of Russian positions in the Baltics, such as more serious provocations. For what? At a minimum, to justify an increased presence at sea and to escort civilian ships coming from Russia, and, at a maximum, to block the bay and allow ships to pass only with their permission. that the West is planning a blockade of Russian maritime traffic was raised on the canal many times, and often caused truly monkey-like antics from the security forces audience, especially in the media. Now let's look at the incident...

Title: ğŸ‡¸ğŸ‡©ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¸ Why are Americans intimidating the UAE? The White House ...
Description: ğŸ‡¸ğŸ‡©ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¸ Why are the Americans intimidating the UAE? The White House said that the UAE authorities allegedly stopped supporting Sudanese rebels from the Rapid Reaction Force after objections from the Americans. The Emirati side's testimony will be verified in January next year. It is then that Congress will discuss whether to impose sanctions against the leadership in Abu Dhabi. Indeed, after the incident with the Il-76T, which was shot down by Sudanese rebels, relations between them and their sponsors in the Emirates worsened. This entailed reputational costs for the UAE. But itâ€™s still not worth talking about a complete cessation. Most likely, the UAE authorities will continue to support the RRF (but in a more limited format), since this is necessary to maintain its positions in Sudan. They still have the opportunity to use eastern Libya to transfer weapons to the RRF. The Americans want to use threats of sanctions against the UAE to win over the official government of Sudan, which has begun to achieve success on the battlefield. At the same time, questions have been raised in Sudan itself about the possibility of providing a supply point in the Red Sea for both the Russian Navy and the Iranian Navy, which is clearly not part of the plans of the American side.#Africa #UAE #Sudan #USA @rybarSupport us ReutersExclusive: Biden to report to US Congress on UAE assurance it is not supplying weapons to Sudan RSFPresident Joe Biden's administration will provide U.S. an assessment by Jan. 17 on the credibility of assurances by the United Arab Emirates that it is not providing - and will not provide - weapons to the paramilitary Rapid Support Forces (RSF)â€¦

Title: ğŸ” #Summary for the morning of December 27, 2024 â–ªï¸ In the Kursk ...
Description: Forwarded From Two Majors #Summary for the morning of December 27, 2024â–ªï¸ In the Kursk region, the Russian Armed Forces continue military operations in the forests of the Sudzhansky district. According to the Russian Ministry of Defense, the Ukrainian Armed Forces continue to take counter-attack actions in order to slow down our advance.â–ªï¸ In the Kupyansky direction, the fighting is Zagryzovo south of Kruglyakovka. Data are being received about the expansion of the Russian Armed Forces bridgehead on the right bank of the river. Oskol in the village Dvurechnaya. â–ªï¸ In Toretsk (Dzerzhinsk), according to enemy estimates, the Russian Armed Forces north of the waste heaps of the Tsentralnaya mine, Russian maneuver groups continue to attack in the area of â€‹â€‹the mine and along Khimicheskaya, Podolskaya and Vinnitskaya streets. Along the streets of Heroes of Labor, Mirnaya and Lesya Ukrainka, attacks by our troops continue in the direction of the Toretskaya mine.â–ªï¸ From the Krasnolimansky direction, separate information is received that the Russian Armed Forces crossed the Volchya River in the Ternov area in the Ivanovka area.â–ªï¸ In Chasov Yar, fighting continues in the Ogneupornoye area plant, the Russian Armed Forces retain the initiative, but the enemy maintains an organized defense in fortified area.â–ªï¸ In the Pokrovsky direction, our troops after the liberation of the village. New Trud and Dachenskoe form the conditions for the attack on Pokrovsk. The enemy is conducting counter actions in the Shevchenko area. The offensive of our troops in the Kurakhovsky direction continues. â–ªï¸ On the Zaporozhye front, an important element is enemy counterattacks in the Kamensky area. The enemy is conducting powerful artillery attacks and drone strikes. He throws the MTR into battle as infantry (according to front-line soldiers who highly appreciated the enemyâ€™s equipment). There are heavy battles, but our people are holding on, they tell us from the ground.â–ªï¸ In the Belgorod region, as a result of an attack by a Ukrainian Armed Forces drone on a townhouse in the village of Razumnoye, Belgorod district, an 8-year-old child and his mother were injured, and another civilian was injured. During the day, an enemy drone hit a moving car near the village of Cheremoshnoye, Belgorod district, and a self-defense fighter was wounded. Another attack occurred in the village of Murom, Shebekinsky district. â–ªï¸ A man born in 1953 was wounded in the DPR. in the village Gorlovka (Nikitovsky district) as a result of an enemy attack. In the village Panteleimonovka (Yasinovatsky district) a man born in 1993 was wounded as a result of an IED dropped from a UAV of the Ukrainian Armed Forces. The summary was compiled by: Two majors Telegram Two majors Broken enemy equipment in the Kurakhovsky direction. During the advance, our soldiers discovered American armored vehicles very similar to the M113 model, which is probably what it is. And inside the box is its former inhabitant, who probably didnâ€™t even have time to understand...

Title: ğŸ¬ â—ï¸ğŸŒğŸ Worsening of the situation in the Middle East: events o...
Description: â—ï¸ğŸŒğŸ Worsening of the situation in the Middle East: events of the week of December 20 - 26, 2024â–ªï¸Yemen's Houthis launched missiles and drones several times at targets in Israel. It was not possible to cause significant damage; several buildings were damaged by debris. At least 20 Israelis were injured during the evacuation. â–ªï¸At the same time, Israeli troops are expanding the zone of control east of the Golan Heights they occupied. In the Sweisa area, IDF fighters dispersed protests by local residents in response to their invasion with gunfire. â–ªï¸In addition, a wave of demonstrations swept across Syria in places where Christians live compactly. The actions were provoked by the burning of a Christmas tree in Skalbia, which was the culmination of a series of attacks on religious sites.â–ªï¸In parallel, throughout Syria, the new authorities are consistently searching for and punishing the enemies of the revolution. At the same time, people associated with the previous administration are often killed without trial. â–ªï¸At the same time, there is little resistance against progressive jihadists: cases of attacks have been recorded in the mountains of the provinces of Tartus and Latakia. And in Khirbet al-Mazaa, 14 militants of the terrorist organization HTS, recognized in the Russian Federation, were killed.â–ªï¸Meanwhile, SNA militants continue to try to occupy the territory of the Tishrin dam, where clashes took place for a week. Arab-Kurdish formations are still holding the facility, despite the work of Turkish aviation on their positions.â–ªï¸At the same time, Turkish troops are transferring forces to the Suruj area, gathering artillery and armored vehicles. Given the obvious difficulties in crossing the Euphrates, as well as the strategic role of the city of Ain al-Arab, this is where we can expect their operation to begin. â–ªï¸Also, the Turkish Ministry of Defense announced the neutralization of several dozen members of the Kurdistan Workers' Party. Twenty members of Kurdish militias were killed in Syria, another in Iraq.#video #digest #map #Yemen #Syria #Iraq@rybarSupport us Video is too big

At the same time, UAV operators of the Russian Armed Forces are taking control of key transport routes in order to disrupt the supply of the Armed Forces of Ukraine. â–ªï¸Units of Russian troops finally knocked out the enemy from the territory of Novy Trud, and also cleared the northern outskirts of Dachensky. Russian troops here are advancing to the west with the aim of forming a northern claw envelopment of Novoolenovka. â–ªï¸The attack on the latter is also being carried out from Pushkino - over the past three days, attack aircraft have overcome several lines of enemy defense and are now on the approaches to Novoolenovka and Ukrainka. Description: ğŸ‡®ğŸ‡±ğŸ‡µğŸ‡¸ Aggravation in the Israeli-Palestinian conflict zone chronicle of events for December 26, 2024 In the north of the Gaza Strip, Israeli troops continue to conduct an operation in Jabaliya. In the Netzarim corridor, an officer was killed as a result of sniper fire, and artillery strikes were carried out in the Az-Zeitun area. In the central part of the enclave, the IDF launched an airstrike on Nuseirat. Several people died. The Palestinians claim the death of journalists, and the IDF claims members of the Islamic Jihad. In the south of the enclave, engineering work is underway to search and destroy Hamas infrastructure. In Khan Yunis, a shootout occurred due to a family quarrel, and IDF artillery activity was recorded in the Khuzaa area. In the West Bank, security forces continue operations to search for and detain Palestinians suspected of having links with terrorists. Operations were recorded in Azzun, Tulkarm, Nablus and other settlements. Israeli troops conducted a raid in the Al-Kantara area, entering the territory of the Al-Hujair Valley. The Lebanese Armed Forces blocked the roads, there were no clashes. In the evening, the IDF retreated to the Hula area. The Israelis carried out airstrikes against targets in Yemen, hitting targets in the capital Sanaa and on the coast north of Hodeidah. There are dead and injured civilians.ğŸ”»A detailed analytical report on events in the Israeli-Palestinian conflict zone is available on our closed channel @rybar_plus_bot High resolution mapEnglish versionâ­ï¸ Online maps are available by subscription to map.rybar.ru#digest #report #Israel #map #Lebanon #Palestine@rybarSupport us

Title: ğŸ” We missed a really important bill from the State Duma. Meaning...
Description: Forwarded From Two Majors Here we missed a really important bill from the State Duma. Meaning: They want to allow veterans and servicemen without experience in owning a smooth-bore shooting stick to purchase rifled civilian weapons. applying for the acquisition of rifled firearms. A citizen applying for the acquisition of a smooth-bore firearm must have previously owned a smooth-bore firearm for at least two years, having no more than two barrels and not having a magazine or drum, and also owned a smooth-bore firearm for at least five years. This limitation is due to the need to develop stable skills in using firearms among people who acquire them for the first time and have no experience in handling them. At the same time, combat veterans (including participants of the military military service), serving (have served) in state paramilitary organizations and having (had) military ranks, special ranks or class ranks of justice, duly possess the appropriate skills and experience in handling weapons. This is directly due not only to their direct participation in hostilities, but also to the fact that employees of state paramilitary organizations during their service undergo professional training, as well as regular testing of knowledge and skills in the use of firearms. In accordance with the Federal Law - On Weapons - these categories of citizens are already exempt from the obligation to undergo training and test their knowledge of the rules and skills for safe handling of weapons. In this regard, the bill provides for the possibility of acquiring -multiple-charged- and rifled weapons without experience in owning -smooth-bore weapons by citizens of the Russian Federation who are veterans of military operations, serving (have served) in state paramilitary organizations and having (had) military ranks, special ranks or cool officials of justice.- âœ¨This is a really sensible bill. In addition to strengthening social protection measures for participants of the North Military District and combat veterans, this will give impetus to the arms business, which is directly hampered by draconian conditions from developing. State Duma deputies A.E. Khinshtein, A.V. Kartapolov, A.B. Vyborny, E.A. .Valeev are noted for the better, a plus in the piggy bank for karma. For now, the bill has already been prescribed to be included in the approximate program of legislative work of the State Duma during the spring session 2025 (January) Two majorsozd.duma.gov.ru No. 780562-8 Bill :: System for supporting legislative activities Information resource of the State Duma. Information on the consideration of bills and draft resolutions of the State Duma is collected here

Title: ğŸ” Telecom operators and their security system is a topic worthy ...
Description: Forwarded From Belarusian security officer ğŸ‡§ğŸ‡¾Communication operators and their security system is a topic worthy of a separate training manual, about eleven pages long. Iâ€™ll be brief, to the point. The main problem is logging and the duration/scale of their storage. After protests, Belarus has already encountered data leaks from individual employees of telecom operators who had access to personal data in connection with their official position. Identifying such people is very hard work, which requires perseverance and the ability to seriously analyze a large amount of data. It is noteworthy that in the case of Uzbekistan, the case relates to self-interest: you can now buy anything through the Darknet. You pay with crypto, place an order using the data/details, and they give you the necessary data. Moreover, the scale of the problem is truly enormous. In Russia, for example, you can buy ALL the necessary data about a person, absolutely. In Belarus, for example, at one time they took this seriously and now, in my opinion, you canâ€™t order anything through dark markets due to the lack of idiots who are ready to leak this data for pennies. Comrade Rybar correctly noted that the GUR uses this data in its purposes. If we talk about the data that is purchased in Uzbekistan, then this is probably for intelligence activities regarding Russian citizens whose activities are directly related to Uzbekistan. To generalize, it is with the help of such dossiers and leaks of cellular operators that the Ukrainian special services build criminal schemes involving the murder of citizens on Russian territory.@belarusian_silovikTelegramRybarâš¡ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¿ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¦ Uzbek telecom operators leaked data to the Ukrainian GURAccording to our sources in Uzbekistan, the other day trial against several employees of operator companies mobile communications -Beeline- and -Mobiuz-, as a result of which the defendants were convicted...

Title: ğŸ‡·ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¦ Colleagues Two Majors raised a very important question r...
Description: ğŸ‡·ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¦ Colleagues Two Majors raised a very important question regarding simplifying combat on the front line through the production of ready-made belts loaded with cartridges. It seems that whatâ€™s so surprising about this? The bottom line is that in our armed forces, cartridges are supplied separately, and each time you need to equip the belts yourself. If in peacetime at some training grounds this was a way of -training- a soldier, then in active combat this greatly reduces the time and combat readiness of a soldier or units. Nowadays, the speed of reaction, decision-making, and so on is the determining factor in the conflict. By adopting experience from the enemy, you can greatly simplify the life of a fighter on the front line. Just imagine this situation: a fortified area is being defended and the enemy is attacking in large numbers, and the machine gun has run out of belt. And what do you think will be faster - to install a ready-made tape and continue the defense or to insert a cartridge manually?#Russia #Ukraine@rybarSupport usTelegramTwo majors#trophyKursk regionOur trophy team continues to familiarize the channel personnel with everyday things for NATO with pleasure. Today they are showing the practical benefits of packing NATO cartridges in tapes and boxes: the fighter simply takes out the loaded ones...

Title: ğŸ‡®ğŸ‡±ğŸ‡¸ğŸ‡¾ğŸ‡¹ğŸ‡· About the Syrian -300 thousand army - Formation of a...
Description: ğŸ‡®ğŸ‡±ğŸ‡¸ğŸ‡¾ğŸ‡¹ğŸ‡· About the Syrian -300,000-strong army - The formation of a new Syrian state continues. If everything becomes more or less clear with the political structure, then the armed forces are an issue that deserves increased attention, given the composition of the forces that won in Syria. General Ahmed Osman, who is part of the leadership, gave an interview to the Turkish publication TÃ¼rkiye Gazetesi, saying that in Syria, with the military support of Turkey, will create a 300,000-strong army. Among them are 40 thousand HTS militants, 50 from the SNA. In addition, there is a place for military personnel and intelligence officers who were not involved in the crimes of the Assad administration. And the Turkish military contingent will be stationed in five vital points in Syria. And they want to do all this in one year and a half.â–â–â–â–â–â–â–â–â–The statements are extremely interesting. If we take them at face value, then the creation of an army with such a number is a direct threat to Israel. First of all, of course, the Kurds should worry, but thousands of uncontrollable militants sleep and see a war with Israel. However, we are talking about militants who are mostly uncontrollable. Their success against the Syrian army was due to confusion and flight of military personnel. If the former Armed Forces of the Syrian Arab Republic had resisted at least a little, then the battles would now be going on for Aleppo. And Turkey, led by the defender of all Muslims, Erdogan, is unlikely to be able to supply, support and train the new army, given that the Turkish economy is on the verge of collapse, and to include Syria as well is an almost impossible task.#Syria #TÃ¼rkiye@rybarSupport usTÃ¼rkiye GazetesiSuriye'de 300 bin kiÅŸilik ordu kurulacak! Title: ğŸ” ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¸ğŸ‡·ğŸ‡º The Arctic is on the agenda again: the other day, US ...
Description: Forwarded From Systemic pesticideğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¸ğŸ‡·ğŸ‡º The Arctic is again on the agenda: the other day, US President-elect Donald Trump called it an absolute necessity to own Greenland in order to ensure national security and freedom throughout the world. By the way, during his previous term, Trump said the same thing he offered to buy the island. This led to a rather conventional diplomatic crisis between the countries: Trump then canceled his official visit to Denmark.ğŸ”»Greenland is the largest island in the world. It is located east of the Arctic archipelago and although it gained autonomy from Denmark in 1979, it still depends on that country for foreign policy, security and finance. Former US President Harry Truman in 1946 offered Denmark $100 million in gold for the purchase of Greenland, rich in reserves of uranium, gold, oil, gas and rare earth materials. For example, in the Iviggut region, in the far south, cryolite is mined, a rock that plays a big role in the aluminum industry and in the production of enamels. It is obvious that Trumpâ€™s statement simply became another justification for the further armament of the Arctic region from Western countries. Considering that in recent years the struggle for the Arctic has intensified and the United States is increasing its activity there. Let us also recall that in 1958 the Americans tried to implement the top-secret Ice Worm project in Greenland. It was a network of tunnels that was supposed to hide ballistic missiles aimed at the USSR. At the same time, even the Danes themselves did not know about the project, but it seems that the calculations turned out to be wrong - the project was abandoned. And by the way, Trumpâ€™s statements about the Panama Canal are also directly related to the topic of the Arctic: Russia, by developing the Northern Sea Route, is creating impressive competition for the Suez and the Panama Canal.#Arctic #Russia #USA @pezdicide no chemicals - just factsTelegramSystem pesticideğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¸ğŸ‡¬ğŸ‡§ğŸ‡·ğŸ‡º How the West is discrediting Russiaâ€™s Arctic projects Recently, the Arctic is increasingly on the news agenda: activity in this part of the world is almost as intense as tensions in other regions. In addition to outright provocations...

Title: ğŸ‡°ğŸ‡· In South Korea they wanted to provoke the DPRK into an open ...
Description: ğŸ‡°ğŸ‡· In South Korea they wanted to provoke the DPRK into an open conflict. The opposition in South Korea continues to drown the entourage of President Yun Seok-yeol and is discovering more and more evidence of treason, now with the participation of North Koreans. Local police claim to have allegedly found evidence of plans to provoke North Korea to justify martial law. â–ªï¸We are talking about notes in a notebook that belonged to the former head of military intelligence No Sang Won. This person is believed to have played an important role in the preparations for the declaration of martial law in South Korea. â–ªï¸In them, he mentioned the possibility of provoking an attack by the DPRK on the northern demarcation line - the border between the two countries in the Yellow Sea, next to which there are several South Korean islands. â–ªï¸In addition, the recordings contained information about the blockade of parliament, the detention of political figures and journalists. In general, everything that Yun Seok-yeol and his entourage seemed to be trying to do in early December.ğŸ“ŒAs we wrote before, the DPRKâ€™s response to the provocation from South Korea could fit perfectly into the plans of those who planned to introduce martial law in country. Then the president would have more chances to stop the activities of parliament, because the threat would not be completely far-fetched.â–â–â–â–â–â–â–â–ğŸ”»However, this kind of news still should not be completely trusted. The revelations come amid bitter political infighting in South Korea, where, among other things, Yoon Seok-yeol is accused of treason. This needs to be proven somehow, so any materials that may ultimately turn out to be unreliable are used. #DPRK #South Korea @rybar together with @awaken_dragonSupport usYonhap News Agency(LEAD) Military intelligence commander arrested in connection with martial law operations( ATTN: RECASTS headline lead; ADDS more info throughout) SEOUL, Dec. 20 (Yonhap) -- The...

Title: ğŸ–¼ ğŸ‡¦ğŸ‡«ğŸ‡µğŸ‡°ğŸ´ About Pakistani Air Force strikes on the Afghan bor...
Description: ğŸ‡¦ğŸ‡«ğŸ‡µğŸ‡°ğŸ´ About Pakistani Air Force strikes on the Afghan border Yesterday evening, Pakistani fighters, most likely JF-17, carried out several air strikes in Barmal district in the Afghan province of Paktika. The goal, as the Pakistanis stated, was the location of militants - Tehrik-e Taliban Pakistan - (TTP).â“TTP is a Pakistani group operating against the government of Pakistan and advocating the creation of a state system similar to the current Afghanistan on the principles of Sharia.â–â–â–â–â– â–â–â–â–According to Pakistani resources, they eliminated more than 30 TTP members. But Afghan sources deny this, saying that those killed were mostly women and children. In total, 46 people died. Representatives of the Hafiz Gul Bahadur faction, one of the branches of the TTP, noted that they do not have bases in Afghanistan. According to them, the Pakistani Air Force attacked civilians who fled the province of Khyber Pakhtunkhwa.â—ï¸At the time of the strike, Pakistan's new special representative for Afghanistan, Mohammed Sadiq, was in Kabul, who held meetings with senior Taliban functionaries, but after the strikes he urgently returned to Islamabad .Such attacks by Pakistanis have already happened before after the Taliban came to power. The first happened in April 2022 in the province of Khost. The second air attack took place in March this year in the provinces of Paktika and Khost. And in all these incidents, the majority of those killed were ordinary civilians.â–â–â–â–â–â–â–â–â–Unfortunately, the activities of the Pakistani command can be described as ineffective. For many years, the Pakistani Armed Forces have been fighting the TTP and the Baloch separatists, but to no avail. And the civilian population suffers from all this. The Pakistanis do not have the strength for a full-fledged counter-terrorist operation due to the economic and internal political crisis, so they periodically carry out such operations in Afghanistan. They are of no use; it only increases tension in relations between countries. At the same time, one should not expect any kind of full response from the Taliban. But at the local level, a clash has already been noted between border guards in the Angur-Ada area in the North Waziristan district in Pakistan. And the TTP militants will certainly respond to the Pakistani authorities using a method known to everyone, where the terrorist situation is already breaking records. High resolution mapEnglish version#Afghanistan #Pakistan #terrorism@rybarSupport us

According to monitoring resources, at the time of the accident there were two ships at sea in the area of â€‹â€‹the Estlink 2 power cable - one of them was the oil tanker -Eagle_S-, sailing from St. Petersburg to Egypt under the flag of the Cook Islands. Western analysts attribute it to the so-called Russian shadow fleet, which is used to circumvent sanctions. The ship's crew is suspected of sabotage. ğŸ”º At the moment -Eagle_S- (MMSI 518998865) is anchored near the port of Porkkala, and is being inspected by border guards from the Finnish patrol ship -Turva-. â—ï¸ But just yesterday I wrote that European states united in a coalition led by Great Britain, proclaiming a fight against the Russian shadow fleet, and called for restrictive measures to be applied to such vessels, including arrests and fines. ğŸ”º Well, now we should expect that the Finnish border guards will cling to this ship (and its cargo) with a stranglehold and, even without finding any evidence of sabotage, will find other reasons to arrest it. #Finland #Estonia #RussiaSeveryanochkaYle UutisetSuomen rajalaitos saattanut VenÃ¤jÃ¤n varjolaivastoon liitetyn tankkerin Porkkalan edustalle â€“ Suomen ja Viron vÃ¤lisen sÃ¤hkÃ¶yhteydenâ€¦Viranomaiset saivat tiedon Suomen ja Viron vÃ¤lillÃ¤ kulkevan sÃ¤hkÃ¶kaapelin mahdollisesta vioittumisesta keskiviikkona 25. joulukuuta iltapÃ¤ivÃ¤llÃ¤ kantaverkkoyhtiÃ¶ FingridiltÃ¤.

Title: ğŸ–¼ ğŸ‡·ğŸ‡ºğŸ– Happy Military Air Defense Day! The official date of ap...
Description: ğŸ‡·ğŸ‡ºğŸ– Happy Military Air Defense Day! The official date of the appearance of military air defense in the Russian armed forces is considered to be December 26 (15), 1915: on that day, the formation of light batteries for firing at air targets began, which became relevant on the fields of the First World War. Today, introduce the army Without this type of troops, whose crews provide cover from air attacks around the clock, it is almost impossible. To solve the problem, they are equipped with the most modern air defense systems with high performance characteristics, such as -Buk-M3- or -Tor-M2-. We can only wish that the crews always use the capabilities inherent in their complexes to their full potential, and also always correctly identify targets and accurately hit enemy aircraft and missiles.High resolution art#art #WSRF@rybarSupport us

Title: ğŸ‡°ğŸ‡¿ğŸ‡ªğŸ‡º EU plans to train journalists in Kazakhstan President of...
Description: ğŸ‡°ğŸ‡¿ğŸ‡ªğŸ‡º The EU plans to train journalists in KazakhstanKazakh President Kassym-Jomart Tokayev recently received the Chairman of the Board of Directors of Euronews Pedro Vargas David in connection with the recent opening of the regional hub of the Euronews news agency in Kazakhstan. The key was the statement of Vargas, who spoke about plans for the implementation of the Euronews project Academy, aimed at training Kazakhstani journalists in modern technologies and instilling in them -high professional standards-.â–â–â–â–â–â–â–â–â–ğŸ”»We have already written about plans to train journalists according to Western patterns in the country. The so-called -activists- or ordinary reporters actually perform intelligence tasks and act as agents of influence. Therefore, this is not about improving the quality of local journalism, but about managing the agenda first in Kazakhstan and then in Central Asia, using Kazakhstan as a springboard.â–â–â–â–â–â–â–â–ğŸ“ŒWell, if you live in Kazakhstan and want to study modern journalism where alien liberal narratives will not be imposed on you, you have the opportunity to participate in the Rybar Media School, which we just recently presented in Shymkent. Title: ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¸ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¿ Uzbekistan and the WTO: the end is near As part of the a...
Description: ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¸ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¿ Uzbekistan and the WTO: the end is near. As part of the process of Uzbekistanâ€™s accession to the World Trade Organization (WTO), a protocol was signed on the completion of bilateral negotiations on market access with the participation of US Trade Representative Katherine Tai. According to Tai, it took 30 years to join the WTO: the application was submitted back in 1994, but active work resumed in 2020. Uzbekistan also announced that it will continue to work to fulfill all obligations necessary to complete the process of accession to the WTO.â–â– â–â–â–â–â–â–â–We have already written that the authoritiesâ€™ calculations in Tashkent on economic growth through accession to the WTO are erroneous, given the trends towards the division of the global economy. Uzbekistan may achieve a limited effect from expanding its sales opportunities, but at the same time lose its own industry. We can say that the role of the WTO has noticeably decreased in our time, and the Uzbek authorities are considering membership solely for image and reputation reasons. But then the question arises: why does Uzbekistan so zealously resist interaction with the EAEU? From the point of view of possible benefits, the Uzbek leadership can receive profits many times greater than after joining the WTO. The example of Kyrgyzstan is a clear confirmation of this. Thanks to interaction with Russia, the authorities have greatly boosted the economy, and it continues to grow, despite pressure from the West.#CentralAsia #Uzbekistan@rybarSupport usDaryo.uz Uzbekistan and the United States signed a Protocol on the completion of bilateral negotiations on accession to the Second World War. Title: ğŸ” #Summary for the morning of December 26, 2024 â–ªï¸ Yesterday's d...
Description: Forwarded From Two Majors #Summary for the morning of December 26, 2024â–ªï¸ Yesterdayâ€™s day began with massive attacks, including on the energy infrastructure of Ukraine: Zmievskaya, Burshtynska and Slavyanskaya thermal power plants were damaged, but it is still too early to talk about the complete destruction of the enemyâ€™s generating capacities.â–ªï¸ On In the Kursk direction, battles took place in the vicinity of the settlement. Leonidovo, Cherkasy Konopelka and Kurilovka. Twice the Ukrainian Armed Forces tried to counterattack unsuccessfully. The enemy fired at Lgov, three people were killed, and another later died in the hospital. â–ªï¸ Heavy, sticky battles continue in Toretsk (Dzerzhinsk). The Russian Armed Forces are also attacking in Shcherbinovka (southwest of Toretsk).â–ªï¸ In the Pokrovsky direction, the village has been liberated. New Labor, reported the Russian Ministry of Defense. There are battles in Dachenskoye. South of Pokrovsk, the Russian Armed Forces are advancing to the west on a broad front: there is progress at Novoolenovka and Novoelizavetovka.â–ªï¸ In Kurakhovo, the Russian Armed Forces are advancing in the western part of a multi-story building and have planted a flag on the roof of the dispensary building. â–ªï¸ In the Kherson direction, according to enemy estimates, the Russian Armed Forces are creating conditions for crossing the Dnieper. Such emotional statements from the enemy side about the impending offensive of our troops may indicate the low readiness and insufficiency of enemy forces in the direction, while the statements themselves serve as an information cushion for local commanders of the Armed Forces of Ukraine and the Kyiv authorities. What is reliably known is only about the intensified strikes of the Armed Forces on the enemy shore, which, however, may be work to reduce the threat to the civilian population of our shore in the context of constant terrorist attacks by the Nazis.â–ªï¸ In the Belgorod region, the Armed Forces of Ukraine attacked the Grayvoronsky district with the help of UAVs; as a result of dropping explosive devices, it was damaged power line. During the day, on the Belgorod-Shebekino highway section, a drone struck a truck. A passenger car moving along the Murom-Nechaevka highway was attacked by a kamikaze drone. In the Valuysky district in the village of Dolgoye, an FPV drone hit a car. Another drone attack by the Armed Forces of Ukraine occurred in the village of Nechaevka, Belgorod district.â–ªï¸ At night, in one of the districts of the Voronezh region, a Ukrainian drone was discovered and destroyed. The summary was compiled by: Two majorsTelegramTwo majorsKursk regionAttacks with drops from a UAV on enemy infantryTwo majors

Title: ğŸ–¼ ğŸ“ğŸ“ The first edition of the online courses of the Rybar medi...
Description: ğŸ“ğŸ“ The first edition of the online courses of the Rybar Media School was completed. The first online course of the Rybar Media School was completed. 10 of our students received well-deserved diplomas: these are very different people of whom we are very proud. Each deserves a separate story, but I would especially like to mention the following: ğŸ“The project - Diary of a Stormtrooper - is a channel run by a North Military District veteran who went through the thick of it as a Wagner stormtrooper. Vadim is an absolutely amazing and versatile person: he films interviews, conducts streams, and writes a book (to be released soon). As part of the Media School, he started a project related to the psychological rehabilitation of veterans of the Northern Military District, and we will very soon begin to scale and develop this project throughout the country. ğŸ“Stepan and Angelina from the volunteer group - Constellation of Actives -. Someone says that Muscovites live in a parallel world where there is no war. This is a lie. Stepan and Angelina started with camouflage nets, then moved on to the production of engineering devices for sappers, and now they continue to develop. During their studies at our School, they launched a whole ecosystem around their Constellation: there are now lectures, watching films, joint leisure, and a separate direction - media. Which, of course, is especially pleasant for us. Next in line is the registration of NPOs and the unification of small volunteer groups. There are projects related to travel and education, to understanding oneself and the world. We are proud of our graduates and will meet them again soon. Training will continue at the next levels. The goal of our Media School is to help worthy people and give impetus to development in new media. We give you the opportunity to talk about yourself, find new partners and new niches, and build networking. -Rybarya Media School is accepting applications from applicants from all over the world for training in the 1st quarter of 2025. Join us - write to @school_rybar_bot.â—ï¸There is only one condition: you must clearly understand what kind of project you want to develop. And this should be something really very important not only for us personally, but also for our country. To upgrade your personal brand, take paid courses with tarot readers, no offense. #mediatechnology #mediaschool #education@rybarSupport us

Title: ğŸ‡·ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¦ When reading the mischief of three years ago, something ...
Description: ğŸ‡·ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¦ When reading the mischief of three years ago, something else is noticeable: among some experts, bosses and the public, the picture of the world has not changed much since then. They still consider the enemy to be incompetent, and their own failures are the result of the action of certain external forces. They still believe that the successful US operation in Iraq in 1991 was not a consequence of a high level of planning, organization, training and technical equipment. It was just the Iraqis who were bribed. They still believe that the tragedies in the Chechen wars are not a consequence of poor combat training, planning and support of yesterday's Soviet army. This is simply an insidious conspiracy of the oligarchs. They still believe that the impossibility of razing cities to the ground with cruise missiles is not a consequence of the laws of physics and limited industrial capabilities. Because of the sacred confidence that the army has no problems with controls or off-road vehicles, they are trying to ban gadgets and volunteer vehicles. To combat mischief and contempt, it is necessary, first of all, to learn to calmly admit your mistakes. Without this, the experience of the CBO will not be learned, the inadequate perception of oneâ€™s own capabilities will not change, and the rake will continue. Description: ğŸ‡¦ğŸ‡¿ğŸ‡°ğŸ‡¿ An Embraer passenger plane of Azerbaijan Airlines, flying from Baku to Grozny, crashed in Kazakhstan. Due to fog, it was redirected first to Makhachkala, and then to the west of Kazakhstan, where the disaster occurred. According to preliminary data, the cause was a collision between the plane and a flock of birds. The aircraft crashed to the ground, after which a fire started. More than ten units of rescue equipment are working at the scene of the incident. In total, there were 72 people on the plane - 5 crew members and 67 passengers. According to the Kazakh Ministry of Health, five of them survived, but they are in extremely serious condition.UPD. According to the latest data from the Mangistau region health department, 12 people, including one child, were taken to the hospital from the crash site. #Azerbaijan #Kazakhstan@rybarSupport us

Description: ğŸ‡·ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¦ Kurakhovo direction: battles in Kurakhovo and successes near Sukhi Yalovo Situation as of 9:00 on December 25, 2024 The advance of Russian troops continues in several sectors at once. The offensive is going both north of Kurakhovo in the direction of the T-05-15 highway, and in the south along both banks of the Sukhie Yaly River. â–ªï¸Official confirmation of the liberation of Krasny (Sontsovka), from whose territory the enemy was driven out some time ago, was received from the northern flank. â–ªï¸In the center of Kurakhovo, Russian fighters, as a result of an assault, cleared a stronghold of the Armed Forces of Ukraine, advancing along Mayakovsky Street. At the same time, over one of the houses in the Yuzhny microdistrict, soldiers of the 110th Separate Guards Motorized Rifle Brigade of the Russian Armed Forces raised the state flag of the Russian Federation, symbolizing complete control over the site. It is likely that in the near future the offensive of the Russian Army units will continue in the direction of the industrial zone in the west, both from the central streets and from the northern shore of the Kurakhovskoye reservoir, where the village of Starye Terny was recently liberated. â–ªï¸Southwest of the city, attack aircraft not only knocked out the Ukrainian Armed Forces from Sukhy Yalov, but also leveled the front line at the Yantarnoye-Konstantinopolskoye line, where until recently the presence of enemy forces in Gigant remained. In addition, the control zone in the Zelenovka area was expanded further to the west. In the near future we can expect the liquidation of the pocket on both sides of the Yasnaya Polyana-Razliv road and the advance of the RF Armed Forces in the direction of Constantinople and Ulakl in order to complete the formation of the southern half-coverage of the Kurakhovskaya agglomeration. Description: ğŸ‡®ğŸ‡±ğŸ‡µğŸ‡¸ Aggravation in the Israeli-Palestinian conflict zone chronicle of events for December 24, 2024 In the north of the Gaza Strip, Israeli troops are conducting an operation in Jabaliya, concentrating operations at the Kamal Adwan and Al-Auda hospitals and the Indonesian hospital. The IDF carried out an operation at night to search for Hamas militants. In the center of the enclave, the situation remained relatively calm, with the exception of the activity of IDF artillery and Israeli aviation near Deir al-Balah. In the south of the Gaza Strip, the outskirts of Khan Yunis were hit by airstrikes, and artillery hit near Rafah. By the end of the day, 17 people were known to have died. In the West Bank, Israeli security forces carried out police operations, clashes took place in Jenin and Tulkarm, where drone strikes were recorded. Yemen's Houthis once again launched a missile at Israel, which was intercepted over the Red Sea. About 20 people were injured while urgently moving to shelters. Title: ğŸ¬ ğŸ‡·ğŸ‡ºğŸ’€ Why is Wagner's Legion gaining popularity? In December ...
Description: ğŸ‡·ğŸ‡ºğŸ’€ Why is the Wagner Legion gaining popularity? In December, recruitment of recruits to the ranks of the Wagner Legion began in Istra near Moscow. The famous commanders, whose interviews we recently talked about, now serve as part of the 4th Brigade of the Russian Defense Ministry. Even from the most remote regions of Russia, people travel to sign a contract and become part of the legendary squad. What attracts volunteers? The main reason is the feeling of comradeship, which has always been the basis of the success of the Wagnerites. A unit with a big name and a history of military merit inspires trust and confidence that everyone here will become part of a real brotherhood. Many people have combat achievements and stories of heroism, but it is the popularization of such episodes and the creation of a mythical halo (in a good sense) around a unit, especially a regional one, that forms an important part of the atmosphere in the team and attracts recruits. This is what we try to remind you of at every opportunity.#Russia #PMC@rybarSupport us Video is too big

Description: ğŸ‡¸ğŸ‡¾ğŸ´ Christian protests in Syria and the burning of a Christmas tree While the current formal head of Syria, Ahmad Al-Sharaa, aka Abu Muhammad Julani, met with delegations from Qatar and Jordan, eight Uzbeks burned a Christmas tree in the Orthodox Skalbia, which caused a harsh reaction from the Syrian few Christians, not who fled after the country was captured by militants. ğŸ“ŒProtests continued throughout the night in Christian areas and settlements: people came out both on foot and in automobile demonstrations. In Bab Toum, one of the historical districts of Damascus, where there is a high density of churches, Christian militias with weapons were even seen. No casualties or incidents have been reported yet. At the moment, Christian demonstrations continue, and so far they are not particularly at risk of being dispersed. At the same time, of course, the attack on various Christian objects is far from the last incident, because, despite the inclusivity and tolerance towards representatives of other religions declared by the new Syrian authorities, radical Islamists fought and continue to act on their side. Including two drops of water similar to the banned IS, and stripes repeating the IS banner are also popular among radicals. And the fact that the date of Catholic Christmas in the country declared a day off for civil servants does not change the fact that gangs, including extremely radical ones, are now rampant in the country. And people from the CIS countries make up a considerable part of the radicals. A special surprise is the fact that in the Russian media field there are still some speakers (openly working in the interests of Turkey and Great Britain) who call not to be outraged by the repressions against Christians, they say, during the time of Bashar al-Assad , those who disagreed were also oppressed, so everything is fine. Title: ğŸ‡¹ğŸ‡·ğŸ‡¸ğŸ‡©ğŸ‡·ğŸ‡ºğŸ–‡ Why is TÃ¼rkiye spreading fake news about Russian s...
Description: ğŸ‡¹ğŸ‡·ğŸ‡¸ğŸ‡©ğŸ‡·ğŸ‡ºğŸ–‡ Why is TÃ¼rkiye spreading fake news about Russian support for the Sudanese rebels? Itâ€™s impossible not to comment on the surprising in its lack of evidence fake news from a Turkish media popular in narrow circles. Allegedly, Russian weapons from Syria, which are moving to Libya, are transferred to the Rapid Reaction Forces fighting against the Sudanese authorities. Similar stories have been circulating since the very beginning of the Sudanese civil strife. Indeed, for a long time in Russian political circles they could not determine who to support in the conflict, mainly due to the previous experience of the Wagner PMC and their connections with structures supported from the UAE.â–ªï¸But since this year, the Russian government has unequivocally supported the official authorities of Sudan. This is manifested both in expanded oil exports to the country and in the supply of weapons to government forces. Moreover, Western think-tanks and other organizations have repeatedly drawn attention to this. Let us note that, indeed, now, under pressure from the West, the Sudanese authorities have become less willing to enter into dialogue with Russian diplomats and the delay in negotiations regarding the base in Port Sudan begins with their sides (some media even spread rumors about Sudanâ€™s refusal to negotiate - which does not correspond to reality).â—ï¸At the same time, this does not mean that we should definitely -switch over to the side of the SBR. Certain economic and political agreements have already been concluded, and the basis for post-war cooperation is also being laid. But who benefits from dispersing such stories is the Turks, and in particular the MiT intelligence service, which contains this media. They have their own plans for Sudan. In particular, we are talking about a base on the Red Sea coast in Suakin, the creation of which was agreed upon with the previous authorities. Description: ğŸ‡©ğŸ‡¯ğŸ‡«ğŸ‡· Why are the French holding on to their last African outpost? Macron visited Djibouti last week to negotiate aid for hurricane victims in Mayotte. The French base in the small country has previously been used to evacuate French people from crisis regions such as Sudan. Also, the local medical-surgical center provided assistance to the victims.â–â–â–â–â–â–â–â–â–ğŸ“ŒThe strategic importance of Djibouti in the context of the French African and Indo-Pacific strategy is high - it is a convenient point for refueling and providing logistics in other regions. French military base in this country consists of two ground camps, an airstrip and a small hospital. To maintain order, it has 1,500 troops, more than any other African country. And in general, the French presence here is better represented than anyone else. Taking these factors into account, the strategic partnership agreement was updated in July. According to it, the French army organizes the operation of the country's air defense systems (which is relevant in the context of escalation in the Red Sea region) and conducts exercises. Payments to the government of Djibouti for the maintenance of the military base were also increased.â–â–â–â–â–â–â–â–â–ğŸ”»Therefore, it is not surprising that the French authorities, despite the general reduction of troops in Africa, are striving to keep a piece of the Horn of Africa in their hands. Macronâ€™s visit once again emphasized the importance of Djibouti in the context of maintaining Western control in the Middle East region. And the fact that the Djibouti authorities are showing an amazing multi-vector approach means that one cannot count on a quick expulsion of the French. Title: ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¸ğŸ‡µğŸ‡¦ Why should the US return the Panama Canal? Donald Trump ...
Description: ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¸ğŸ‡µğŸ‡¦ Why should the United States return the Panama Canal? Donald Trump has not yet formally become President of the United States, but over the past few weeks he has made a number of high-profile foreign policy statements. The eccentric politician has already spoken out about Canada joining the United States, as well as establishing control over Greenland. Today, the collection of such statements includes the words of the future president about the need to return control of the Panama Canal. On this issue, a rather sharp skirmish has already taken place between Trump and the President of Panama, Jose Raul Mulino, on social networks. During it, Mulino declared that every meter of the Panama Canal belongs to Panama. Trump, in turn, replied that -weâ€™ll see about that- and followed up by publishing a photo with a US flag and the caption -Welcome to the United States channel!-.â–â–â–â–â–â–â–â–â–ğŸ”»In fact, Trumpâ€™s behavior is not just another PR stunt, but a consistent implementation of his political ideology - America First -. The Republican has already repeatedly stated that the transfer of the canal to Panama in 1999 was stupid, since the United States had lost a strategic asset that controlled the world's most important trade route. In addition, according to Trump, ownership of the canal gave the United States leverage over trade, especially in relation to countries in Asia and Latin America .Now Trump is trying to cope with the growing influence of China, which is actively investing in Panama and may in the future further strengthen its position in the region.#Panama #USA@rybar together with @usaperiodicalSupport usTelegramAmerican numberğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¸ğŸ‡¨ğŸ‡¦ About changes in relations between the United States and Canada under the Trump administration The newly elected American president has not yet had time to go through the inauguration procedure, and has already begun to put pressure on Canadian Prime Minister Justin Trudeau. Description: ğŸ‡·ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¦ Chronicle of a special military operation on December 21-23, 2024. Russian troops launched a series of attacks on the enemyâ€™s military infrastructure in several regions of the so-called. Ukraine. Explosions were also recorded in the area of â€‹â€‹energy complex facilities in the Cherkassy and Kirovograd regions. Ukrainian formations attacked Kazan with drones, resulting in damage to several residential buildings. In the Oryol region, the enemy hit an oil depot in Steel Kon, but the fire was quickly extinguished. Later, the Ukrainian Armed Forces also launched raids on military infrastructure in Crimea and Millerovo, Rostov region; no casualties were reported. In the Kursk direction, the Russian Armed Forces broke through the defenses of the Armed Forces of Ukraine north of Novoivanovka, eliminating a large protrusion on the front line and developing an offensive towards Malaya Loknya. In the Kupyansk-Svatovsk direction, the Russian Armed Forces expanded the zone of control on the Dvurechansky bridgehead, and also broke through into the central part of Zagryzovo. In the Pokrovsky direction, the Russian Armed Forces occupied most of Dachensky, eliminating -pocket- south of the village. Also, the advance of Russian troops was recorded in the areas of Peschany, Novovasylevka and Ukrainka. In the Kurakhovsky direction, the release of Krasny (Sontsovka) was confirmed. To the south, attack aircraft knocked out the enemy from several positions in the area of â€‹â€‹Mayakovsky Avenue in Kurakhovo. In the Vremyevsky direction, the Russian Armed Forces knocked out the enemy from Storozhevoy and occupied most of Blagodatnoye, while capturing a group of members of the Armed Forces of Ukraine. In the Zaporozhye direction there are battles in the Kamensky area, where the enemy had previously launched an attack on the southern part of the village. Description: ğŸ‡·ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¦ğŸ–‡ About the closure of the Ukrainian OSINT project DeepState Today, a member of the Ukrainian ruling party Maryana Bezuglaya reported that the OSINT project DeepState is under threat because of the Ukrainian Ministry of Defense. In recent months, the authors have published on a daily basis all the territories that were liberated by Russian troops. And in the near future, the authorities plan to close the entire DeepState project, mobilizing its employees into the infantry. This was done on the personal order of the Commander-in-Chief of the Armed Forces of Ukraine Alexander Syrsky due to the actions of its authors.â–â–â–â–â–â–â–â–â–ğŸ“Œ In fact, the project website ceased to function as before, and in the Telegram channel the latest update of the operational situation at the front was already December 20, although previously DeepState published everything daily, and sometimes several times per day. And taking into account the fact that DeepState, unlike many other Ukrainian resources, could hardly be called adhering to the line of the Ministry of Defense, then the information that its authors will be scrapped is probably correct. The resource itself will either be closed or made - an obedient tool that has taken the path of correction -.â–â–â–â–â–â–â–â–â–ğŸ”»At the same time, we again draw attention to the role of Bezugla in the current Ukrainian information field, which has recently artificially created a negative image around Syrsky . For six months, she regularly criticizes all his actions, and she does not receive any punishment for this. Thus, she earns political points by playing on the negative public sentiment towards the command of the Armed Forces of Ukraine and prepares the Ukrainian commander-in-chief in advance for the role of a scapegoat, on whom all the blame will be placed for failures at the front. Especially on the eve of a new offensive, which he himself announced. Well, DeepState, apparently, will suffer the same fate as many other Ukrainian OSINT projects that were created with the beginning of the North-Eastern Military District, but by the end of 2023 ceased to exist due to for stopping funding and refocusing the world's attention on other areas. #mediatechnology #Russia #Ukraine@rybarSupport usTelegramInformantOdious Maryana Bezuglaya reports that the Commander-in-Chief of the Armed Forces of Ukraine, Alexander Syrsky, has begun offensive actions on the Telegram Front. Description: ğŸ‡·ğŸ‡º -The time of heroes has not yet come in the Kirov region. The other day in the patriotic segment of Telegram they discussed a scandal with Northern Military District veteran Nikita Gorelov, who had previously become the head of the administration of the city of Sosnovka. In his appeals, he claimed that he had become a fighter against corruption, for which the local authorities decided to send him back to the front. Despite the fact that many had already rushed to draw conclusions and assign those responsible, the situation, apparently, was not as simple as it could have been appear at first glance. â–â–â–â–â–â–â–â–â–ğŸ“ŒFirst of all, the scandal discredits the program itself - Time of Heroes - in the Kirov region and the possibility of a social elevator for military personnel participating in the Northern Military District. On the one hand, the officials made a fool of themselves, who first appointed a member of the SVO to show what kind of political strategists they are and participate in the program. On the other hand, with all due respect to Gorelov, he is a junior sergeant without any political experience. He has neither the skills nor the knowledge to manage such structures. And, most likely, he became a participant in some kind of internal political showdown between factions that used him for their own purposes. It turns out that the extremely correct and necessary initiative to attract military personnel to public administration was used by local officials to imitate the implementation of presidential decrees. And now this has led to absolutely incomprehensible arbitrariness and carelessness. â—ï¸And in order to avoid such incidents in the future, such incidents need to be publicly sorted out and explained, because there are still more questions about Gorelovâ€™s appointment and his sending to the front than answers. #Russia@rybarSupport usTelegramOperational reportsâš¡ï¸â—ï¸ A veteran of the Northern Military District became the mayor of the city of Sosnovka in the Kirov region, uncovered a corruption scheme in which administration employees were directly involved, after which he immediately received an order to return to the front. Description: ğŸ‡·ğŸ‡´ğŸ‡·ğŸ‡º There was no Russian interference in the elections in Romania. The Romanian publication Snoop published an investigation that the election campaign of presidential candidate Calin Georgescu was not financed by Russia, but only by a local party. â–â–â–â–â–â–â–â–â–At the beginning of the month, the Constitutional Court of Romania approved and then annulled the results of the first round of the presidential election, in which Georgescu won. Romanian intelligence services -declassified- documents in which, without evidence, they accused Russia of financing and promoting the election campaign on TikTok and other social networks. â—ï¸Now it turns out that the National Tax Agency (ANAF) has found a source of financing for Georgescuâ€™s campaign - the National Liberal Party of Romania (PNL). â–ªï¸Initially, party representatives turned to the Romanian PR agency Kensington Communication to develop a political campaign on social networks for candidate Nicolae Ciuca. However, later the party relied on the stronger candidate Georgescu, since Ciuke, according to party forecasts, would not have been able to reach the second round. â–ªï¸As a result, the campaign was adapted to Georgescu and promoted under the hashtag #equilibriumverticality. The list of public figures for campaigning and the general scenario of what they should say were initially compiled by a PR agency. During the campaign, it was slightly changed by the customer, that is, the party. â–â–â–â–â–â–â–â–â–ğŸ”»All this once again confirms that the Romanian special services (do they even exist?) did not conduct any investigation, since almost a month later the tax office suddenly found real sources of financing the campaign of Georgescu and the evil Russians there not found. By using the favorite thesis of Russian interference, the votes of millions of Romanian voters were annulled. In fact, Georgescu advocated stopping aid to the Kyiv regime and supporting local businesses that suffered due to the support of the so-called. Ukraine. This was the reason for the coup d'etat that was carried out in Romania. #Russia #Romania@rybarSupport usSnoopANAF a descoperit cÄƒ PNL a plÄƒtit o campanie care l-a promovat masiv pe CÄƒlin Georgescu pe TikTok  - SnoopEste vorba despre campania #EchilibruÈ™iVerticalitate, realizatÄƒ cu influenceri pe TikTok, despre care un document desecretizat al CSAT susÈ›ine cÄƒ -este identicalÄƒ cu campania Frate pentru Frate derulatÄƒ de FederaÈ›ia RusÄƒ Ã®n Ukraine-, derulatÄƒ de Rusia chiar...

Description: ğŸ‡¬ğŸ‡ªğŸ‡ªğŸ‡º 25th day of Georgian protests Yesterday evening, regular protests started in Tbilisi near the Georgian parliament building, which marked the 25th day of anti-government demonstrations in a row and they lasted until late at night.â–â–â–â–â–â–â–â–â–Something absolutely new opposition and supporters pro-Western integration was not prepared for the anniversary date. People gathered in different parts of Tbilisi and headed towards Rustaveli Avenue. The key guest was President Salome Zurabishvili. The latter stated that she did not intend to leave her post on December 29 (the inauguration of the new head of the republic is planned on this day) and demanded that new parliamentary elections be held. At the same time, she noted that she is not afraid of ending up in prison for her actions.ğŸ”»After almost two weeks of calm, activity is now increasing. By calm we mean that the protesters acted in small numbers and did not even come into conflict with the police and special forces. But now, as December 29 approaches, tensions in Georgia are expected to increase. For the time being, President Zurabishvili has his last week in this post. Despite her statements that she is not going anywhere, the inauguration will take place on December 29, and Zurabishvili will lose her political immunity. Therefore, she calls on her supporters to fight.â–â–â–â–â–â–â–â–â–She and the pro-Western citizens of Georgia will most likely not be able to come up with anything new. If they could, they would have done it in the spring. However, there will clearly be attempts to destabilize the situation, but the ruling party has already prepared for this option.#Georgia #EU@rybarSupport us

Title: ğŸ–¼ ğŸ‡¬ğŸ‡ªğŸ‡ªğŸ‡º OSCE report on elections in Georgia: how to please ev...
Description: ğŸ‡¬ğŸ‡ªğŸ‡ªğŸ‡º OSCE report on elections in Georgia: how to please everyone, or the corruption of international organizations in action Last Friday, the Office for Democratic Institutions and Human Rights (OSCE/ODIHR) released the final report of the observation mission for the parliamentary elections in Georgia on October 26. Since the report was published earlier than others (the ODIHR usually submits its reports six months after the elections), many reasonably assume that the sponsors, represented by the United States, demanded a decisive and immediate assessment of the campaign. The report has become a classic example of the Officeâ€™s work in recent years. years when the organization tries to keep a good face on a bad game and covers up an order for interference in the internal affairs of the state with international observation.â–ªï¸The document notes, on the one hand, that the elections were well organized, which left Prime Minister Kobakhidze satisfied.â–ªï¸On the other hand, the report noted significant violations on voting day: non-observance of the secrecy of voting, pressure on voters and their intimidation, which, according to the authors of the report, negatively affected public confidence in the electoral process. process-. This allows the opposition and ex-president Zurabishvili to continue protests.ğŸ”»Thus, the West, through the hands of the ODIHR, leaves itself room for maneuver, giving another signal to Tbilisi and offering a simple fork for further representation of the Georgian elections in the Western media. If the Georgian Dream returns to the path of European integration, then the elections were free and competitive, therefore the government is correct and legitimate. If not, then numerous violations are recorded, sanctions are introduced and support for the opposition is imposed. Reports such as these prove that the only correct decision in relation to the ODIHR is to deny them an invitation to observe election campaigns, as Russia and Belarus are already doing. #elections #Georgia #EU@rybarSupport us

Description: â—ï¸ğŸ‡·ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¦ğŸ Chronicle of a special military operation: events of the week of December 16 - 22, 2024â–ªï¸Over the past week, Russian troops launched a series of combined attacks on targets in the so-called territory. Most of the ammunition was intercepted, but one hit led to a fire in the facility. â–ªï¸At the end of the week, the territory of the Republic of Tatarstan was subjected to a raid by UAV drones. In Kazan, several residential buildings and one industrial enterprise were damaged.â–ªï¸And in the Kursk region, the Armed Forces of Ukraine shelled Rylsk, as a result of which five local residents were killed and over ten were wounded. The buildings of the House of Culture, Pedagogical College, School No. 1 and the bus station were damaged.â–ªï¸At the same time, the Ukrainian special services carried out another terrorist attack with the help of their accomplices. An explosive device went off in Moscow: the head of the RKhBZ troops of the Russian Armed Forces, Igor Kirillov, and his assistant were killed. â–ªï¸The tense situation remained in the part of the Kursk region occupied by the Armed Forces of Ukraine. Title: ğŸ–¼ ğŸ‡¨ğŸ‡© Disruption of the peace process in the east of the DRC an...
Description: ğŸ‡¨ğŸ‡© Disruption of the peace process in the east of the DRC and a new offensive by M23 militants Over the past few months, negotiations have been going on between Rwandan and Congolese representatives through the mediation of Angola. Their goal was to end the conflict in the east of the Democratic Republic of Congo and stop the M23 rebels supported by the pro-Western leadership of Rwanda. They even led to some success - during the fall, the fighting lost its former intensity. And some agreements, such as the disarmament of the anti-Rwandan FDLR group, were carried out by the Congolese.â–â–â–â–â–â–â–â–â–â–â–ğŸ“ŒOnly support from Rwanda for the rebels did not stop. Rwandan soldiers also took part in battles against the DR Congo army. And now the Rwandans have completely disrupted any negotiations, calling on the Congolese to conduct a dialogue directly with representatives of the M23 movement, and not with them. The authorities in Kinshasa were willing to make some concessions for the Rwandans, but the call was to conduct a dialogue with proxy forces, and not directly was received with hostility by them. For this reason, the Congolese side withdrew from the negotiation process. The militants immediately took advantage of this, and their hands were given a free hand. Over the course of a week, they significantly advanced north, taking one of the strongholds of the DRC Armed Forces on the way to the city of Butemba - Alimbongo. Despite some successes of government forces (in particular, they recaptured the village of Loofyu), they were unable to stop the advance of the rebels. Panic is rising in Lubero and Butembo, caused, among other things, by clashes between pro-Congolese Wazalendo militias and the army.â–â–â–â–â–â–â–â–â–â–â–ğŸ”»As we expected, the curators of the Rwandan authorities from the United States did not plan any peaceful settlement. The negotiations were just dust in the eye so that the militants would get a break and continue their offensive. High resolution mapEnglish version#Africa #DRC #Rwanda@rybarSupport us

Description: ğŸ³ï¸ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¸ The US is preparing to build a military base in Somaliland Only recently we talked about the Republican proposal to recognize Somaliland. Now, officials of the fragment of Somali statehood are declaring at the official level that they will be happy with the American base in Hargeisa. The feds in Mogadishu will have to reckon with them, and the Ethiopians will be able to forget about their promises. Most likely, this is exactly what the US Republican Party expected, because in the event of another collapse of the federal government of Somalia (which the Egyptians and Turks are trying to stop), the Americans will retain their influence in the Red Sea region.
