Title: ğŸ–¼ ğŸ‡¸ğŸ‡¾ Syrian ex-President Bashar al-Assad made his first statem...
Description: ğŸ‡¸ğŸ‡¾ Syrian ex-President Bashar al-Assad made the first statement since the fall of his government. The politician said that he allegedly did not want to leave until the last moment and left Damascus only on the morning of December 8. He was then taken to Russia from the Khmeimim airbase in Latakia. Assad also claims that all his activities were aimed at protecting the nation, and not seeking personal gain. The former president of Syria admits that with the collapse of the state, his role has become meaningless, but the politician remains committed to Syria and hopes for its future independence. For the sake of objectivity, in past years Bashar al-Assad did not really leave the country, even when the fighting was taking place in the capital itself. But now the words do not even look like an attempt to put on a good face in a bad game, but simply an appeal - then you yourself somehow - to your own former supporters.â—ï¸After all, it was Assadâ€™s policies and the actions of his family that led to huge socio-economic problems. As a result, all the military efforts of his allies in 2015-2020 went to waste, and those Syrian fighters who had previously fought to the last in the encircled garrisons were unable to resist the onslaught of HTS. Soon, perhaps, we should expect the same speeches from other escapees representatives of Assad's authorities. They can now afford pretentious denunciations, unlike those who fought for them all these years, remained in Syria and are now under threat of reprisals from militants.#Syria@rybarSupport us

Title: ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¸ğŸ§  Possible contours of US foreign policy in Central Asia - t...
Description: ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¸ğŸ§  Possible contours of US foreign policy in Central Asia - the view of an American think-tank. As the inauguration of Donald Trump approaches, clearer contours of the possible policies of the new administration are emerging. The Quincy Institute for Responsible Government published an article about the region's importance to Washington. ğŸ”»Main points:â–No US president has ever visited the region. Unlike the United States, Vladimir Putin made 73 visits, and Xi Jinping - 13. The C5+1 summit on the sidelines of the General Assembly was more of a photo shoot than a serious event.â–In the post-Soviet republics, multipolarity is considered a good thing for the development of their countries. According to the authors, forcing them not to cooperate with Russia or China, or the Taliban will lead to nothing, so you shouldnâ€™t hope for it.â–The countries of Central Asia require respect for their culture and mentality. They will not change their internal features in order to satisfy the whims of Western countries or companies.â–Afghanistan is part of Central Asia. The countries of the region are interested in a developing and stable Afghanistan, which can become the key to the development of the region due to its position and the presence of huge reserves of natural resources.â–It is necessary to develop economic relations with the region. In recent years, the United States has seen shifts in trade with the countries of the former USSR, but they are insignificant. But at the same time, the region is important in Chinaâ€™s trade with Europe. Prospects for the development of the Middle Corridor, the availability of natural resources, and so on.â—ï¸Unlike many other materials that we have seen over the past two years, the Quincy Institute article does purport to be a realistic assessment of Central Asia in the interests of US foreign policy. The key point is that the region, according to the authors, is not yet ready to become a base for containing Russia and China. Moreover, the miscalculations of American politicians in building their tactics in the region are emphasized. The American think-tank paid special attention to Afghanistan in the sense that the countries of the region are not interested in destabilizing the neighboring state. Attempts to -demonize- the Islamic Emirate and artificially escalate the threat of ISIS largely come from the United States, and the authors, apparently, assessed this as an ineffective measure to consolidate their presence.#CentralAsia #USA@rybarSupport usResponsible StatecraftCentral Asia: The blind spot Trump can' t afford to ignoreFrom energy resources to economic growth, the region holds key assets for US foreign policy, trade, and security interests

Title: ğŸ”ğŸ–¼ ğŸ‡©ğŸ‡ªGermany The main European sponsor of UkraineğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¦ receive...
Description: Forwarded From Two MajorsğŸ‡©ğŸ‡ªGermany The main European sponsor of UkraineğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¦ receives disappointing news every week. The German Central Bank (Bundesbank) has revised the forecast for the country's economic development, which provides for a decrease in GDP by 0.2% in 2024, + 0.2% of GDP in 2025 (i.e., in fact, a rollback to the 2023 figure), +0.8 % in 2026 and + 0.7% in 2027. At the same time, the indicators of slight growth in subsequent years do not mean anything, since positive forecasts for 2023 and 2024 did not fully materialize. An energy crisis is flaring up in the country. Against the backdrop of the stock exchange price of one megawatt-hour in Germany reaching 936 euros, the Union of the German Chemical Industry announced the threat of a systemic collapse of the industry. An indicator of the growing economic problems is the announcement of steel giant Arcelor Mittal that it will close its Olpe plant by mid-2025. Previously, we reported that Thyssenkrupp Steel Corporation was reducing its production capacity (by 20%) and closing one of its enterprises. The growing debt burden began to affect ordinary burghers. According to the credit agency Creditreform, in Germany for the first half of 2024, an increase of 6.7% in private bankruptcies was recorded (35.4 thousand facts in total). Also indicative is the public condemnation of Germanyâ€™s energy policy by the Minister of Energy ğŸ‡¸ğŸ‡ª of Sweden Ebba Busch, who criticizes the German government for the thoughtless abandonment of nuclear energy, which provoked an increase in demand for fossil energy resources and prices for supplied electricity to Sweden from Germany via undersea cable (Baltic Cable).âœ¨Under these conditions, Germany is trying to find a way out of the economic crisis by injecting itself into the military-industrial complex in the hope of getting pieces of the pie from Ukraine, which is indebted to the whole world. Following the example of Germany, the rest of the European countries, where signs of economic degradation are also showing, are following a similar path, increasingly spinning the flywheel of the war machine. Description: ğŸ‡°ğŸ‡¬ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¸ About the new phase of the internal political struggle in Kyrgyzstan Today it became known that Akylbek Japarov wrote a letter of resignation from the post of Prime Minister of Kyrgyzstan. This is a person who is considered a conductor of Western interests, primarily the USA and Great Britain.â—ï¸A tour of Great Britain last fall, increasingly frequent visits by representatives of the Rothschild family to the republic in order to gain control over natural resources, constant meetings with the British ambassador in Bishkek - this only a small part of Akylbek Japarovâ€™s merits over the past year. In Kyrgyzstan itself, Akylbek Japarov is considered almost a national treasure due to the fact that under him the economy of Kyrgyzstan grew sharply. However, for some reason, everyone forgets that the jump occurred during the period of sanctions on Russia, and the associated bypass through partner countries such as Kyrgyzstan. Considering the role of the ex-prime minister in the events around Kyrgyzstan, it is extremely unlikely that his political career is over. According to rumors from Kyrgyz sources, Akylbek Japarov has already been given an agremand for the post of Ambassador of Kyrgyzstan to the United States. ğŸ“Œ As for replacing the Prime Minister, the situation here is interesting, and there are several options for development.â–Firstly, the power bloc may be strengthened. In such situations, the head of the State Committee for National Security, Kamchybek Tashiev, will strengthen his position through the vacancy.â–Former Prime Minister Omurbek Babanov is considered another candidate. His appearance in this position will balance the political and regional alignments in Kyrgyzstan, taking into account his connections and financial capabilities.â–Well, the third option is the most compromise. A politician without serious influence will be appointed, which will make him a convenient figure for representatives of both the security and political blocs. The further development of events will depend on the appointment of the head of the government of Kyrgyzstan. Considering that elections are at stake (and, possibly, early elections), this post can determine the entire policy and development of the internal political situation in Kyrgyzstan.#Kyrgyzstan #USA@rybarSupport usInterfaxPrime Minister of Kyrgyzstan Akylbek Japarov has been relieved of his postPrime Minister of Kyrgyzstan Akylbek Japarov has been relieved of his post, sources in the presidential administration told Interfax.

Title: ğŸ–¼ ğŸ‡¸ğŸ‡© The situation in Sudan: the liberation of Sinj and the fi...
Description: ğŸ‡¸ğŸ‡© The situation in Sudan: the liberation of Sinj and the fighting in El Fasher as of December 15, 2024 Over the past month, the Sudanese army has continued to develop its offensive and consolidate previous successes: previously, the armed forces managed to cut off the Sennar ledge. However, the rebels represented by the Rapid Reaction Forces (RRF) do not give up and are strengthening their positions in the south.â–ªï¸The offensive of the armed forces in the Sennar region led to the liberation of its administrative center, the city of Sinja. Some towns in the vicinity and north of Sennar were also retaken. With this, the army finally broke the communications of the rebel group in the White Nile with the rest of the forces.â–ªï¸However, this did not stop the RRF in its advance along the border with South Sudan. During the last battles, they managed to occupy some settlements in the Blue Nile. In this area, the Sudanese armed forces are experiencing a shortage of personnel. At the same time, the army is using its advantage in aviation and conducting counterattacks.â–ªï¸In the west of the country, bloody battles continue in the city of El Fasher. RRF militants were able to advance to the city center, capturing several areas. There is also significant support from rebel artillery in this direction. â–ªï¸In the capital, fighting remains intense - the armed forces have failed to expand their bridgehead in Khartoum. At the same time, RRF militants cannot drive the army out of Omdurman by carrying out unsuccessful attacks.ğŸ”»The situation is increasingly in favor of government forces who do not agree to peace initiatives, counting on new victories. At the same time, external actors still insist on resolving the conflict through negotiations. ğŸ“ŒSo, Turkish President Recep Erdogan also offered his help. According to him, Turkey can also become a negotiating platform between the official government of Sudan and the sponsors of the rebel RRF from the UAE. Another Turkish peace initiative in the negotiations between Somalia and Ethiopia quickly failed, which is why the prospects for Turkish mediation in Sudan confuse many. This is also understood in Sudan, where they strongly support Russian economic projects and diplomatic initiatives. High-resolution map Russian version#Africa #Sudan@rybarSupport us

Description: Forwarded From Two Majors#Summary for the morning of December 16, 2024â–ªï¸In the Kursk region, the North group of troops reports fierce battles in the Sudzhansky district, our units are advancing near Guevo. â–ªï¸ North of Kupyansk, our troops continue to form bridgeheads on the right bank of the river. Oskol. There have been separate reports about the creation of a new landing point for the Russian Armed Forces - against the settlement. The enemy, retreating, undermines the abandoned buildings. Heavy fighting is going on.â–ªï¸ In the Pokrovsky direction there are battles near the settlement. Shevchenko, located south of the city. It was reported that the enemy brought reserves into battle to hold Pokrovsk.â–ªï¸ In Kurakhovo, the enemy admits the complete loss of a block of multi-storey buildings. Most of the city is under the Russian Armed Forces. The battles near Constantinople continue, the Uspenivsky pocket is being cleared, Annovka has been taken. New Komar, which is located in the north of the cascade of these villages. Bolotnikov, a man born in 1974 was wounded, on Pobeda Ave. women born in 1966 and 1952 were wounded. Novoocheretovatoe, north of Velikaya Novoselka. The enemy's crossing was destroyed by the FAB strike. There are separate reports of a new assault on New Komar. Preliminarilyâ€¦

Title: ğŸ¬ â—ï¸ğŸ‡·ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¦ğŸ Chronicle of a special military operation: events...
Description: â—ï¸ğŸ‡·ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¦ğŸ Chronicle of a special military operation: events of the week 9 - December 15, 2024â–ªï¸Russian troops, after a short lull, again launched a combined strike on enemy targets in the western regions of the so-called. Ukraine. In the Ivano-Frankivsk region, arrivals were noted in the area of â€‹â€‹the Burshtyn thermal power plant and at the Kolomyia airfield, and in the Cherkasy region, the Kaniv hydroelectric power station was hit.â–ªï¸ At the same time, in the center of Dnepropetrovsk, local partisans detonated an explosive device on the territory of the regional military registration and enlistment office. As a result of the detonation, at least one TCC employee was killed, and several more police officers and military personnel of the Armed Forces of Ukraine were injured.â–ªï¸Ukrainian formations, in turn, after a long period of time again tried to attack the military airfield in Saratov. The drone was shot down on approach to the facility, without causing any damage to the infrastructure.â–ªï¸The enemy did not ignore the facilities of the fuel and energy complex. As a result of flying through the territory of a loading point in Bryansk, a fire broke out at the facility, which was quickly extinguished.â–ªï¸Another energy facility was damaged by a raid by Ukrainian drones on an oil storage facility near Orel. As a result of the detonation of the UAV, two fuel tanks caught fire, which were extinguished after 23 hours.â–ªï¸In addition, Ukrainian formations attacked the Rostov region for the first time with American operational-tactical missiles. As a result of the air defense, two missiles were shot down and four more were diverted from their course by electronic warfare systems. There is no significant damage, there are casualties among the personnel.â–ªï¸Twice in a week, the barracks buildings of the special regiment of the Ministry of Internal Affairs in Grozny are also damaged. As a result of one of the Ukrainian drone attacks, at least four guard soldiers were injured.â–ªï¸And in the Leningrad region, one of the Ukrainian drones carried out reconnaissance of the area in the area of â€‹â€‹Vysotsky Island. As a result of the work of air defense forces, the drone fell in the Gulf of Finland, there was no damage or casualties.#video #digest #map #Russia #Ukraine@rybarSupport us Video is too big

Title: ğŸ‡¬ğŸ‡ªğŸ‡ªğŸ‡º Protests are taking place in Tbilisi again this evening....
Description: ğŸ‡¬ğŸ‡ªğŸ‡ªğŸ‡º Protests are taking place in Tbilisi again this evening. However, judging by the amount of news, interest in them is steadily declining. The victory in the presidential elections of Mikheil Kavelashvili, a candidate from the ruling Georgian Dream party, means that the opposition will soon lose one of its symbolic leaders in a high post - Salome Zurabishvili, who actively called on fellow citizens to street protests according to the scenario of the Ukrainian Maidan. The next escalation is now expected on December 29 - after Kavelashviliâ€™s inauguration - because Zurabishvili will no longer have any rights to occupy residences and call himself president. However, this protest (if it exists) will most likely quickly fade for a number of reasons:â–because the president in Georgia is still a ceremonial figure, for the sake of whose salvation it is unlikely that it will be possible to raise large masses of dissatisfied people;â–the opposition is not united in its fight against government;â–The West, represented by the same Macron, demonstrates its readiness to maintain connections and communicate with official Tbilisi - an example of this is the recent telephone conversation between the French leader and Bidzina Ivanishvili;â–in Georgia they respond in the same way, saying that they do not refuse to join the EU. ğŸ”»And, probably, such a balancing, subject to the prompt response of the Georgian authorities to the excesses and new provocations of the opposition, will allow the government to continue to restrain destructive forces in a comfortable manner.#Georgia #EU@rybarSupport us

Title: ğŸ”ğŸ–¼ ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¸ Donald Trump appointed Richard Grenell as special envoy...
Description: Forwarded From American IssueğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¸ Donald Trump appointed Richard Grenell as special envoy for special missions, entrusting him with work in sensitive regions such as Venezuela and North Korea. In fact, his candidacy was previously considered for the post of US Secretary of State, but the position ultimately went to the vice chairman of the Senate Intelligence Committee, Marco Rubio.ğŸ”»What could Grenell's appointment mean and how will it affect the policies of the Trump administration?â–ªï¸Grenell's diplomatic style is characterized by directness and a willingness to negotiate toughly, which is generally consistent with Trump's approach to international relations. This also indirectly indicates the future administration's willingness to use unconventional methods to resolve crises.â–ªï¸Grenell's experience in the Balkans (role in resolving differences between Serbia and Kosovo) demonstrates an emphasis on making quick, but not always sustainable, deals.â–ªï¸Grenell shares Trump's philosophy that that foreign policy should be based on transactions, not ideological principles. This could mean an increased pragmatic approach to negotiations, with compromises based on economic or military benefits for the United States.â–ªï¸Although Grenell was not appointed special envoy for Ukraine, his views, including proposals for the creation of autonomous zones in eastern Ukraine and skepticism about NATO expansion may still influence the Trump administration's policy towards the Ukrainian conflict.â–ªï¸For US allies, this could be a signal of tougher approach to security issues and trade relations - for example, with Germany and the European Union, with which Grenell had tense relations during his tenure as ambassador. â–ªï¸For Russia and China, Grenell's appointment is a signal of U.S. readiness to employ more assertive diplomatic tactics.â–ªï¸Grenell's appointment as special envoy for special missions signals the Trump administration's intent to aggressively advance its foreign policy priorities through direct diplomacy and the use of proven personnel.â–ªï¸Grenell is one of the key figures of the -Trumpist- approach to governance: the emphasis on personal loyalty is more important than traditional bureaucratic expertise. In general, Trump's approach to selection candidates for such positions are not much different from the methods of the previous administration. Now the Trump team is selling the people -protection of US interests-, and under Biden it was called -defense of democracy-. In fact, everything is primarily subordinated to one thing - protecting the interests of Americaâ€™s economic and military corporations. And with the advent of Donald Trump, this approach is unlikely to change.@usaperiodical

Title: ğŸ–¼ ğŸ‡·ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¦ Aleksandro-Kalinovskoe direction: breakthrough to the...
Description: ğŸ‡·ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¦ Aleksandro-Kalinovskoe direction: breakthrough into the Khimkolonka microdistrict and liberation of the Zabalka microdistrict, situation as of 18:00 on December 15, 2024. In the Aleksandro-Kalinovskoe direction, Russian troops pushed through enemy defenses in several areas in Dzerzhinsk at once. â–ªï¸Fierce fighting in the city is taking place in the central market area. Previously, in this area, the defense of the Ukrainian Armed Forces relied on the mine named after. Dzerzhinsky - reserves were accumulated there before subsequent transfer to urban areas. After the structure came under the control of Russian troops, the stability of the enemyâ€™s defense line was seriously compromised. â–ªï¸Southwest of the Russian Armed Forces are advancing in the Khimkolonka microdistrict, relying on the mine. This would have been impossible without the liquidation of the positions of the Ukrainian formations on the waste heaps, from where the UAV calculations were adjusted and the area was monitored. â–ªï¸At the moment, waste heaps No. 1 and 2 are in the gray zone, and the enemyâ€™s attempts to regain control over them are being thwarted. Taking into account recently received georeferences and data from local sources, Russian attack aircraft are confidently advancing in this area and eliminating the Ukrainian Armed Forcesâ€™ defense centers. It is likely that the Russian Armed Forces will soon gain a foothold on the heights, which will create additional difficulties for the enemy garrison. â—ï¸A characteristic feature of the battle for Dzerzhinsk was the widespread use of sapper units by the parties. With their help, the enemy blows up multi-story buildings in order to prevent the Russian Armed Forces from using them as shelters. â–ªï¸In the south of the city, Russian troops completely knocked out Ukrainian formations from the Zabalka microdistrict. In recent weeks, the enemy has sought to prevent its western outskirts from coming under the control of the Russian Armed Forces, for which purpose he has been transferring reserves across roads near waste heaps. These routes were scouted by Russian UAV crews, as a result of which many armored groups of the Armed Forces of Ukraine were burned on the approaches to the microdistrict. Establishing control over waste heaps and the success of the offensive in the Khimkolonka microdistrict will create the preconditions for an offensive in the northern part of Dzerzhinsk with the subsequent creation of a northern claw envelopment around the remaining in the city of the Ukrainian Armed Forces garrison. It is likely that in the near future the RF Armed Forces will concentrate on suppressing the positions of the Ukrainian Armed Forces on the waste heaps of the Toretskaya mine, which are the predominant heights within the city. If you have additions to the situation, you want us to highlight the successes of your unit, you can always write to us in the feedback bot @rybar_feedback_bot High resolution mapEnglish versionâ­ï¸ Online maps are available by subscription to map.rybar.ru #Dzerzhinsk # digest #map #Russia #Ukraine@rybarSupport us

Title: ğŸ–¼ ğŸ‡·ğŸ‡ºğŸ“¸ğŸ– Day of Remembrance for Journalists Who Died in the Li...
Description: ğŸ‡·ğŸ‡ºğŸ“¸ğŸ– Day of Remembrance for Journalists Who Died in the Line of Duty December 15 is a special date when we remember those who dedicated their lives to the truth and died while remaining faithful to their professional and human duty. Journalists, reporters, photographers, television cameramen who go to the most dangerous places in the world not only document history, but also make it accessible to each of us. Wars, local conflicts, disasters and hot spots are not only an arena of military action, but also a place where those who strive to tell about events honestly, without distorting reality, work. They often pay the ultimate price for this devotion. Relatives, friends and colleagues remember and honor everyone who passed away while fulfilling their mission. Their sacrifice reminds us of the importance and value of truth, for which they risked everything. Remembering them means continuing the fight for justice and honest information in a world where it is often rare. High resolution art#art #Russia@rybarSupport us

Title: ğŸ”ğŸ–¼ Today, together with the Rybar team, we are launching a proj...
Description: Forwarded From RaZVozhaevToday, together with the Rybar team, we are launching a project dedicated to the 810th Separate Guards Order of Zhukov and Ushakov Marine Brigade of the Black Sea Fleet - #Comic 810 No. 1: SudzhaAs Governor of the Hero City and Head of the State Council Commission on Culture and Traditional Spiritual and Moral Values I see that there is a shortage of modern formats for communicating schoolchildren's exploits of our children. And thatâ€™s why I proposed making such a joint project for the Rybar team - a comic book about our guys from the 810th brigade, based on real events. Since its founding in 1967, the Marines of the 810th have repeatedly shown: where they are, there is Victory. Today, soldiers of the 810th find themselves on a variety of fronts, including the Sudzhansky district of the Kursk region, where they continue to fight against Ukrainian formations. The comic book about the 810th brigade is intended to serve as a reminder that the Marine Corps is not only the pride of the fleet, but also the support of Sevastopol, whose history is closely connected with military exploits.ğŸ“The first issue of the comic book about the 810th brigade Marines is available at the link I am sure that stories about our Marines will become popular among children. In the future, comics will be available in our children's and school libraries.#WSRF #Russia #Sevastopol

Title: ğŸ–¼ ğŸ‡·ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¦ Kupyansko-Svatovsk direction: about the landing of th...
Description: ğŸ‡·ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¦ Kupyansko-Svatovsk direction: about the landing of the Russian Armed Forces in the Masyutovka area; the situation as of 16:00 on December 15, 2024. The Kupyansko-Svatovsk direction was again in the spotlight. The enemy's analysts were again to blame for this. Since the night, in the Ukrainian media segment, unsubstantiated statements about the next crossing of the Russian Armed Forces through Oskol from Masyutovka to the opposite bank have been massively replicated.â–ªï¸At the moment, this story is reminiscent of the recent events near Novomlynsk, when the Ukrainian media announced a landing of the Russian Armed Forces in the village, who later heroically managed to knock him out of the village. Following the battles, not a single trophy from the battlefield or Russian prisoner of war was demonstrated. Until this hour, no clear footage of objective control had been received from the Masyutovka area, which could confirm not just the consolidation of Russian military personnel in this area, but even just their presence. Previously, there were such personnel from the enemy, but now there are none. Information from the field also does not confirm a Russian landing on the right bank of Oskol.ğŸ”»The area itself is also not conducive to crossing to the opposite bank of the river. The difference in elevation is about a hundred meters: the entire territory held by the Russian army near Masyutovka and Gryannikovka is located in the lowlands, and the opposite bank, in addition to the dominant heights, is also replete with nature reserves and a large number of forests, in which infantry and equipment can be secretly accumulated to repel potential Russian attacks. â–ªï¸Fierce clashes continue in the area of â€‹â€‹Kolesnikovka and Zagryzovo. Ukrainian formations and the Russian Armed Forces strike positions and use heavy armored vehicles in fire raids.â–ªï¸In addition, messages appear online on various sources, both from pro-Russian and pro-Ukrainian sources, about the advance of Russian troops in the vicinity of Lozovaya and to the north-west from Cherry. The information has not yet been confirmed by objective monitoring personnel, however, it is possible that the Russian Armed Forces launched attacks in this area in recent days, taking advantage of weather conditions unfavorable for UAV operators. If you have any additions to the situation, you would like us to highlight the successes of your unit, â€” You can always write to us in the feedback bot @rybar_feedback_bot High resolution mapEnglish version#digest #Kupyansk #map #Russia #Ukraine@rybarSupport us

Title: ğŸ–¼ â­ï¸ğŸ–#Comic 810 No. 1: Sudzha The Fisherman Team together with ...
Description: â­ï¸ğŸ–#Comic 810 No. 1: SudzhaTeam Rybar, together with the leadership of Sevastopol, is launching a project dedicated to the 810th Separate Guards Order of Zhukov and Ushakov Marine Brigade of the Black Sea Fleet. The occasion is more than worthy - the birthday of the brigade, which is turning 57 years old. Since its founding in 1967, the Marines of the 810th have repeatedly proven that they are ready to defend the country in the most difficult conditions. Based on the number of units formed and the range of tasks performed, it is high time for the 810th brigade to be called a division. Today, 810 fighters find themselves on a variety of fronts - including the Sudzhansky district of the Kursk region, where they continue to fight Ukrainian formations. For the head of Sevastopol Mikhail Razvozhaev @razvozhaev, this project is not just a tribute. The leadership of the hero city understands that the existing formats for conveying information about the exploits of the Marines are not enough - especially when it comes to the younger generation. Comic 810 is intended to serve as a reminder that the Marine Corps is not only the pride of the fleet, but also the support of the city, whose history is closely connected with military exploits.ğŸ“The first issue of the comic about the 810 Marine Brigade is available at the link #VSRF #Crimea #Russia #Sevastopol #Ukraine @rybarSupport us

Title: ğŸ‡²ğŸ‡©ğŸ—³ About massive violations of voting rights during elections...
Description: ğŸ‡²ğŸ‡©ğŸ—³ About massive violations of voting rights in elections and referendums in MoldovaThe presidential elections and the referendum on European integration in Moldova have already been clearly recognized as valid, and the attention of the opposition (communists and socialists) has switched to preparations for the 2025 parliamentary elections. Against the backdrop of the unprecedented cancellation of the results of the first round of presidential elections in Romania, it can now be seen that a new standard of democracy has emerged in Eastern Europe at the instigation of the West. ğŸ–‡And recently an expert report appeared, incorporating facts of massive violations of the electoral rights of citizens of Moldova and reflecting these new -standards-. ğŸ”»Foreign interferenceâ–ªï¸The Central Election Commission of Moldova, which should be independent and financed from the state budget, allowed the UNDP to develop its website with money from the American USAID, the British UKAid and the Embassy of the Netherlands.â–ªï¸Most of the candidates for the presidency had Romanian citizenship.â–ªï¸The head of the European Commission Ursula von der Leyen before called on Moldovans to vote go to vote and promised the largest aid package of 1.8 billion euros.â–ªï¸The EU, at the request of Chisinau, sent a rapid response team to cyber threats, which monitored the cybersecurity situation during the first round and referendum. This group was headed by employees of the Lithuanian Ministry of Defense, it also included specialists from Belgium, the Netherlands, Croatia, Romania, Poland, Austria, Latvia.ğŸ”»Foreign voting â–ªï¸234 polling stations were established for voting abroad. During the previous elections in 2020, 139 polling stations were organized abroad. Most of the new polling stations were in Europe and the USA.â–ªï¸For the first time, voting by mail was used, but only for the USA, Canada, Norway, Sweden, Iceland, Finland. â–ªï¸In Russia, only two polling stations were organized, to which only 10,000 ballots were delivered. However, according to the Moldovan Ministry of Foreign Affairs, there are about 260,000 Moldovan citizens in the Russian Federation.â–ªï¸Sometimes the number of ballots in foreign polling stations exceeded the number of Moldovans in the country. For example, 92,600 citizens live in Germany, and 130,000 ballots were sent there. There were numerous other violations that affected the reliability of the voting results in the elections and referendum in Moldova. As a result, the president of the diaspora, Maia Sandu, along with her referendum, joined the club of illegitimate leaders along with Vladimir Zelensky and Solome Zarubashvili, which shows a demonstrative disregard for the institution of elections and the will of the people on the part of the West. #elections #Moldova #CIS @rybarSupport usTelegramRybarğŸ‡²ğŸ‡© ğŸ—³ In a few days Before the second round of presidential elections, the Constitutional Court of Moldova approved the results of the referendum on European integration. Let us remind you that the referendum was won by a margin of less than 1%. At the same time, the majority of the population of Moldova voted against...

Title: ğŸ–¼ ğŸ‡·ğŸ‡ºğŸ–‡ï¸ Head of the @rybar analytical center Mikhail Zvinchuk ...
Description: ğŸ‡·ğŸ‡ºğŸ–‡ï¸ Head of the @rybar analytical center Mikhail Zvinchuk spoke to employees of government organizations and non-governmental NGOs, youth and volunteer organizations of the Yamalo-Nenets Autonomous Okrug. There was a lot of talk about the correct positioning of projects, what role visual propaganda can play in the fight against disinformation, and what a humanitarian project should be like in order for the audience to react to it correctly. Next year in Yamal has been declared the Year of Heroes, so we talked in detail about our practices and approaches to forming the correct image of a hero - no matter whether we are talking about the indigenous peoples of the north, home front workers or veterans of the Northern Military District. Each hero must be unique and memorable: This is the only way to create a new galaxy of images and symbols that will become examples for contemporaries and the younger generation.#speech #mediatechnology #Russia@rybarSupport us

Title: ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¸ğŸ‡¹ğŸ‡¬ About US nuclear expansion in Africa The American compan...
Description: ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¸ğŸ‡¹ğŸ‡¬ About US nuclear expansion in Africa The American nuclear energy company NANO Nuclear Energy signed a memorandum of understanding with the Togolese government. This is the second such agreement by a US developer after Rwanda. As part of the memorandum, NANO Nuclear will supply small nuclear reactors, fuel plants and transport nuclear materials to Togo. In addition, Kenya is in the interests of American nuclear energy producers. After the protests that took place in the country, the Americans quickly picked up the weak President Ruto and imposed their services on him - green energy -.ğŸ”»This is the trend towards active expansion of American nuclear energy in Africa. Title: ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¸ğŸ›° The United States continues to invest in military space pr...
Description: ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¸ğŸ›° The United States continues to invest in military space projects. One of these is the Next-Gen OPIR program launched in 2018 to create a new generation satellite missile attack warning system (MSWS). The cost of implementing the initiative is estimated at $14 billion. The constellation will consist of two satellites in geostationary and two in polar highly elliptical orbit , with the first device planned to be launched at the end of 2025. The main contractor is Lockheed Martin Space. At the same time, the Pentagon is developing similar systems for placement in low and low-Earth orbit. In fact, we are talking about tracking the launches of any ballistic missiles anywhere in the world with prompt transmission of information about the exact location of the launch positions. Such programs again show what role the United States assigns to confrontation in space. By deploying space infrastructure, the Pentagon strives to gain technological superiority, which will help neutralize the fire capabilities of a potential (and not only) enemy. The transformation of space into the battlefield of modern conflicts is almost a fait accompli, in which the absence of countermeasures or similar systems is fraught with expected consequences in the event fighting with the side that has them.#space #weapons #USA@rybarSupport usMedia - Lockheed MartinLockheed Martin Advances First Next-Gen OPIR Missile Warning Satellite Toward LaunchSunnyvale, Calif., Dec. 10, 2024 â€“ Lockheed Martin (NYSE: LMT) fully assembled, powered-on and advanced the U.S. Space Forceâ€™s first Next-Generation Overhead Persistent Infrared (Next-Gen...

Title: ğŸ” #Review #Summary for the morning of December 15, 2024 â–ªï¸ On th...
Description: Forwarded From Two Majors#Review #Report for the morning of December 15, 2024â–ªï¸ On the eve of the negotiation process expected by Zelensky after Trumpâ€™s arrival in the White House (January 20), the enemy is increasing efforts to hold positions in the Kursk region, striking with long-range American weapons on our territory and forms strike formations to create new centers of tension. Thus, in the Kursk region, despite the collapse of the Ukrainian Armed Forcesâ€™ defense in Plekhovo and the narrowing of logistics capabilities, the enemy is throwing expensive German and British tanks into battle, placing manpower in maneuverable defense, regardless of losses. The ATACMS strike on Taganrog caused a retaliatory massive raid on Ukrainian energy and military facilities, but clearly did not stop the bad guys in Kyiv, although even Trump admits the dead end of using not so many American missiles on Russian territory. Now the main question remains the direction of the Nazisâ€™ final strike, which will allow them to create at least the appearance of a strong position if negotiations begin. Crimea, Bryansk, Kherson and Zaporozhye regions, if they become such a target, will only be used as a diversionary strike by the enemy. More and more often they are writing about a possible attempt by the Ukrainian Armed Forces to repeat the Kursk adventure in the Belgorod direction with movement across the border to the north along the rear of our group of troops. However, the enemy is now purposefully playing a big game of misinformation of our intelligence and is trying to hide his true intentions in the strongest information noise.â–ªï¸ Yesterdayâ€™s news about the transfer of an entire military unit to Pokrovsk (Krasnoarmeysk) indicates that the enemy has reserves. Preliminarily - the 3rd separate assault brigade of the Ukrainian Armed Forces, the backbone of which consists of Azov terrorists. In fact, an elite unit has been brought into battle, the historical analogies are obvious. â–ªï¸ In Kurakhovo and the surrounding area, the enemy forbids his almost completely encircled troops to retreat, despite requests from the field. On radio broadcasts, the Armed Forces of Ukraine's repeated appeals to the senior command do not find approval. The enemy is trying to delay our offensive at any cost.â–ªï¸ In the Kupyansky direction, the Russian Armed Forces are trying to expand the bridgehead on the right bank of the river. Oskol, in Chasov Yar there are battles near the fireproof plant (the enemyâ€™s main stronghold). On the Zaporozhye Front, advanced units are conducting offensive operations, but the main forces have not been brought into battle. The enemy is still expecting an attack on Kherson through the Dnieper, trying to completely reveal our plans. â–ªï¸ The supply of equipment through the Ministry of Defense to advanced units remains a problematic issue. That is, the same Maviks, off-road vehicles and other technical equipment important for attack aircraft do not always quickly reach the front end. Hence the attacks on enemy positions in customized passenger cars, hundreds and hundreds of requests for volunteers. At the same time, Defense Minister Belousov is gradually taking personnel measures in relation to military leaders, trying not to break what is working. â–ªï¸ The enemyâ€™s actions in the information field are aimed at misleading our military leadership. A striking example were further exaggerations about the scale of damage after a missile strike this week. Although in fact in many places the lights were turned off to avoid network overloads while awaiting arrivals. Also, numerous reports from that side of the front about the deplorable state of the Armed Forces of Ukraine are only partly true. The enemy maintains combat stability, provides organized resistance, achieving the main strategic goal set for him by the West - inflicting maximum military and economic damage on our country. It doesnâ€™t matter to Washington whether our troops took Annovka or not; the West is trying to drain our military potential against Ukraine as much as possible. In addition, the sent Ukrainian information about the severity of the battles is intended to justify to the remnants of the enemy population the reduction in the mobilization age, which the United States demands in exchange for new shipments of weapons. Continued belowTelegramTwo majorsStart above â–ªï¸At the same time, military-technical support for Ukraine is developing, Americaâ€™s European satellites are already preparing the population for an increase military spending, carrying out the deployment of military production to the detriment of the standard of living in the EU. On the other sideâ€¦

Title: ğŸ” I had time to take a little breath - I listened to this round ...
Description: Forwarded From Prince Cherkassky I had time to take a slight breath - I listened to this round table about the situation in Syria. I wonâ€™t try to be too clever; the smart people there have basically already said everything. Iâ€™ll add my thoughts (maybe Iâ€™ll repeat myself): 1. The Russian presence is now experiencing a catastrophe. We bet on the horse, saved (together) from death, but the horse turned out to be a donkey, which, however, we did not particularly strive to ennoble, as a result of which he unexpectedly died. And thereâ€™s nothing you can do about itâ€”you need to realize, accept it, and move on. 2. You canâ€™t have any illusions about the three-stars who seized power. Russia in this case is their enemy, or rather an ally of the main enemy, who conscientiously ironed them out and they remember this very well. And on occasion they remind you without microphones.3. Save who and how you can among the pro-Russian ones. The time will come (and it will definitely come) - all of them will be useful to us in the future. 4. Bases pinched by the Turks from the straits and with space blocked from the north, and now also as virtual hostages of HTS - devalue all those few advantages and are a negative factor. Contrary to the reasoning of the Turks, the Americans do not need any counterbalance from us now; they believe that they will figure it out themselves. The fact that there was a threat of sagging with Africa (even the supply of the bases themselves after the start of the Northern Military District became a problem) I, and not only me, wrote earlier, pointing out that additional safety routes are needed, both air and sea. Paradoxically, maintaining our bases could be beneficial for the Americans in order to remain a thorn in the side of the Turks, but not to such an extent as to actually lobby them.5. If Trump leaves Syria, he will be like Biden with Afghanistan. Let it be distant, without drama, but still. Abandoned allies and swelled with self-importance, Turkey is no longer a slightly lost NATO member that is too often insolent and self-willed. Again, the Gulf monarchies (KSA in the first place) will be even more strengthened in the idea that after Afghanistan the second time is no longer an accident and we need to somehow work more closely with others and look less back at such an ally.6. I think Qatar will give money to HTS or has already agreed, at least for the first time, so as not to stretch its legs. The main ones who want to bask in this are the Turks, given the leaky market and the instant flow of currency beyond the borders of the former Syria.7. If HTS still agrees to autonomy for the Kurds, this will be a blow for Turkey. And there is no need to compare Iraqi Kurdistan and Syrian. Even the Kurds themselves are different, not to mention the fact that Barzani has been collaborating with the Turks for a long time and is not friends with the PKK. There is no such Barzani in Syria, although there, too, within the Kurds there are about 50/50 those who are close to the PKK and those who are not. Itâ€™s just that the pro-PKK forces there are the most militant.8. Now the Syrian population (part of it) is euphoric. Everyone expects quick improvements after liberation from the bloody regime. Perhaps this will happen partially and in some places, but fundamentally, without huge injections of money for the purchase of oil (or the return of Trans-Euphrates, but it also needs to be restored) and wheat, spending on the restoration of basic infrastructure, the situation will not change, and most likely, on the contrary, will worsen. The bottom line is that we need to record damage, minimize further losses and allow the situation to drift further, monitoring and rebooting the concept. https://t.me/lukyanovtalk/287Telegram That same Lukyanov A dynamic and meaningful exchange of views on what is happening in Syria took place yesterday as part of the RIAC round table - The Syrian crisis: reasons for the aggravation of the situation and possible consequences - in MIA - Russia Today -.ğŸ“½ The entry was posted in open access: Watch...

Title: ğŸ”ğŸ¬ So, the finale. The fourth and final part of the tetralogy -...
Description: Forwarded From Realdoc So, the finale. The fourth and final part of the tetralogy -At the Edge of the Abyss- has been released. The film won the hearts of the audience, and many managed to become morally close to our Heroes. And some colleagues say that we set an unattainable bar for them. -On the approaches to Azovstal- - this is probably the most poignant part, the apogee of our film. Where metal melted and concrete crumbled into dust, new strongholds grew - strongholds of the human spirit. The Somali battalion, after two months of continuous fighting, is already preparing to be sent home to rest, but a new order arrives, and the soldiers are removed from the rotation - they are sent to displace them enemy to -Azovstal-. Now they have to, having passed through mines under heavy fire, clear the last quarters and gain a foothold in houses on approaches to the industrial plant. The assault and direct combat contact with the enemy were filmed in the ranks of the Somalis. Having completed the task, the exhausted soldiers meet people leaving the basements - the last hostages. Those lucky enough to survive come out into the light... On that sunny day, the onset of spring was especially felt. Title: ğŸ–¼ ğŸ‡·ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¦ Pokrovsk direction: battles north of Novogrodovka and...
Description: ğŸ‡·ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¦ Pokrovsk direction: fighting north of Novogrodovka and in Pushkino situation by the end of the day on December 14, 2024 Fierce battles continue in the Pokrovsk direction a couple of kilometers south of Pokrovsk and Mirnograd. Russian troops became more active in several areas at the same time, getting closer and closer to the Pokrovsk agglomeration.â–ªï¸In Shevchenko, the presence of assault groups of the Russian Armed Forces was noted in the area of â€‹â€‹a local school, which was fired at point-blank by an enemy tank. Judging by the weather, the events took place at least two weeks ago, so it is not yet possible to say reliably how the front line in the populated area now lies. At the same time, in neighboring Peschany, one of the largest mines of the Ukrainian steel holding, Metinvest, for the extraction of coking coal was stopped. Although the enterprise had created reserves of raw materials in advance and removed personnel, in the future the loss of coke production could have a significant impact on the enterprises of the Ukrainian defense industry.â–ªï¸ At the same time, to the east near Novogrodovka, Russian troops advanced along the forest belt near Nikolaevka towards Mirnograd. Previously, throughout October-November, there were dozens of attacks on the positions of the Russian Armed Forces near the railway by forces of the 425th Special Operations Brigade of the Ukrainian Armed Forces -Skala-, which were repelled with varying degrees of success. As soon as they were transferred as a fire brigade to the previously mentioned Shevchenko, progress was immediately achieved in the area, and the Ukrainian units transferred to replace those who left have a worse level of equipment and training. Therefore, we can expect further development of the successes of the Russian Armed Forces north of Novogrodovka in the future. Title: ğŸ–¼ ğŸ‡·ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¦ Kurakhovo direction: advance in the center of Kurakho...
Description: ğŸ‡·ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¦ Kurakhovo direction: advance in the center of Kurakhovo and fighting in Constantinoplesituation by the end of the day on December 14, 2024. In recent days, Russian troops have managed to achieve significant successes in Kurakhovo. Fighting also continues at the Uspenovka-Konstantinopolskoye line, where the enemy is trying to hold back the onslaught of attack aircraft of the Russian Armed Forces.â–ªï¸In Kurakhovo itself, units of the 5th Motorized Rifle Brigade, by installing minefields, thwarted a counterattack of the Armed Forces of Ukraine on two armored fighting vehicles in the area of â€‹â€‹a garage cooperative on Zaporozhye Avenue. One armored vehicle was destroyed, the second retreated to the west. Probably, after clearing the Roevsky elevator near the southern shore of the Kurakhovsky reservoir, significant success was soon achieved. This suggests that the concentration of Ukrainian units remaining in the city is minimal, which allows the soldiers to lay minefields virtually in the gray zone right under the enemyâ€™s nose.â–ªï¸At the same time, in the city center, stormtroopers hoisted a flag on the building of the Kurakhovo city administration on Mira Avenue. Judging by the fact that the fighters are moving around the area relatively calmly, this area was cleared of the enemy at the time the footage was taken. On Pushkin Street near school No. 2 and in the western part of Soborny Avenue, clashes are still ongoing. Nevertheless, one of the few serious defense centers of the Ukrainian Armed Forces in the city remains the industrial zone and the Kurakhovskaya Thermal Power Plant on the western outskirts. Whether the enemy will cling to it to the last or members of the Ukrainian formations will have to hastily flee further west in the direction of Dachnoye will become clear very soon. At the same time, footage of the hoisting of flags in the central and western parts of Elizavetovka was published on the Internet. Although the settlement was already liberated some time ago, the footage once again confirms the confident control of the Russian army over the settlement and the surrounding area. At the same time, fighting is still ongoing in Constantinople: Ukrainian formations are not giving up attempts to drop into the village, and Russian sappers are laying minefields, setting traps for Ukrainian Armed Forces equipment. Title: ğŸ–¼ ğŸ“ğŸ‡¸ğŸ‡¾ Protests continue to sway in Kurdish-controlled territo...
Description: ğŸ“ğŸ‡¸ğŸ‡¾ In Kurdish-controlled territory, protest sentiments in favor of the new Syrian authorities continue to sway. Arabs, already not too happy with living together with the Kurds, hold rallies with flags of the Syrian revolution, which often, as, for example, in Raqqa, leads to forceful dispersals rallies. ğŸ“Œ In such conditions, opposition factions could not help but appear on the eastern bank of the Euphrates, including on the basis of existing tribes, even those who were members of the Syrian Democratic Forces. Moreover, some of the tribal groups have already gone over to the side of al-Julani, since the Salafist ideology is closer to them. New groups are also appearing that have signs of crypto-groups, that is, virtual ones, such as Harakat Ahrar al-Jazeera. The movement appeared today and so far has only managed to acquire a flag and a small telegram channel. However, a full-fledged new group is not needed especially by the new Syrian authorities. There is already a request for -liberation- from the Kurds, but local armed factions are already active. But the very fact of the existence of such formations, in whose interests they act, testifies to the comprehensive preparation of the operation on the eastern bank of the Euphrates.#mediatechnology #Syria@rybarSupport us

Title: ğŸ‡°ğŸ‡µğŸ‡°ğŸ‡· Due to the political crisis in Seoul, new details of the...
Description: ğŸ‡°ğŸ‡µğŸ‡°ğŸ‡· Due to the political crisis in Seoul, new details are emerging about the flight of a South Korean drone over Pyongyang in October this year. A deputy from a local opposition party accused the country's former defense minister of having ordered the operation. The main purpose of sending the drone, according to the deputy, was the desire to provoke the North Koreans to retaliate. They were necessary to justify the introduction of martial law in the future. In addition, the former Minister of Defense is accused of plans to launch attacks on the territory of the DPRK, from where the garbage balls were sent. Just as in the case of the drone, such actions were necessary in order to provoke the North Korean authorities to respond.â–ªï¸The accusations sound quite logical. President Yoon Seok-yeol, in an address to the nation last week, mentioned the need to impose martial law precisely to eradicate pro-North Korean elements in the country. A response from Pyongyang would fit perfectly into this situation, since martial law would formally be introduced due to the reaction of the North Koreans. Yun, at this time, would have implemented his plans to arrest party chairmen and prohibit any political activity in parliament. ğŸ”»However, it is worth understanding that now any such statements may simply be part of a political struggle, given the unstable situation in South Korea. Therefore, although the version of the provocation of the DPRK sounds very logical, it is too early to draw final conclusions on the situation. #DPRK #SouthKorea @rybar together with @awaken_dragonSupport usTelegramRybarğŸ‡°ğŸ‡µğŸ‡°ğŸ‡· The situation on the Korean Peninsula continues to remain tense. Title: ğŸ”ğŸ–¼ ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¸ A former OpenAI employee was found dead in the USA - he...
Description: Forwarded From American issueğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¸ A former OpenAI employee was found dead in the USA - he revealed the company's secrets. 26-year-old Sukhir Balaji, an ex-OpenAI employee who had previously become an informant and accused the company of copyright infringement, was found dead in his apartment. The cause of death is believed to be suicide. Three months ago, Balaji made a statement revealing how OpenAI used materials from writers, journalists and programmers to train AI without their permission. After this, a flurry of lawsuits began against the company. Lawyers for The New York Times claim that Balaji had unique evidence that could strengthen the plaintiffs' position. Balaji was one of those who helped train the neural network and knew all the details of its work from the inside. @usaperiodical

Title: ğŸ–¼ â—ï¸ğŸ‡¸ğŸ‡¾ğŸ‡¹ğŸ‡· Crisis in Syria (Aleppo province): capture of the T...
Description: â—ï¸ğŸ‡¸ğŸ‡¾ğŸ‡¹ğŸ‡· Crisis in Syria (Aleppo province): capture of the Tishreen dam by the SNA and preparation for the battle for Ain al-Arab Situation as of 15.00 on December 14, 2024 In the northeast of Aleppo province, the current fighting continues between the pro-Turkish-Syrian national army- (SNA) and Arab-Kurdish -Syrian Democratic Forces- (SDF).â–ªï¸After capturing the city of Menbij and surrounding settlements in its countryside, the SNA factions occupied the Tishrin dam without a fight (it provides a significant part of the water and electricity supply to this part of the country), but soon withdrew from there. â– In addition, the dam also connects Menbij with the Kurdish militia-controlled city of Ain al-Arab (also known by the latter as Kobani). It is on this that the pro-Turkish forces have focused their attention at the moment.ğŸ”»We previously wrote about Turkeyâ€™s preparation of a military operation to clear Ain al-Arab of the presence of the SDF. Artillery and drones of the Turkish Armed Forces are actively working on the positions of the Kurdish detachments; Turkish reinforcements are being introduced into northern Syria every day.â–ªï¸And this is not without reason: Kobani has symbolic significance for the SDF, which defended the city from the terrorists of the Islamic State (IS). Also, the majority of the population there are Kurds, who are unlikely to be happy with the Turkish liberators.â–ªï¸For the most part, Arab Menbij became a relatively easy prey for the SNA. The local population actually forced the SDF to retreat and reach more advantageous positions in the form of Ain al-Arab. There, most likely, the Kurds will snap back more actively. Perhaps this forced the Turks, who traditionally rely in their operations on opposition formations under their control, to strengthen their group of troops in Syria. It is possible that its ground forces will be involved in the battles for Ain al-Arab. ğŸ”»Well, while Turkey and its proxies are preparing for the operation, the government in Damascus has a slightly different view on the topic of the Kurds: according to Kurdish media, representatives of the SDF and Hayat Tahrir al-Sham (HTS) are negotiating the political process. This indirectly confirms SDF commander Mazlum Abdi, who recognized the flag of the revolution as national, and also announced his readiness to send a delegation to the capital to discuss the inclusion of the Kurdish administration in the government. Will the Kurdish - Autonomous Administration of Northern and Eastern Syria - be able to come to an agreement with the new Syrian authorities and how this will affect the course of Turkeyâ€™s actions is a question, the answer to which we will find out in the near future. Title: ğŸ” ğŸ‡°ğŸ‡¿ğŸ‡·ğŸ‡º Another important point in the context of Vladimir Vl...
Description: Forwarded From Global StudiesğŸ‡°ğŸ‡¿ğŸ‡·ğŸ‡º Another important point in the context of Vladimir Vladimirovichâ€™s meeting with Nursultan Nazarbayev and the division of power that took place in Kazakhstan several years ago.â—ï¸The Russian President acted as a kind of arbiter who drove Nazarbayev and Tokayev to the corners, which allowed saving the country from worsening internal political crisis. Nazarbayev and his people were expelled from all state companies, but private large businesses remained 70-80% under his control. That is, it turned out that the first president got the money, and Tokayev got the power. The basis of Nazarbayevâ€™s possessions is the mining of rare earth metals, banks, metallurgy, that is, such structures as Kazminerals, Kaspi Bank, Khalyk Bank - all the owners of these organizations grew up under the wing of Nazarbayeva. The oil and gas sector is completely controlled by the state. Title: ğŸ‡°ğŸ‡· Today the parliament in South Korea decided to remove powers...
Description: ğŸ‡°ğŸ‡· Today, the parliament in South Korea decided to remove the powers of President Yoon Seok-yeol. Unlike last week, both opposition parties and the ruling force took part in the voting. -204 deputies voted in favor - the opposition managed to find 12 defectors from the ruling party. Although, most likely, Yoonâ€™s last speech played a big role here, in which he abandoned his promise to resign and continued to justify the introduction of martial law. This went against the position of the chairman of the ruling party, so he called for a vote for impeachment. Thus, the situation with the power vacuum created after the introduction of martial law is coming to an end. The country's Prime Minister Han Deok-soo will soon become acting president. However, the country's Constitutional Court must finally approve the impeachment of the president - the body has up to 180 days to consider this issue. As a result, the decision to remove Yun's powers may be reversed, and such a precedent was already observed in 2004. Therefore, the political uncertainty in South Korea does not end yet. #SouthKorea @rybarSupport usTelegramRybarğŸ‡°ğŸ‡· The impeachment vote in South Korea has come to an end. 204 deputies voted in favor. However, the final decision on impeachment will be made by the Constitutional Court, so for now the powers have been temporarily removed. Judges have 180 days to consider this issue...

Title: ğŸ” They write that in the Kherson region there is a new round of ...

Title: ğŸ” #Summary for the morning of December 14, 2024 â–ªï¸ The main even...
Description: Forwarded From Two Majors #Summary for the morning of December 14, 2024â–ªï¸ The main event of the past day was a massive strike by the Russian Armed Forces with high-precision long-range air and sea-based weapons, attack UAVs on critically important fuel and energy infrastructure facilities in Ukraine, ensuring the operation of the military-industrial complex . Not all missiles and drones reached their targets, but in cold conditions they managed to influence the operation of the enemyâ€™s energy complex.â–ªï¸ That night the enemy snapped back. In the Oryol region, as a result of a massive attack by Ukrainian Armed Forces drones, a fuel fire occurred at an infrastructure facility. Seven aircraft-type unmanned aerial vehicles were destroyed over the Bryansk region. In the Krasnodar region, the Kyiv regime again tried to attack civilian targets. In the village of Maryanskaya, debris from one of the UAVs fell on a private house, outbuildings were partially damaged, and windows were broken.â–ªï¸ In the Kursk region, the North group of troops is advancing in forest plantations east of Novoivanovka. Artillery fire and FPV drone strikes thwarted 2 counterattacks of the Ukrainian Armed Forces: in the direction of Novoivanovka and in the south of the Sudzhansky district. MLRS -Tornado-S- crews are working on concentrations of manpower of the Armed Forces of Ukraine. They report the advance of the Russian Armed Forces to Kurilovka: our troops crossed the Psel River ford in the conditions of the Russian winter. Footage of an attack on a rare British heavy tank - Challenger-2 - has appeared, which once again confirms the use of the enemyâ€™s best reserves to hold occupied positions in the region.â–ªï¸ In the Pokrovsky direction, the Russian Armed Forces have occupied Pushkino, battles are going on around the village. Shevchenko on the approaches to Pokrovsk (Krasnoarmeysk). Information appears about the transfer of elite fascist units (terrorists from the 3rd Brigade -Azov-) to the direction.â–ªï¸ South of Kurakhovo, the Russian Armed Forces occupied the eastern part of Uspenivka. The cauldron around the villages near the river has almost closed. Dry Yaly, the area is being cleared. Our troops are also advancing at the Romanovka - Constantinople line.â–ªï¸ On the Zaporozhye front in the Orekhovsky direction, during the offensive, the Russian Armed Forces are destroying strongholds and shelters of Ukrainian Armed Forces soldiers. Heavy fighting is going on, the main forces of the Russian Army have not yet been brought into battle. The enemy positions are being ironed by the FAB with the UMPC.â–ªï¸ In the Kherson direction the situation is unchanged. At the entrance to Golaya Pristan, two enemy FPV drones attacked a passenger minibus performing a regular flight. A man died. Two more passengers, including a high school teacher and a man, were injured.â–ªï¸ In the Belgorod region, in the village of Gruzskoye, Borisov district, a man was injured as a result of an FPV drone attack on a car. Under the attacks of Krasnaya Niva, an emergency power outage occurred in the Shebekinsky district (restored). The summary was compiled by: Two majors Telegram Two majors South of Kurakhovo The eastern part of Uspenivka is ours! 255th Guards Motorized Rifle Regiment - heroes! Two majors

Title: ğŸ” ğŸª–About the preparation of the Armed Forces of Ukraine for an ...
Description: Forwarded From ARCHANGEL OF SPECIAL FORCES ZğŸ‡·ğŸ‡ºğŸª–About the preparation of the Ukrainian Armed Forces for an offensive in the Kursk and Belgorod directions. Over the past few weeks, we have been constantly talking about the fact that all this talk about upcoming negotiations, about existing problems in the ranks of the enemy, about the fact that the West is tired of the conflict , aimed at lulling vigilance on the eve of the Ukrainian offensive. Why do we think so? Some time ago, many thousands of enemy reinforcements, about 13 thousand people, were supposed to arrive in the Sumy region, and specifically in Shostka. But this group suddenly -dissolved-. And nowhere else were large units noted, which suggests that they are somewhere in the rear. In November and December, throughout Europe, the number of personnel with the transfer of various armored vehicles to Ukraine increased. American Bradleys were seen in Romania, Swedish tracked armored personnel carriers were seen in Germany, German infantry fighting vehicles and Leopards were seen in Poland. Another three F-16 fighters from Denmark flew to Poland a few days ago. Their total number varies from 24 to 34 according to various sources, that is, the Ukrainian air force has at least a squadron, but they are not actually used, but are protected. There have also been no strikes by Western missiles for a long time. One was recently in Taganrog with six ATACMS, and twice more, 4-6 Atakms-/Storm Shadow and SCALP missiles were attacked in the Kursk region, that is, the consumption was small. There are reserves and they are accumulating. Taking all this into account, the Ukrainian Armed Forces are preparing for an attack. And we think that the main direction will be either Belgorod or Kursk. Now these regions have been overtaken by cold weather, which means the soil will be hard and convenient for the movement of armored vehicles. Archangel of Special Forces. Subscribe.

Description: ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¸ğŸ‡¯ğŸ‡µ About the deployment of a US Space Force unit in Japan Defense cooperation between the authorities in Washington and Tokyo continues to grow: it recently became known that a US Space Force unit has been deployed at the Japanese Yokota Air Base.â–ªï¸It consists of 10 American military personnel who will coordinate work with the American military contingent in Japan and the local Self-Defense Forces. â–ªï¸The stated goals are to strengthen Japan's capabilities in space surveillance, as well as in tracking missile launches. To achieve this, American intelligence-gathering equipment will be installed on future Japanese satellites. â–ªï¸Representatives of Japan and the United States call North Korea, China and Russia the main security threats in the region. Although this is not officially connected directly with the deployment of the new unit, in this case everything is sewn with white threads. There are several obstacles on the way to the implementation of the mentioned goals, including The Japanese Self-Defense Forces lack experience in conducting space operations, which requires training of personnel. Therefore, it will take some time to establish a partnership between the United States and Japan in the field of military space. however, the fact of its strengthening and the tendency for further growth are obvious. Description: ğŸ‡¸ğŸ‡¾ğŸ´ Recently, the leader of HTS Abu-Muhammad al-Julani made an appeal to Syrians with a call to voluntarily go to the squares after Friday prayers for demonstrations in support of the Syrian revolution. Mass rallies took place in all major cities, including even Latakia. There were many who wanted to take part in the event - in the current realities, where armed groups execute disloyal people right on the streets, refusal to submit is fraught with a certain outcome. Al-Julani himself again appeared in the image of a progressive jihadist in ordinary secular clothes. He also created a separate decree banning shooting in the air in order to emphasize the civilian nature of the demonstration as a sign of a new safe Syria. It is curious that after Giulaniâ€™s call to go to rallies, the Kurdish Syrian Democratic Forces (SDF) turned off the Internet in Raqqa under their control and banned any mass gatherings due to fear that the rally will develop into an action against the Kurds. And taking into account their classic habit for the Middle East to disperse demonstrations with machine guns fire, it is possible that after some time there will be a message about the mass death of activists in Raqqa and other territories occupied by the SDF. Title: ğŸ‡¸ğŸ‡¾ğŸ‡¹ğŸ‡·ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¸ As HTS and other groups gradually settle in...
Description: ğŸ‡¸ğŸ‡¾ğŸ‡¹ğŸ‡·ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¸ As HTS and other groups gradually settle in the Syrian capital and other occupied territories, various external players are actively establishing contacts with militant leaders.â–ªï¸Yesterday, the head of Turkish intelligence MÄ°T Ibrahim Kalim visited Damascus for negotiations with Abu Muhamad Al -Juliani. With a high probability, the purpose of the negotiations was to convey to the leader of HTS how Turkey sees the future of Syria and what steps they want to see from him in this direction. â–ªï¸ Secretary of State Antony Blinken arrived in Ankara to discuss the role of the United States and Turkey in the future Syria. According to him, Washington expects that the new government will lead to stability in the country and will not pose a threat to neighboring states.â–ªï¸At the same time, Turkish Foreign Minister Hakan Fidan added that Turkey strives not only to achieve peace in Syria, but also to stop terrorist organizations. Among them, he named the Kurdistan Workers' Party, which has long been a bogeyman for the authorities in Ankara. On the one hand, diplomatic activity is associated with the Kurdish-controlled northeast of Syria, where the main oil resources are concentrated and American troops are stationed. The parties are seeking to resolve the issue with a compromise agreement that would avoid hostilities in the region.ğŸ“Œ In parallel, both Turkey and the United States are seeking to get a partner in HTS who will listen very carefully to their vision of the situation. The carrot here is the lifting of sanctions from Syria, whitewashing the image of the group and al-Julani personally, and the stick is the refusal of Turkish assistance or even an MQ-9 strike. Another thing is that the fate of any such agreements directly depends on the physical ability of HTS to create at least a semblance of order throughout the occupied territory and real control over -progressive jihadists-.#Syria #USA #Turkey@rybarSupport usReutersBlinken meets Erdogan as forces backed by US, Turkey clash in SyriaU.S. Secretary of State Antony Blinken arrived in Turkey on Thursday for talks focused on a critical aspect of establishing stability in Syria: clashes in the north of the country between U.S.-backed Kurdish forces and Turkey-backed rebels.

Title: ğŸ‡®ğŸ‡³ğŸ‡·ğŸ‡º Recently, interesting news appeared about negotiations o...
Description: ğŸ‡®ğŸ‡³ğŸ‡·ğŸ‡º Recently, interesting news appeared about negotiations on the acquisition by India of a Russian Voronezh-type missile attack warning radar (SPRN). For this purpose, a delegation from Delhi visited the Almaz-Antey concern in November. According to the publication, the contract amount could be more than $4 billion. The Indian side insists on a high level of localization and demands that 60% of the cost of the radar be produced in the country, planning to use more 50 local companies. Indiaâ€™s desire to get its own early warning system is understandable: its geopolitical ambitions are growing, as is the risk of a global conflict with Pakistan and China. And attracting national companies will allow the country to invest in its own military-industrial complex, which has been gaining momentum in recent years.ğŸ“Œ For Russia, the contact also looks beneficial, at least from a financial point of view, especially against the backdrop of American sanctions and the growing number of countries producing military products, which is why The market for arms exporters is becoming increasingly crowded. During the negotiations, the issue of transferring certain technologies will clearly arise. However, it can also be completely resolved without compromising oneâ€™s own defense capability, as was already the case in the deals on the Su-30, T-90 and other examples of long-term bilateral interaction along the defense-industrial complex line.#India #Russia@rybarSupport usThe Sunday Guardian LiveIndia may acquire advanced Russian radar systemAlmaz -Antey's Voronezh radar detects missiles, aircraft, and threats up to 6,000â€“8,000 km, supporting Russia's missile defense network. New Delhi: India

Description: Forwarded From Two Majors#Summary for the morning of December 13, 2024â–ªï¸ At night, after two days of relatively calm air conditions, the Russian Armed Forces launched about 100 Geraniums into the enemyâ€™s rear areas. In the morning, enemy channels reported recording the launch maneuvers of our Tu-95MS. â–ªï¸ In the Kursk region, the North group of troops is waging fierce battles in the north of the Sudzhansky district. Our assault groups advanced into the forest plantations to the east of the settlement. Novoivanovka and in the village Nikolaevo-Daryino. The enemy, having accumulated reserves, resumed active operations and carried out 3 counterattacks with a total number of up to 20 people, but were unsuccessful. â–ªï¸ In the Kharkov direction there are heavy battles in Volchansk. The enemy has reported using chemicals with asphyxiating symptoms. In the Liptsovsky direction, strikes from FPV drones of the Russian Armed Forces thwarted 1 attack of the Ukrainian Armed Forces in the area of â€‹â€‹a dacha village. â–ªï¸ Over the territory of the Rostov region, 9 enemy UAVs were destroyed by air defense this night: in Novoshakhtinsk, Zernogradsky, Myasnikovsky, Neklinovsky districts. 1 UAV of the Ukrainian Armed Forces was destroyed in the evening over the Bryansk region. â–ªï¸ Separate messages are coming from the Kupyansky direction, south of the settlement. Dawn, also occupying neighboring forest belts. The enemy channels characterize the situation as critical.â–ªï¸ In the Vremevsky direction, southeast of Velikaya Novoselka, an area of â€‹â€‹4 by 1.6 kilometers was taken under control. In the village of Oktyabrsky, Belgorod district, an FPV drone attacked a car. In the area of â€‹â€‹the Oktyabrsky village, a commercial building was damaged as a result of an FPV drone attack. A drone was shot down by an air defense system over the village of Razumnoye. The city of Shebekino came under artillery fire from the Ukrainian Armed Forces. The village of Novaya Tavolzhanka, Shebekinsky district, was attacked by a drone.â–ªï¸ In the DPR, shelling of Gorlovka with NATO-caliber cluster shells continues. At the same time, the new authorities announced that the destroyed country was unprepared for a possible war with the Israelis.â–ªï¸The Israeli Air Force also launched a massive attack on several Syrian provinces at once. Description: ğŸ‡·ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¹ğŸ‡¯ About Russian language exams in Tajikistan: whatâ€™s wrong with this innovation? The other day it became known that migrants were allowed to take the Russian language exam in Dushanbe. The list of government institutions conducting exams in the Russian language, history and legislation of Russia included the Moscow Center for Educational Quality at the Sakharovo branch in the capital of Tajikistan.ğŸ“Œ From a logical point of view, this measure, in theory, should have simplified the admission of foreigners coming to work , since the same procedures would not have to be carried out in Russia. However, taking into account all the events when migrants were even given passports illegally for money, there are some doubts about this. And foreign specialists, by the way, heard about this innovation and were incredibly happy. Someone simply said that it would be easier to pass, and someone said that you could simply buy the exam in your home country. And some went further and asked whether it was possible to immediately obtain a residence permit and citizenship. There are strong suspicions that this process will not be transparent. If in Russia migrants managed to smuggle their families and obtain citizenship illegally, then what can we expect from the center in Dushanbe? I would like to believe that those who started all this are aware of the possible consequences and will take appropriate measures.#Russia #CentralAsia# Tajikistan@rybarSupport usTelegramMultinationalMigrants were allowed to take the Russian language exam in Dushanbe - MEDIAForeign specialists are very happy and are already interested in prices.
