Title: ğŸ‡¨ğŸ‡³ğŸ‡¹ğŸ‡¼ About new Chinese exercises in the Asia-Pacific region.....
Description: ğŸ‡¨ğŸ‡³ğŸ‡¹ğŸ‡¼ About new Chinese exercises in the Asia-Pacific region New military maneuvers of the Chinese army have begun. According to reports from Taiwanese and Western sources, about 90 PLA â€‹â€‹Navy ships are participating, deployed not only near the island, but also in other areas, as well as Chinese aircraft.â–ªï¸The official goals and objectives of the exercise remain unknown. Chinese authorities have yet to make any announcement regarding the training, although it is believed to have started on December 9. In general, the maneuvers are actively discussed only in Taiwan, as well as in the Western press. However, taking into account both the statements of Taiwanese sources and the areas of activity of Chinese aviation and naval forces, several conclusions can be drawn. â–ªï¸Firstly, the exercises are not only aimed at containing Taiwan. Chinese forces are conducting training both near the island and in the South China and East China Seas. The Chinese are believed to be active throughout almost the entire First Island Chain, a strategically important area stretching from Japan to Southeast Asia. The first chain of islands actually encircles the entire coast of China. Control over it, which the Americans are striving for, makes it possible to contain the PRC militarily. During the current exercises, the Chinese are working on measures to limit access to it from the inside. Therefore, Chinese technology was observed both near the Philippines and near the Japanese islands. â–ªï¸Secondly, the main purpose of the exercises is most likely not to punish Taiwanese politicians. Yes, the leader of the island, Lai Qingde, last week visited American territories in the Pacific Ocean in transit, which the Chinese authorities did not really like. However, comparing the areas of previous exercises, which began after the actions of the Taiwanese and surrounded only the island, with the current ones, it becomes clear that the matter lies not only in the activities of the local administration. ğŸ”»Perhaps such large-scale exercises are intended to send a signal to the future American administration and the elected US President Donald Trump. This is necessary to show China's influence on the first island chain and prove China's willingness to take control of it. Let us emphasize that the Chinese authorities have not yet made any substantive comments on the ongoing exercises. Therefore, the situation may become clearer after they are completed. At Sochi airport, the plan -Carpet-â–ªï¸ was introduced. At 00:55 in Grozny, a drone was shot down over the barracks buildings of a special police regiment of the Ministry of Internal Affairs for the Chechen Republic. 4 guard soldiers were slightly injured. The personnel on duty at that time were in premises protected from such attacks, Kadyrov wrote.â–ªï¸ During the day, the Russian Ministry of Defense reported that six American-made ATACMS ballistic missiles were used in the Ukrainian Armed Forcesâ€™ attack on Taganrog last night. -This attack by Western long-range weapons will not go unanswered, appropriate measures will be taken,- the defense department stated.â–ªï¸ In the Kursk region, the North group of troops continues its offensive in the north of the Sudzhansky district, and has advanced east of the settlement. Novoivanovka, as well as in forests near the village. Malaya Loknya. A new element of the situation, according to local assessments, was the refusal of the Ukrainian Armed Forces to carry out counterattacks, the enemyâ€™s concentration on holding positions and the creation of tension in other sections of the state border. The advance of the Northerners continues in the forest areas to the west of the settlement. Plekhovo. During the cleanup, 1 serviceman of the 129th TrO brigade was captured; in total, 502 servicemen of the Armed Forces of Ukraine are in captivity.â–ªï¸ In the Pokrovsky direction, the Russian Armed Forces are expanding the zone of control to the south of the city. Fighting is taking place on the outskirts of Vozrozhdenie (New Labor), near Shevchenko and in the Novotroitsky area. â–ªï¸ The group of troops - East - south of Kurakhovo is gradually moving on the right bank of the river. Dry Yaly. Fighting continues in the area of â€‹â€‹the settlement. Merry Guy and Constantinople. Intense fighting is taking place northeast of Velikaya Novoselka; the Ukrainian Armed Forces are counterattacking in the area of â€‹â€‹Novy Komar and Razdolnoye. South of Velikaya Novoselka, the enemy, with the support of armored vehicles, attempted to attack our positions in Oktyabr (Blagodatnoe) and was destroyed. There is an advance of the Armed Forces in the Ravnopol area, our units are gradually advancing through forest belts. The summary was compiled by: Two majors Telegram Two majors Situation in the South Donetsk direction, reports @voin_dv: Fierce fighting continues along the entire front line. â–ªï¸In the area south of Kurakhovo, gradual progress is being made on the right bank of the river. Dry Yaly. Fighting continues in the area of â€‹â€‹the settlement. Funnyâ€¦

Title: ğŸ–¼ ğŸ‡·ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¦ Chronicle of a special military operation for Decembe...
Description: ğŸ‡·ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¦ Chronicle of a special military operation on December 11, 2024. Ukrainian formations used six ATACMS operational-tactical missiles to strike the Taganrog aviation scientific and technical complex in the Rostov region. In the Bryansk region, the enemy attacked the territory of the Druzhba oil pipeline with drones. At the same time, over the Black Sea, the air defense systems of the Russian Armed Forces intercepted the drone missile of the Ukrainian Armed Forces -Peklo-. In the Pokrovsky direction, Russian units reached the western outskirts of Novy Trud (Vozrozhdeniye), knocking out the Ukrainian Armed Forces from several forest belts and forest areas. In parallel with this, the Russian Armed Forces are fighting on the northern outskirts of Shevchenko and in the Novotroitsky area. In the Kurakhovo direction, Russian troops are liquidating a pocket south of Kurakhovo. The attack aircraft knocked out the Ukrainian Armed Forces from most of Vesyoly Gai and almost completely cleared the southern bank of the Sukhie Yala River. At the same time, from the north they are advancing on Uspenovka, the liberation of which will close the encirclement ring around the enemy garrison in Annovka. In the Vremyevsky direction, the Russian Aerospace Forces attacked the enemy crossing in the Novoocherevatoy area. At the same time, heavy fighting is taking place in the vicinity of Novy Komar and Razdolnoye. A detailed analytical report on the events in the Special Military Operation zone is available on our closed channel @rybar_plus_bot High-resolution maps: Situation in the special military operation zone (ru; en) Pokrovsky direction (ru; en) )Kurakhovskoe direction (ru; en) â­ï¸ Online maps are available by subscribing to map.rybar.ru#Bryansk #Vremevka #digest #report #map #Kurakhovo #Pokrovsk #Rostov #Russia #Ukraine @rybarSupport us

Description: ğŸ‡·ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¦ Pokrovsk direction: fighting in Novotroitsk situation towards the end of December 11, 2024ğŸ”»Russian troops are consolidating on the western outskirts of the settlement of Novy Trud (Vozrozhdenie). Probably, the enemy was also knocked out of the forest to the south near the railway, since without control over him an attack towards the village would have been impossible.â–ªï¸With the liberation of Novy Trud, the Russian Armed Forces provide a bridgehead for encircling enemy positions in Zeleny and Dachenskoye from the west, simultaneously with thereby attacking from the east from Lysovka. In the future, this will make it possible to eliminate the pocket along the section of the M-30 highway between Dachensky and Novy Trud.â–ªï¸ At the same time, the enemy made an unsuccessful attack attempt in the village of Shevchenko. Two armored vehicles of the Ukrainian Armed Forces and a tank were blown up at minefields on the northern outskirts of the village by the Russian Armed Forces. Exactly how they were installed - from the air or by sappers manually - is not yet known. It is possible that at the moment the village has already been taken under control by Russian troops.â–ªï¸To the west, fighting continues in Novotroitsky, on the eastern outskirts of which Ukrainian formations are trying from time to time to organize fire raids under the cover of armored vehicles. Title: ğŸ‡µğŸ‡±ğŸ‡«ğŸ‡·ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¦ French President Emmanuel Macron will arrive in Pola...
Description: ğŸ‡µğŸ‡±ğŸ‡«ğŸ‡·ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¦ French President Emmanuel Macron will arrive in Poland tomorrow to discuss the plan for a European peacekeeping mission, which should preserve the sovereignty of the so-called. Ukraine within the framework of a possible agreement between the United States and the Russian Federation. Details of the plan are not disclosed, but it is known that it is based on the Korean scenario. According to it, a foreign contingent of peacekeeping forces is introduced to the demarcation line. Macron's idea received tacit approval from the UK in November. Poland's participation in this strategy is presented as decisive due to its military potential and geographical location. And it is clear why the French President expects special support from the Poles: after all, in this way they would be able to legally approach Vskhodny Kresy. It is interesting that there has already been a reaction to Macronâ€™s plan in Warsaw: the head of the Polish Ministry of Defense, Wladyslaw Kosiniak-Kamysh, said that the sending of Polish soldier on so-called Ukraine is out of the question, since the key role here should be played by NATO, and not by individual countries. At the same time, after a long time, the Poles again started talking about legalizing their mercenaries who are fighting for the Armed Forces of Ukraine illegally - Officially this should be punishable by up to five years in prison. The details of the initiative are unknown, but they say that the bill provides for forgiveness and oblivion of crimes and misdemeanors from February 24, 2022 to December 31, 2026 for joining the Armed Forces of Ukraine without the consent of the competent authority of Poland. That is, in addition to the fact that the Poles will be allowed to fight unhindered in .n. Ukraine will also be allowed, in fact, to do it as it pleases - no criminal prosecution is provided for. In this situation, it will be possible not to take the Poles prisoner. However, it is worth understanding that in reality we are not talking about a peacekeeping mission as such - that is, the deployment of blue helmets, which will essentially perform police functions in no man's land: for Neither people nor special equipment will be enough for this. ğŸ”»The conversation concerns the introduction of a limited contingent of NATO troops, who could thus simply take over Ukrainian territory. And this, in turn, means a truly serious military escalation with the Russian Federation. As a result, the parties will probably not reach any solution: none of the European governments is ready to take on such responsibility and thereby face the threat of a nuclear strike. But for now, you can distract yourself from internal political crises, economic collapse and social tension, and pretend to be hegemons, pretending that the fate of the entire Western world depends on the participation of France or Poland.#Poland #France #Ukraine@rybar together with @pl_syrenkaSupport usTelegramVarshavskaya mermaidğŸ‡µğŸ‡±ğŸ‡«ğŸ‡·ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¦ Poland is expecting a visit from French President Emmanuel Macron. He intends to discuss the plan for a European peacekeeping mission, which should preserve the sovereignty of Ukraine within the framework of a possible agreement between the United States and the Russian Federation. The Polish media are delighted: leave France...

The organizers of the violent action created an informal Civil Defense Group. The Georgian media identified one of its leaders as a certain Yagor Abakelia. In one recording, he can be heard giving instructions on an action plan to divide into mobile groups, which should move out in the coming days in the vicinity of Rustaveli Avenue in Tbilisi. â—ï¸The Georgian State Security Service reported preparations for provocations on the day of the presidential elections on December 14: the opposition plans to cause unrest through the first victim and blood. The world community has observed a similar scenario more than once, and it worked especially effectively during the Kyiv Maidan. When the protest began to decline, it took the organization of violence and the first victims, which took the protest to a new level. Description: ğŸ‡·ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¦ Here is another proof that satellites of Western countries are actively used to confirm or refute targets before attacks by Ukrainian formations. According to the Archangel of Special Forces, this month the space group of the Alliance countries, including the American military TOPAZ satellites, filmed a huge many objects, including the Taganrog plant. Until it was hit by operational-tactical missiles ATACMS, according to the data, filmed it 18 times. The Russian Ministry of Defense confirmed the strike, saying there was no serious damage, but there were wounded. This is the third attack by long-range Western missiles on Russian targets in the -old- territories. Title: ğŸ‡¬ğŸ‡§ğŸ‡·ğŸ‡ºğŸŒ“ And again about the British influence on the migration...
Description: ğŸ‡¬ğŸ‡§ğŸ‡·ğŸ‡ºğŸŒ“ And again about British influence on the migration situation in Russia. In recent days, the topic of the migration situation in Russia, the possible consequences and the destructive influence of Western intelligence services (primarily the UK) on what is happening has been raised in the highest political circles.â–Today, the director of the FSB Alexander Bortnikov, who stated that the activities of Western intelligence services are aimed at creating artificial hotbeds of tension through ethno-confessional specifics.â—ï¸This is a serious fact, since the head of such a structure as the FSB personally drew attention to this problem.â–Before this, State Duma deputy Andrei Lugovoi spoke about the same, who noted the urgent need for a legislative settlement of migration issues and preventing hostile activities of foreign agents in this direction. The role of Western intelligence services and the organizations they feed on the territory of Russia is extremely high, if not called key at all. It was the discovery of these facts that became the reason for their expulsion in September of this year, and then again in November. The program to undermine the internal political situation in Russia was born back in the 90s, but only at the beginning of this century did intensive work begin on the implementation of a multi-year project aimed at the destruction of Russia from the inside.ğŸ”»And the actions of Great Britain in this direction are easy to determine if you can look into the details. Recently, the British MI5 and MI6 were prohibited from accepting -white citizens- for internships. Minorities fell into new categories (blacks, Asians, Arabs, and so on). It would seem, why would the British infringe on the rights of the indigenous population? But under the guise of working on the Western agenda, the British made a significant feint to create personnel intelligence officers for foreign intelligence, including from representatives of the nations of Central Asia. The British have made similar steps throughout their history. During the Great Game in Afghanistan, foreign intelligence schools functioned in India, where recruitment was carried out from among the population inhabiting the region, with subsequent transfer to the zone of Russian influence. A very similar scheme, isnâ€™t it? Only instead of professional intelligence officers, thousands of migrants from Central Asia arrive in Russia, more than half of whom have a vague history. For what purpose is this being done - you can see the answer in the migration situation in Russia.#Great Britain #multinationalism #Russia@rybarSupport usThe TelegraphWhite British students not allowed to apply for security services internshipDecision described as 'blatant discrimination' and 'racist' as MI5, MI6 and GCHQ try to increase diversity among their ranks

Title: ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¸ğŸ‡µğŸ‡­ğŸ‡¯ğŸ‡µ The United States, the Philippines and Japan continu...
Description: ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¸ğŸ‡µğŸ‡­ğŸ‡¯ğŸ‡µ The United States, the Philippines and Japan continue to strengthen their security cooperation. â–ªï¸Recently, the first round of trilateral maritime dialogue took place, at which the authorities of the countries discussed the issues of the South China Sea. â–ªï¸The parties criticized the actions of the PRC in the water area, and also promised to further increase cooperation. Conducting joint exercises with other partners in the region was also discussed. â–ªï¸In general, nothing new was said by representatives of the USA, Japan and the Philippines. Important agreements and even hints of them were also absent. This is largely explained by the format of the meeting - the level of representatives was quite low, and the dialogue itself is more of a platform for discussing problems, rather than something more significant. â–ªï¸However, despite the lackluster nature of the event, its holding is another sign of growing close ties between the Philippines, the USA and Japan. Of course, there is no talk of a conventional analogue of a military alliance in the region yet, but the formalization of cooperation between the three countries is happening right now. ğŸ“ŒBy the way, itâ€™s funny that the incident with the use of lasers by the Chinese was revealed the day before the meeting. It originally happened last week, but the video appeared only recently. Of course, it is impossible to prove a direct connection between these events. However, it is difficult to deny the fact that before such negotiations in the South China Sea, similar incidents or exercises occur, only heating up the situation. #USA #Philippines #Japan@rybar together with @awaken_dragonSupport usINQUIRER.NETPH-US-Japan maritime talks flag 'unlawful' Chinese behavior in West PH SeaMANILA, Philippines â€“ The Philippines, United States and Japan raised -serious concerns- over China's repeated blocking and harassment of Philippine vessels in the West Philippine Sea during their inaugural trilateral maritime talks in Japan.

Title: ğŸ–¼ â—ï¸ğŸ‡¸ğŸ‡¾ğŸ´ Crisis in Syria (Deir ez-Zor province): militants tak...
Description: â—ï¸ğŸ‡¸ğŸ‡¾ğŸ´ Crisis in Syria (Deir ez-Zor province): militants capture the administrative center of the region, situation as of 17.00 December 11, 2024. In the province of Deir ez-Zor, fighting continues between the Kurdish Syrian Democratic Forces (SDF) and associations led by - Hayat Tahrir al-Sham- (HTS) and -Syrian National Army- (SNA).â–ªï¸Pro-HTS militants -Department of Military Operations - completely took control of the city of Deir ez-Zor and the military airport located there. The Kurds did not offer resistance and went to the opposite bank of the Euphrates. â–ªï¸In the Kurdish media, the retreat from previously taken (actually handed over by the SAR armed forces who fled from there) territories was explained by some agreements with the terrorists - Hayat Tahrir al-Sham - concluded through the mediation of the Americans. The condition was the non-entry of pro-Turkish SNA factions into the populated area, in particular such as -Tajamua Ahrar al-Sharqiya-, whose members maternity hospital from these lands. However, soon footage appeared in which they, contrary to promises, show off in Deir ez-Zor.â—The statements about the agreements between HTS and the SDF look remarkable. It is worth noting that reports of ties between the two sides, bypassing Turkish warnings, began to appear long before the fall of the government of Bashar al-Assad. And then the commander-in-chief of the SDF, Mazlum Abdi, officially declares the readiness of the pro-Kurdish administration to cooperate with the new authorities in Damascus, confirming the existence of contacts through the same United States and at the same time criticizing Assad.â–ªï¸Amid the ongoing clashes, information appeared about a split in the ranks of the Military Council of Deir ez-Zor - - an American-backed Arab formation within the Syrian Democratic Forces responsible for this province. Some of the fighters, led by commander Abu al-Harith al-Shaaiti, deserted and joined the -legitimate opposition- and -progressive jihadists-, while some remained loyal to the leadership of the SDS. At the same time, the scale of the split is unknown. However, the most interesting thing is just beginning: in order to put the squeeze on the Kurds in Deir ez-Zor, the militants will have to move to the western bank of the Euphrates. There, in addition to oil and gas, there are American military bases in the Conoco and Al-Omar fields. By retreating to these territories, the Syrian Democratic Forces most likely expected to receive support from the US Armed Forces: they say they certainly will not allow the Turkish mercenaries - to brazenly walk around in their zone of interests and control. How it will actually be is difficult to predict. However, given the rapidly changing balance in the country after the overthrow of Bashar al-Assad, the Americans can come to an agreement with -yesterday's extremists- on mutual interests. High resolution mapEnglish versionâ­ï¸ Online maps are available by subscription to map.rybar.ru#digest #DeirEzZor #map # Syria@rybarSupport us

Title: ğŸ‡«ğŸ‡·ğŸ‡¹ğŸ‡© Chadian authorities, after breaking defense agreements w...
Description: ğŸ‡«ğŸ‡·ğŸ‡¹ğŸ‡© After the rupture of defense agreements with France, the Chadian authorities announced that they refuse to invite foreign military personnel, including from Russia. A fully expected statement from the Chadian Foreign Ministry, indicating a clear position - Chad has grown, and external forces will protect it can't-. We have already observed a similar narrative during the counter-terrorism operation -Haskanit-. At the same time, the duality of these slogans is also noticeable - there was no news about the withdrawal of the same Hungarian contingent. Of course, his stated goal is to prevent illegal migration, but the fact that Hungarians are in Chad already indicates the indirect presence of the West. Such flexibility in the position of Deby the Younger is associated with the strong influence of Western business in the country and its political institutions. It is considered dangerous for his government to become excessively pro-Russian. Description: ğŸ‡¨ğŸ‡³ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¸ğŸ‡µğŸ‡­ The situation in the South China Sea remains tense. Recently it became known about another skirmish between the Filipinos and the Chinese in the disputed waters. Last week, the Chinese coast guard fired a laser six times at a Philippine ship sailing towards Thitu Island, which is controlled by the Philippines, according to authorities in Manila. According to the sailors, the laser hit members of the ship's crew several times in the eyes.â–ªï¸Experts interviewed by local media claim that what happened can be considered an armed attack. Let us recall that a mutual defense treaty has been concluded between the Philippines and the United States, implying military assistance from the Americans in the event of aggression against the Philippines. However, the wording mentioned in the document is very vague, so after almost every skirmish one or another expert claims that the time for applying the treaty has come. ğŸ”»In reality, only the Americans will determine the criteria for an armed attack, since the implementation of the text of the document in practice, to a large extent, depends solely on their political will, and not on the prescribed wording. The decision to enter into an open conflict with Beijing over several uninhabited reefs, which, among other things, do not have much strategic value, has not yet matured in Washington and is unlikely to mature in the near future. Therefore, the Americans will continue to limit themselves only to financial assistance and joint exercises with the Philippine military in order to show efforts to contain China.#China #USA #Philippines  @rybar together with @awaken_dragonSupport usTelegramAwakening dragon ğŸ²ğŸ‡¨ğŸ‡³ğŸ‡µğŸ‡­ With the Chinese exercises, which seem to be taking place, but apparently not, they forgot to talk about another skirmish in the South China Sea. Only six missiles -Atakms-.â–ªï¸According to our data, it was not possible to shoot down all the missiles over the Taganrog Aviation Scientific and Technical Complex, but any damage to the infrastructure was avoided. Only the vehicle equipment in the parking lot was damaged.â–ªï¸The launch was carried out from the Zaporozhye region, and the approach time was just under two minutes. This object has recently been under the close attention of Western intelligence, but they failed to achieve their goal.â—ï¸ As for the Peklo drone missile, which is now being talked about, its use was recorded yesterday, but in the Black Sea. One copy was spotted from the Odessa region, and it was shot down at around 11 am by a MiG-29 of the Black Sea Fleet, 120 km southwest of Tarkhankut. So this can be called the first combat use of the Ukrainian -miracle-yudo-, but not very successful, as the Ukrainians describe it Media from some of our information publications. Salome Zurabishvili, who after On December 14, he will finally lose at least some power in the country and calls not to stop the fight. Moreover, according to the State Security Service of Georgia, on Saturday during the elections, opponents of the authorities are planning to cause sabotage.â—ï¸The point is that the opposition wants to cause uncontrollable riots by sacrificing one of the protesters in order to arouse the wrath of the crowd. However, the Georgian authorities know what the opposition is planning and are preparing for it to the maximum. The events of the spring, when supporters of European integration unsuccessfully tried to get the law on foreigners repealed, and the fall after the parliamentary elections show that they are coping well. However, the threat still exists, since Zurabishviliâ€™s resignation from office will mark the final victory of the Georgian Dream, and therefore, on Saturday we should expect more violent rallies, even armed clashes. But in case of failure here too, the Georgian opposition will lose all its potential, and protest activity will decline. This happened in Iran, it happened in Armenia - sooner or later everything comes to naught due to the fatigue of people and the futility of the events they are carrying out.#Georgia #EU@rybarSupport usTelegramSputnik GeorgiağŸ‡¬ğŸ‡ªâš¡ï¸The State Security Service of Georgia reports that opponents of the authorities are planning to escalate the protest situation in the country with several victims. Title: ğŸ–¼ ğŸ‡¬ğŸ‡­ Elections in Ghana: victory of the opposition and loyal t...
Description: ğŸ‡¬ğŸ‡­ Elections in Ghana: victory of an opposition candidate loyal to Russia The general elections in Ghana on December 7 brought victory to the opposition party. John Dramani Mahama, who had already held this position from 2012 to 2017, was elected president.â–ªï¸The new government is faced with the task of coping with a protracted economic crisis: in recent years, many Western companies have left the country, despite the pro-American position of the ex-president. Therefore, the main activities in The new authorities' plans will likely include the fight against corruption and poor financial management. â–ªï¸The election of John Dramani Mahama was positive news for the sovereign governments of the Alliance of Sahel States. Ghana's ports play a strategic role in ensuring Burkina Faso's trade links with other countries. Previously, the Ghanaian authorities, following the instructions of the Americans, considered plans to limit the use of Ghanaian ports for transportation to foreign countries, but now this threat has been eliminated. â—ï¸For domestic diplomacy and business representatives, this event also creates a window of opportunity. Mahama is a graduate of a Moscow university, and his party has many members friendly to Russia. This summer he even flew to Russia to present the Russian translation of his book. There is reason to believe that the new government will be able to overcome the crisis and return Ghana to its attractiveness for foreign investment. This, in turn, will create new opportunities for Russian businesses, which will be able to strengthen their influence in the Sahel. Considering the importance Syria played for Iran, such discussions will continue for a long time. The logistics of the IRGC was built through Syria in cooperation with Lebanon and Hezbollah. Built during the war with IS, the Soleimani land corridor has long been the basis of the Iranian axis of resistance. And this does not take into account Iranâ€™s huge subsidized investments in the government of Syria, which has sunk into oblivion.â—ï¸Against this background, it is not surprising that Western resources report that there is a showdown in the highest Iranian circles over how such a mistake in support was made Syria, which led to disarray in the army and government. For the Iranian leadership, the loss of Syria is a serious blow that weakens the countryâ€™s capabilities in the confrontation with Israel - everything Pro-Iranian formations have been withdrawn from Syria. Now there are only militants, Israel and Turkey, and with them - chaos. And if personnel changes begin in Iran in the coming weeks, they will most likely be related to the Syrian events. Title: ğŸ” ğŸ‡²ğŸ‡©ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¸ About the USAID program in Moldova on the register of...
Description: Forwarded From Systemic pesticideğŸ‡²ğŸ‡©ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¸ About the USAID program in Moldova for the register of politically exposed persons In Moldova, they intend to create a platform for identifying politically exposed persons within the framework of the American USAID project. The US Agency for International Development is implementing a large-scale five-year project in Moldova - The Moldova Institutional and Structural Reforms Activity. â–ªï¸As part of the project, a proposal was received to optimize the identification of politically exposed persons performing important government functions, as well as to identify risks associated with preventing and combating money laundering and terrorist financing in Moldova. â–ªï¸Politically exposed persons are individuals who perform important government functions in relevant positions. Their family members and other related persons must also be included in the register. â–ªï¸The main task of such a platform is to assess the risks that such persons may potentially bear in the field of money laundering and terrorist financing in their activities. â—ï¸It would seem that USAID is pursuing the seemingly noble goal of the platform - preventing the fight against illegal activities. However, the current authorities of Moldova can call any cooperation with Russia money laundering or even terrorism. It is obvious that the Americans do not just allocate money for such projects, the real task of which is to place agents of their influence in responsible positions in any sphere of the state. ğŸ“ŒThis is especially indicative in the context of the current energy crisis in Moldova and the attempts of unsuccessful authorities to find scapegoats. For example, a scandal is now breaking out that some employees of Moldovagaz subsidiaries have pro-Russian views. What exactly this has to do with the performance of work duties is not very clear, when it is the countryâ€™s top leadership that sabotages negotiations with the Russian Federation on gas supplies, which aggravates the crisis in Moldova. ğŸ”»In Moldova, USAIDâ€™s favorite strategy in the post-Soviet space is being implemented in full swing: through humanitarian initiatives, in reality, to put under control all strategic areas of the state. After all, the draft platform of politically exposed persons is designed to place their agents of influence and prevent those who may arouse suspicion of the desired political orientation from taking control. #Moldova #USA @pezdicide no chemistry - just factspoint.mdMoldova intends to create a platform for identifying politically exposed persons The USAID program - Institutional and structural reforms in Moldova - invited Moldovan companies in the IT and financial services sector to develop electronic solutions that would improve the identification of politically exposed persons persons in the country.

Title: ğŸ”ğŸ–¼ ğŸ‡µğŸ‡±ğŸ‡·ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¦ About relations between Poland and Ukraine and ...
Description: Forwarded From Global StudiesğŸ‡µğŸ‡±ğŸ‡·ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¦ About relations between Poland and Ukraine and where are the Ukrainian F-16s? These love games between the Poles and the Ukrainian authorities are funny if you know that their relationship is still as strong militarily as before. Of course, there are no longer supplies of as many weapons and equipment as there were at the beginning of the Northern Military District. But nevertheless, the Poles supply the Ukrainian Armed Forces with drones, as well as parts for BECs (thanks to the Archangel personnel). â™¦ï¸But something else is much more important: everyone has had a question for many months - where are the F-16 fighters that Western countries handed over to the Ukrainians?-. And the answer, as you may have guessed, is simple - they are in Poland.â—ï¸The Minsk-Mazowiecki air base east of Warsaw is now home to 16 F-16 fighters. Of these, 7 have already been repainted to match the Ukrainian Armed Forces, and they are flying to Ukraine to combat drones. Another 6 F-16As of the Dutch Air Force and 3 Danish F-16s, which flew over the other day. Thus, in Poland (but not in Ukraine) there are currently 16 units of Ukrainian F-16s, but only 7 are flying so far. After completing the tasks they return to Minsk Mazowiecki. The rest are still being prepared for operation.â™¦ï¸This is an interesting situation related to the Poles and Ukrainians. But another important point is that 18 F-16A units of the Dutch Air Force are now fixed in Romania at the Fetesti airbase. Crew training for these fighters has been organized in Romania since last year. Previously there were 6 units, but recently the number has increased. So in total, the Ukrainian Armed Forces now have 34 F-16 fighters. This relates to the question of possible negotiations at the beginning of 2025. The enemy is preparing for the exact opposite. #Denmark #Poland #Russia #UkraineGlobalistics - subscribe to the channel

Title: ğŸ” #Summary for the morning of December 11, 2024 â–ªï¸ Yesterday, da...
Description: Forwarded From Two Majors #Summary for the morning of December 11, 2024 â–ªï¸ Yesterday from the Kursk Bulge, data was received about the entry of the Russian Armed Forces into the territory of the Sumy region. We managed to take the border area near the village of Alexandria, Sumy region. The events take place south of the liberated Plekhovo and the forest areas near it - there were heavy battles for the area. The maneuver can be explained by the complexity of the terrain in the Plekhovo-Sudzha direction: the Psel River blocks the path of our troops. Group of troops -North- after the liberation of the village. Novoivanovka continued to advance eastward and, with heavy fighting, knocked out the Ukrainian Armed Forces from several positions in forest plantations. The enemy carried out 3 unsuccessful counterattacks with elite units totaling up to 30 people on 3 Bradley infantry fighting vehicles, supported by 2 Abrams and Leopard tanks. While repelling the attacks, up to 20 invaders, 3 infantry fighting vehicles and both tanks were destroyed. They write that the offensive actions of the Russian Armed Forces are supported by rocket artillery and TOS -Solntsepek-. â–ªï¸ In Toretsk (Dzerzhinsk), the Russian Armed Forces now confidently control the Zabalka microdistrict and the Central mine along with waste heaps. The Russian army makes its way to Shcherbinovka and Leonidovka to the west. â–ªï¸ In the Pokrovsky direction, the situation for the enemy continues to worsen. North of Petrovka, ours have closed the pocket and continue attacks in the direction of Dachensky and Zeleny. The Russian Armed Forces are building on their success in Shevchenko and are moving towards the waste heap (an important height). There is progress south of Novotroitsky, north of Novoolenovka, in Sontsovtsk, south of Voznesenka. The Russian army is moving on a broad front, stretching the enemyâ€™s forces and depriving him of the opportunity to transfer reinforcements along the LBS.â–ªï¸ In the Kharkov region, the Russian Armed Forces occupied 5 buildings in Volchansk and repelled a counterattack. Heavy fighting is underway.â–ªï¸ In Kurakhovo, the Russian Armed Forces took an elevator in the city center (a significant height) and advanced to the Yuzhny microdistrict. In the north-west of the reservoir, clashes continue beyond the block of multi-storey buildings and south of Stary Terny, where Russian assault groups are pressing in the direction of the Dachnoe-Kurakhovo road in order to cut off the Ukrainian Armed Forcesâ€™ path to the city.â–ªï¸ At night, as a result of a drone attack in Bryansk, a production facility caught fire, they wrote about fire at an oil depot. The governor announced that the fire had been extinguished. Taganrog, Rostov region, came under missile attack at night. An industrial enterprise was damaged, 14 cars burned in the parking lot.â–ªï¸ In the DPR in Gorlovka, as a result of an IED dropped from a UAV of the Armed Forces of Ukraine on the street. Bolotnikov, a man born in 1987 was seriously wounded. The summary was compiled by: Two majors Telegram Two majors Kursk Bulge. Enemy channels: The Russian Armed Forces entered the territory of the Sumy region. We managed to take the border area near the village of Alexandria, Sumy region.âœ¨Normal heroes always take a detour. The likely task is to cut off the enemy group in the Kursk region...

Title: ğŸ”ğŸ–¼ ğŸª–About satellite activity in the north-west of Russia In th...
Description: Forwarded From SPECIAL FORCES ARCHANGEL ZğŸ‡·ğŸ‡ºğŸª–About the activity of satellites in the north-west of Russia In the north-east of Ukraine, despite all the statements in the press about the difficult situation for Ukrainian nationalists, the enemy continues to prepare for attacks or strikes on the territory of the Kursk region and other neighboring regions with her. Western intelligence services are actively helping this, including satellite ones, which share location data with Ukraine our air defense systems, the situation at airfields and other facilities of the RF Armed Forces. Over the past 24 hours, 17 sessions of satellite work in this direction were recorded, of which 11 were in the territory of the Kursk region. Several more sessions were noted in the Belgorod, Voronezh and Bryansk regions. In the classical manner, the enemy pays attention to the airfields of the Russian Aerospace Forces, such as in Kursk and Voronezh, air defense positions, as well as artillery bases as potential targets for attack. Since the activity exceeds the standard norms, it can be assumed that Ukrainian formations may attempt to attack our territories with drones or long-range missiles. Archangel Special forces. Title: ğŸ‡·ğŸ‡ºğŸŒ“ During his speech in the State Duma, deputy Andrei Lugovoi...
Description: ğŸ‡·ğŸ‡ºğŸŒ“ During his speech in the State Duma, deputy Andrei Lugovoi came up with a new initiative in the field of migration policy, proposing to launch a national project to collect data on the manifestations of Russophobia and offenses on the part of migrants. The basis for this was the announced figures of foreign funding for -decolonization- projects in the CIS countries and the subsequent growth of anti-Russian sentiment. As a result, a lot of people with radical and Russophobic views end up in Russia, since there is no input filtering in this regard. The new project, apparently, is designed to eliminate this order of things. There is nothing fundamentally impossible in the technical implementation - a similar system has been introduced in Sheremetyevo for those coming from controlled so-called. Ukraine territory to weed out potentially disloyal elements. In fact, we are talking about seemingly extremely logical things - not to allow migrants who hate our country into Russia. At the same time, there is no point in running ahead of the locomotive: the initiative has not yet been approved, and talk about its effectiveness is early. Yes, and in domestic migration policy there were examples when legislatively introduced mechanisms did not work even several years after adoption. However, recent proposals and laws in this area still give reason to assume that at the highest level there is a certain understanding of the problems of migration policy in recent years and emerging ones from them threats to state sovereignty. #multinationalism #Russia@rybarSupport usTelegramAndrey Lugovoi. State Dumaâ€¼ï¸ Western intelligence services are using migration to solve the problem of destabilizing Russia: - charging migrants, organizing illegal corridors and introducing radicals. Title: ğŸ–¼ ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¸ About testing elements of the American missile defense sy...
Description: ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¸ About testing elements of the American missile defense system in the Pacific Ocean In the area of â€‹â€‹the Northern Mariana Islands in the Asia-Pacific region, the US Missile Defense Agency is preparing to conduct another test of missile defense elements, which is scheduled for the period from December 10 to 12.â–ªï¸The Pentagon plans to launch Standard-3 block 2A (SM-3) anti-missile missiles from a position on the island of Guam to a range of 1700 km. The target will be an aerial target missile fired from a C-17A military transport aircraft.â–ªï¸Control will be provided by measurement complex ships from the US Department of Transportation reserve fleet and a C-11B optical tracking laboratory aircraft. Also in the area will be the Arleigh Burke-class destroyer USS Milius.â–ªï¸This will be the first test of the new Aegis Guam missile defense system as part of the Pentagon's program to protect the Mariana Islands. The previous time, the Americans carried out similar launches at the end of March at a training ground in Hawaii. Against the backdrop of a gradual increase in tension in the Asia-Pacific region, it is not difficult to guess that the deployed system is primarily directed against the PRC. Moreover, back in 2023, the United States planned to literally stuff Guam with missile defense and air defense systems. And on a more global level, this is part of the strategy to deploy similar facilities around the world, which Washington has been adhering to since the withdrawal from the ABM Treaty. In particular, within its framework, a similar Aegis system was recently put into operation in Poland near the Kaliningrad region. High-resolution infographicsEnglish version#USA@rybarSupport us

Title: ğŸ‡©ğŸ‡ªğŸ‡¸ğŸ‡¾ About a new wave of Syrian refugees in Germany Against t...
Description: ğŸ‡©ğŸ‡ªğŸ‡¸ğŸ‡¾ About a new wave of Syrian refugees to GermanyAgainst the backdrop of the flaring crisis in Syria, the Germans decided to suspend the consideration of applications for asylum from citizens of this country. The decision was made by the German Migration Department, where they explained that the situation in Syria is confusing and that will happen there politically is too difficult to predict. Currently, more than 47 thousand applications from Syrians. The department also said that the latest events in their country will not affect asylum decisions that have already been made. The political debate about whether Syrians should stay in Germany began at the same time as the crisis. Several deputies from the CDU party, which includes the main candidate for the post of German Chancellor Friedrich Merz, immediately spoke out in favor of returning refugees back to their homeland. At the same time, politicians from the Greens and the party of the current SPD chancellor called for restraint due to the unclear situation. It is obvious that this topic will occupy an important place in the election debates of German politicians: it is quite convenient to cover up more serious problems within the country, and at the same time beneficial play on the mood of the electorate.ğŸ”»However, the measure taken by the German government will obviously not save the situation. After all, when asking for asylum, you can lose your passport and provide false documents - Germany will not be able to completely or even half protect itself from the next wave of Syrians. It is also worth understanding that, according to official data alone, at least 1.5 million people are expected to flee from Syria - and it is quite obvious that most of them will try to break through to Europe. Namely, in Germany, a large diaspora of Syrians has settled quite firmly and long ago - this is the largest group in the country after the Ukrainians, only officially there are about 900 thousand of them in the country. Therefore, it is logical that many of the fugitives will want to join their brothers, and they will be happy to help them .#Germany #Syria #migrants @rybar together with @pl_syrenkaSupport usSpiegelAlle Verfahren ausgesetzt â€“ Bamf stoppt Entscheidung Ã¼ber AsylantrÃ¤ge von SyrernDas Bundesamt fÃ¼r Migration und FlÃ¼chtlinge bearbeitet bis auf Weiteres keine AsylantrÃ¤ge von Syrerinnen und Syrern. Jede Entscheidung stÃ¼nde sonst -auf tÃ¶nernen FÃ¼ÃŸen-, teilt das Amt auf SPIEGEL-Anfrage mit.

Description: â—ğŸ‡®ğŸ‡±ğŸ‡¸ğŸ‡¾ Massive air raid of the Israeli Air Force on the territory of Syria While Turkish-backed groups were fighting with the Kurds for Menbij, and progressive jihadist Ahmad al-Sharaa (Abu Muhammad al-Julani) gave interviews to Western media, last night the Israeli Air Force carried out a series of strikes across Syria. The targets were objects in several provinces at once, including those controlled by the Kurdish Syrian Democratic Forces (SDF) in the northeast of the country, which had not happened before.â–ªï¸The hits were on military research centers in the vicinity of the Syrian capital Damascus and the suburbs of Qudsaya . Fires broke out, which were soon extinguished by local services.â–ªï¸Marine infrastructure and equipment in the port of Latakia were attacked. According to Israeli media, ships of unknown destination on the roadstead also came under attack, but this information has not yet been confirmed.â–ªï¸ Explosions occurred at the Al-Shayrat airbase in Homs province, which the Israelis have repeatedly struck. Apparently, there the IDF tried to destroy the remnants of the Syrian Air Force, air defense systems and infrastructure.â–ªï¸In territories controlled by Kurdish forces in the provinces of Ar-Raqqa and Al-Hasakah, the Israelis hit facilities previously used by the troops of the overthrown government of Bashar al-Assad.ğŸ”»As we wrote, on At the moment, the Israelis will do everything possible to ensure that the weapons and ammunition of the SAA, which has sunk into oblivion, do not fall into into the hands of the militants to the new authorities formed by the -legal opposition-. This can explain the attacks in the zone of control of the SDF, which for the time being coexisted with the enclaves of the Syrian Armed Forces: there is a considerable probability that the hand of the Syrian revolution in the person of the pro-Turkish Syrian National Army (SNA) will reach there too. The Israeli Air Force will continue to attack military warehouses, air defense elements, airfields and research centers in order to completely deprive the militants of the legacy of the SAA, which could threaten Israel or be resold to third parties. At the same time, the matter will not be limited to strikes alone, and after their completion, the IDF units that entered El Quneitra will not be in a hurry to leave. After all, if previously this kind of activity was justified by the presence of Iranian-backed forces in the region, now progressive jihadists will act as a punching bag. Title: â†©ï¸ ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¸ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¦ The American administration continues to insist on ex...
Description: Rybar: ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¸ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¦ From time to time, materials appear in the press where the authors try to assess the long-term prospects of the so-called. Ukraine as a state entity. In our opinion, the best answer to the question is two recent news: â–ªï¸The Commissioner of the Kiev... ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¸ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¦ The American administration continues to insist on expanding mobilization by the Kyiv regime: the State Department stated that if the lower conscription limit is reduced to 18 years, the United States and its allies are ready -to fully train and equip all recruits-.Behind such formulations are hidden conditions to continue or expand military assistance to the Kyiv regime. Ukrainian ruling circles understand this and are already hinting at the possibility of reducing the mobilization threshold from the current 25 years to 20 years. On the one hand, such a step will lead to a certain influx of manpower and will improve the position of the Armed Forces of Ukraine at the front, especially in terms of the ratio of numbers with the Russian Armed Forces. However, the solution also has pitfalls: â–ªï¸Due to the long-standing demographic problems of young people in the so-called. Ukraine doesnâ€™t have so much - on the age pyramid, there is a noticeable strong subsidence in this category. It is unlikely that it will be possible to overwhelm the combat formations of Ukrainian formations with 18-25 year olds.â–ªï¸In the current realities, a large-scale conscription of yesterday's schoolchildren and students is quite capable of leading to a social explosion in the so-called. Ukraine, especially against the backdrop of the practice of busification. A significant number of them themselves will prefer to hide until the last moment, even in the Chernobyl exclusion zone.â–ªï¸Finally, the motivation of the young recruits abducted by the TCC will be appropriate. If in 2022 the patriotic impulse inflated by the Kyiv regime was at work, now, after almost three years of hostilities, morale is at a different level. Be that as it may, a possible reduction in the mobilization age by the so-called Ukraine does not bode well for us, much less for the Ukrainian population, which will simply be finished off with its already sad demographics. In general, an interesting picture is emerging: at the beginning of the Northern Military District, statements that the West would fight to the last Ukrainian were often perceived as propaganda or even conspiracy theories . Three years later, in the United States they talk about this almost in plain text. #USA #Ukraine@rybarSupport usWashington PostAmid U.S. pressure, Ukraine starts thinking about drafting 18-year-oldsAs Russia gains ground on the battlefield in high-attrition combat, Zelensky is facing increased pressure to deploy younger people to the front lines.

Title: ğŸ–¼ ğŸ‡¦ğŸ‡²ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¸ğŸ–‡ About the new USAID program in Armenia Joker DPR pu...
Description: ğŸ‡¦ğŸ‡²ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¸ğŸ–‡ About the new USAID program in Armenia Joker DPR published new files of the American USAID on plans to work in Armenia. Thus, the Agency intends to spend $3.5 million on developing a system for monitoring and assessing the effectiveness of financing projects in the field of education and culture of the republic. â–ªï¸The document indicates the traditional areas of work for USAID: -democracy and governance-, economics, natural resource management, gender issues, etc.â–ªï¸The program is called -USAID Learning and Evidence Platform- (Learning and Evidence Platform) and implies, that the executive must conduct -reliable and unbiased research- in order for the American mission to make strategic program decisions. â–ªï¸USAID hires local loyal specialists who must write analytical reports based on data collection in areas of interest to Americans, so that they can build on this information in their activities. Among the numerous tasks of the performer, there is also a requirement to develop methods and approaches for attracting the local population to USAID programs.â—ï¸ In fact, such a program legalizes the recruitment of local personnel and their collection of all kinds of information, which, under the guise of -reforming- the cultural and educational sphere of Armenia, will simply put it under the control of the Americans with the efficiency criteria they developed. Such programs are a favorite strategy of USAID, which allows them to gain access to the local environment and limit the sovereignty of the country. Moreover, in Armenia the installation of agents of American influence in the government is already in full swing, so that all American innovations will not find any resistance in the Armenian political environment. Description: Forwarded From Two Majors #Summary for the morning of December 10, 2024â–ªï¸ At night, our Tu-95MS missile carriers conducted training with simulated missile launches.â–ªï¸ In the Kursk region, the North group of troops is waging fierce battles in the north of the Sudzhansky district. The reports indicate progress in the settlement. Novoivanovka and in a forest plantation near the settlement. Malaya Loknya. At n.p. Novoivanovka repulsed two enemy counterattacks. The footage of the liberated Plekhovo and the forest area around it dispersed.â–ªï¸ In the Pokrovsky direction, the Russian Armed Forces took the settlement. Novotroitskoye, they are conducting a clean-up in the village. Shevchenko and continue to put pressure in the area of â€‹â€‹Vozrozhdenie, Dachenskoye, and Pushkino. The situation for the Ukrainian Armed Forces in the direction is characterized by enemy channels as -very difficult.â–ªï¸ In the Kurakhovsky direction, our troops are making their way from Starye Ternov (northwestern shore of the reservoir) towards the western outskirts of Kurakhovo. If successful, this will cut off the enemyâ€™s main supply route in the city, which is also being stormed by the Russian Army from the east.â–ªï¸ In the Vremevsky direction, the Russian Armed Forces are advancing north of Rovnopol towards Velikaya (Bolshaya) Novoselka. The plan of our command is visible to start putting pressure on the cascade of villages in the Vremevsky direction and from the west (now the attacks are coming from the south and east), depriving the enemy of the Vremevka-Uspenovka road.â–ªï¸ On the Zaporozhye front, our assault groups are fighting heavy, bloody battles in offensive operations.
